T02TD2512.1E:82b-9: sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi dngos grub mchog slob dpon la stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-10: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni de nas bzung nas so //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-11: nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-12: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang nyin re zhing slob dpon la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-13: gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mi tshugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-14: mi sod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni der rang nyid zhugs pa'o zhes snga ma bzhin du rgyud dang sbyar te /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-15: gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di la zhugs pa tsam gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-16: gang bdud la sogs pas zil gyis mi gnod cing tshugs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-17: de nyid kyis kyang mi bsod pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-19: dngos grub thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-20: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-22: ye shes thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-23: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-24: byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-25: bya ba thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i tshul te /
T02TD2512.1E:82b-26: de dag bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' slob dpon la bsgrub par mdzad cing rdzogs par mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-27: der de lta bu'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis rang nyid 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:82b-28: de nas yang dag par mchod la zhes bya ba ni dngos grub thams cad rab tu bsgrub par mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-1: 'das gsang pa'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-2: glu dang rol mos kyang mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-3: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dbar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-5: bcom ldan 'das las rdo rje thal mo bskor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-6: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la blang bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:83a-7: / rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de lta bu'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-12: dril bu dang bcas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-13: yi ge h'um nyid zlos shing ming gi dbang bskur bas slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:83a-14: lhag ma rnams ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:83a-15: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa po rang nyid la dbang bskur ba stsol bar mdzad pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-16: skad cig de nyid la sgrub pa pos /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-17: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams ma bsams bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:83a-18: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid mthong ba ma stsal ba de'i tshe sgrub pa po'i ji skad bshad pa'i dbang bskur ba rang nyid kyis blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-19: de'i tshe lo phyed kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ma chog 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:83a-20: de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni de nas gzengs bstod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:83a-21: de nas thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang 'og nas bshad pa'i ming gi dbang bskur ba des dbang bskur ba de ni /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-22: 'dir rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba gnyis pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-23: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba de 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul gyis blangs bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:83a-25: de nas byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-26: de ltar lung bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-27: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-28: 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i cho gas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:83a-29: dkyil 'khor chen po las byung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-0: dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba sgrub pa lan @83b cig bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad ma thag pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i de nyid slob dpon gyis lan cig ste thang cig bya'i yang nas yang du ngal bso zhing bya ba yang ma yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-2: zla ba tsam gyis bya ba yang ma yin gyi /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-3: gzhan du stan gcig la 'dug pa /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-5: mtshan ma byung ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-6: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-7: gal te slob ma la gzhug par 'dod na snga ma bzhin du sdom pa bzung ba'i bar gyi cho ga byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-8: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga po bsdus pa bcings la snga ma bzhin du slob dpon zhugs nas de bzhin du rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-9: h'um gi ngo bo nyid kyi snying pos snying po de nyid ci 'dod pa zlos pa'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-10: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyi bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-11: phyag rgya chen pos zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-12: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa la snying po 'don cing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-13: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-14: mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste zhes bya ba ni gang rdo rje thal mo bskor bas 'jug pa la bstan pa ni 'dir yang 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-15: dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams la bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma'i dngos po skyed par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-16: de bas na rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur ba'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:83b-17: / bzhugs pa 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni lnga po bsdus pa'i 'jug pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-18: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-19: ji ltar dang po'i 'jug pas dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi bar du thob pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-21: de ltar na 'dis kyang dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'i dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-22: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:83b-23: ji ltar dang po'i 'jug pa na //
T02TD2512.1E:83b-24: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-0: rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming dang @84a * //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-1: yung bstan pa rnams blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-2: slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir rjes su gnang ba ma nos la slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-3: rdo rje slob ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa'i slob ma de rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-5: 'di ltar rdo rje slob dpon gyis gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad slob dpon nyid kyis bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-6: phyag rgya bcing ba yang bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang gis lha gang zhig bzung ba de la lha'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-7: sems can gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lha thams cad kyi rigs la mos pa de rnams la yang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-8: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du khyad par gyi cho ga rgyas par 'byung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-10: gzhan dag gis ni de rnams kyi yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-11: khyad par gyi cho ga'i nus pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-12: de nas lha gzhan dag la dad pa rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-13: lha chen po la sogs pa la dad pa yang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhi ba'i mdung gis mtshan pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-14: de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-15: ji ltar zhi ba'i mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i mdung gis mtshan pa las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-16: 'dir yang de las gsungs pa'i 'jug pa'i cho ga'i stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-18: de ltar slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:84a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i cho ga gang dang gang gis zhugs pa de rnams ni ji ltar zhugs pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:84a-20: zas dang ro'i bcud dang gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-0: zas thams cad ni bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa ji ltar grags pa @84b rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-1: ro thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-2: shata la sogs pa drug go //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-3: gnas pa ni gar gyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-8: rgyud las bshad pa'i gnas pa rang gi lha'i ngo bo nyid du gsal ba'i yid kyis 'dug pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-9: de ltar zas dang ro dang gnas pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-10: de dag thams cad kyis slob ma thams cad ci 'dod par tshim par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-12: mchod pa la sogs pa slob dpon gyis bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-13: slob dpon slob ma dang bcas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-14: dkyil 'khor chen po mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-15: bya ba 'di ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-16: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-17: de ltar gar dang mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-18: ci nus pa'i tshul gyis zas dang skom la sogs pa'i longs spyod dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-19: de bzhin du bzlas brjod kyang byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-20: ji skad ces pa'i gar dang glu dang dgod pa la sogs pas mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-21: de la 'dir ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-22: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa gzhan dag la bshad pa ltar /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-23: snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-25: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-26: sems can gyi khams thams cad ni gang gi phyir phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi gzugs brnyan du rgyas btab pas /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-27: 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-28: 'dir bde ba chen po ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-30: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul la sogs pa ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-31: ji ltar na yang 'di bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi rdo rje yin zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-32: phyag rgya thams cad kyis rgyas btab pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-33: 'dod pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-34: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ni gnas te /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mngon sum du bya bar mngon par 'dod pa'i bsam pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:84b-36: de yongs su rdzogs pa na rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-37: de nyid grub cing rdzogs pa ni rdo rje'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:84b-38: rdo rje'i sbyor ba des ni /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-1: nyid kyi zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-2: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa ni rdo rje chos so //
T02TD2512.1E:85a-3: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid de rgyur gyur pa'i phyag rgyas sems can gyi khams thams cad rgyas btab pa 'di ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-4: de bas na dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85a-6: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs pas ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid bcu khong du chud par 'gyur la /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-7: de khong du chud pas ji ltar zhugs pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-8: de bas na dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85a-9: de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-10: dkyil 'khor chen po'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas slob dpong yi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-11: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-13: // / gzhan yang de dag nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-14: cho ga thams cad bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-15: de la dang po kho nar slob dpon dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-16: dam tshig thob pa de las gsungs pa'i dam tshig yongs su skyong bas /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-17: sems can yongs su dag pa gsang ba'i cho ga thams cad kyi bya ba shes pa dpa' ba /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-20: dul ba 'dul ba'i kun du spyod pa dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-21: chos zab mo la lhag par mos pa /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-22: sems can thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i blo dang ldan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-23: lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-24: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85a-25: de yang rang bzhin gyis rnams par dag pa la lhag par mos pas nang gi khrus byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-26: chu'i khrus don du gnyer ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang khrus kyi cho ga'am /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-27: rang nyid ji ltar dga' bas chu'i khrus bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85a-28: de nas lha'i khang pa dang nye bar phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-29: de rkang pa gnyis bkrus la nye reg byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:85a-30: h'um phat ces bya ba'i khro bo'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-0: g-yon pa'i @85b khro bo'i khu tshur g-yon phyogs su skor bas bgegs thams cad bsal la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-2: de nas rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus rten dang lha'i khang pa bsang gtong byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-3: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-4: de nas yang lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge hr'i: las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lce'i padma'i 'dab ma la h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-5: badzra dzi hva zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-6: lag pa gnyis su yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-7: de'i steng du h'um gnyis la rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsam /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-8: lag pa'i rtse mo yang h'um nyid las rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-9: h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid sprul te /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-10: aom gri hna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-11: khro bo ti rinti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-12: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-13: yid kyis khros nas dgag bya la //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-14: rdo rje mthe bo dam po ste //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-15: khro bo ti rinti ri rab bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-16: aom badzra dzv'a la aa na l'arka h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-17: aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-18: ti ri nti ri'i phyag rgyas rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis snyoms pa'i khu tshur spyi bor bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje ti rinti ri ste /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-21: phyogs bzhir rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i tshul byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-22: yang phyag rgya 'di nyid dpral ba'i phyogs su bzhag nas gnyis su byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-23: dar dpyangs bcings pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-24: mnyam pa'i thal mos lha rnams mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-26: yang aom badzra dzv'a la aa na l'arka h'um zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-28: g-yon pa rdo rje khu chur snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-29: g-yas rdo rje gsor zhing bgegs thams cad gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-30: de nas h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-31: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la bgegs thams cad bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-34: bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:85b-35: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-36: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:85b-37: mthe bo rdo rje bsgreng ba 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-1: ti rinti ri zhes bya ba rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-4: badzra nee tri bandha sarba bighn'a na zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-5: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang la sa la reg par byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-6: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam sv'a h'a zhes bya bas sa 'og bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-7: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyis nam mkha' bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-8: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-9: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-10: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-11: yang rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi steng du bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-13: rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-14: mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-15: khar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-16: rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya dang ldan pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-17: aom drum bandham ham zhes bya ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel la /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-20: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar te /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-21: bzlog nas spyi bor bzhag pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-22: yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-24: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mkhrig mar mdud pa bya ba ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-25: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-26: aom badzra p'a tam ke ni ra ta /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-28: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam por phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-29: mthe chung gnyis ba dan ltar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-30: rdo rje nag mos byang phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-31: hri badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-32: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya nyid khar brtan par bzhag pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-33: rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-34: aom badzra shi kha ra ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-35: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86a-36: rdo rje las kyis dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la ra ba bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86a-38: yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nang du rab byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-0: h'um rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings @86b la ;
T02TD2512.1E:86b-2: mthe chung gnyis lcags kyur sbrel la /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-3: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-4: 'di nyid las gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-5: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-6: rdo rje bsdams pa dang badzra bandha bam zhes bya bas rdo rje'i dra ba bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-7: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus snod lha'i khang pa'i sgor bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-8: rdo rje me'i sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-9: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba phyag rgya dang bcas pa yang bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-10: de nas aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-11: me tog gi phyag rgyas me tog byin gyis rlob /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-12: aom badzra gandha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-14: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-15: rdo rje bdug pa'i phyag rgyas bdug pa /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-16: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpa nna tv'a ta zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-17: ral gri'i phyag rgyas lha bshos te //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-18: rdo rje bsdams pas ral gri 'debs pa ltar byed pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-19: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-20: mar me'i phyag rgyas ni mar me la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-27: tsandan dkar po'i dung chos la sogs pa'i snod gtsang ma'i nang du bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-28: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-29: de dag thams cad gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-30: mchod rten thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-31: bdag la byin brlabs sogs bsgrubs pas //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-32: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-33: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-34: lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-35: byas pa'am ni bris pa yi //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-36: dang po'i 'khor lo'i gzhag nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-37: de ni slar yang rab tu bsgrub //
T02TD2512.1E:86b-38: yi ge h'um 'don cing dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-39: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-40: sa la gzhag nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:86b-41: de nyid khar gzhag na dkyil 'khor der rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-0: de nas gal te 'byor na me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod @87a * //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-3: phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor lnga bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-4: yang shar phyogs nas nub tu bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-5: sngags 'di dang rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza au pastha n'a ya /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-7: a'atma nam niry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-9: de nas de bzhin du gnas pa las /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-10: rdo rje thal mo snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-11: lho phyogs nas byang du kha bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-12: sngags 'di dang dbral ba sa la reg pas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she k'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-14: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa mam /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-15: de nas de bzhin du gnas pa las /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-16: rdo rje khu tshur spyi bor gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-17: nub phyogs su kha shar du bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-18: sngags 'di dang kha sa la reg pas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra barta n'a ya /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-20: a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma pra barta ya mam /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-21: de nas de bzhin du gnas pa las /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-22: rdo rje thal mo snying gar gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-23: byang phyogs su lhor kha bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-24: sngags 'di dang spyi bos reg pas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ne /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-26: a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-27: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru mam /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-28: de nas shar phyogs su pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-29: rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar te /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-30: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87a-31: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-36: las kyi rigs su zhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-40: rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dgongs su gsol /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-41: bdag rdo rje ming 'di zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-46: las kyi rigs su zhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-47: snying po dang phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87a-48: gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87b-0: @87b phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-3: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-7: yang dag par song ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-8: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-9: sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la yang rgya cher rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87b-10: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar mdzad par bskul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87b-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa de dag thams cad la yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.1E:87b-12: de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-14: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-15: lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-17: thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-18: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-19: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-23: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:87b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dza megha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-25: bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-26: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-27: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-28: lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-30: yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:87b-31: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-0: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la @88a * //
T02TD2512.1E:88a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-3: mar me'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-5: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-6: lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-8: mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-9: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-10: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-14: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:88a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u dza mi gha su mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-17: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-19: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-20: lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am yang dag par sbyar ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-21: yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-22: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-23: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-27: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:88a-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-29: thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-30: gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-32: rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-33: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:88a-35: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-0: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par @88b thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:88b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhyam ga ratna a'a lam ka ra p'u dza megha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-2: de nas bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-4: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-8: rtsed 'jo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-9: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-15: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:88b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ha sya l'a sya ra ti kr'i da soo khya aa nutta ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-17: bzhad pa'i phyag rgya de nyid rdo rje thal mo bskor ba 'di spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-18: yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-19: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-21: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-23: gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-24: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-25: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-29: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:88b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bo dhi a'a lam k'a ra bastra p'u dza me ghas mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-31: de nas sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-33: snying rje chen po'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-34: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-35: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-36: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:88b-37: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-0: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yangs su mya ngan las bzla bar @89a * //
T02TD2512.1E:89a-2: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-3: byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:89a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bo dhi tsitta p'u dza me ghas mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-5: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-6: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-7: sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rab lus par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzrod bha ba d'a na p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-8: rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-9: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-10: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par bral bar gyur cig / dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang lnga par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra ma h'a bo dhi ha ra sh'i la p'a ra mi ta p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-11: rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-12: sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-13: rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-14: zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-15: chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra ma h'a dharma aa ba bo dhi ksh'anti p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-16: rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-17: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-18: sangs rgyas nyid la yongs su gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sam s'a ra pa ri tyi ka aa nutta ra ma h'a b'irya p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-19: me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-20: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-21: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig / bsam gtan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89a-25: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-0: rig pa thams @89b cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra soo khy'a bi h'a ra dhya na p'a ra mi ta p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-1: bdug spos kyi phyag rbya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-2: sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang ye shes rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-3: bzo dang bstan bcos tham cad shes shing /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-5: gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-6: de kho na nyid mthong ste nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-7: shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra kle sha tstshed sarba dharma: sa manta /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-8: dzny'a na ma h'a pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-9: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs drung du bdag nyid kyis lhag par mos par byas la ;
T02TD2512.1E:89b-10: lus kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-12: de nas thams cad du kha dang lce brgya stong phrag snyed kyi sgo nas mnyam med mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pas mchod pas lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ga ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-15: bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor bas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta na p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um//
T02TD2512.1E:89b-17: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-20: smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-22: de ltar mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:89b-25: rnam pa thams cad du bdag so sor bzhes su gsol /
T02TD2512.1E:90a-0: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol @90a * //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:90a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bde ba nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:90a-4: yid bde ba dang bcas pa nyid kyis mi'i mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig / bde gshegs gsang sngags rnams la mkhas pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-5: rtag tu chos rgyal lhun gyis grub thob la //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-6: 'gro ba ma lus dgod par gnas bgyid cing //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-7: gal te ma thob na yang dus 'dir smon //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-8: de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsngos nas /
T02TD2512.1E:90a-9: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:90a-10: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-11: yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-12: de bzhin bla med byang chub sems //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-13: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-14: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-15: sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-16: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-17: sems can don ni byed pa gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-18: bdag gis brtan por gzung bgyi zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-20: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-21: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-22: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-23: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-24: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-25: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-26: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-27: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-28: nyin re zhing yang lan drug tu //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-29: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-30: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-31: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-32: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-33: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-34: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-35: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-36: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-37: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-38: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-39: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-40: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-41: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-42: ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-43: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:90a-44: dbyugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-1: de nas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sbyor bas phyag rgya bcing ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-2: cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-3: thal mo dam du bsdams pa las //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-4: sor mo thams cad bsnol nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-5: rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-6: rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-7: badzra aanydza li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-8: badzra bandha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i ste /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-9: badzra bandha trat ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-10: rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-11: badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-12: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-13: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-14: dang po'i rdo rje sku mdog dmar po 'od dmar po 'bar bas /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-15: bdag nyid kun du gang bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-16: dbab pa de yang 'dis brtan par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-17: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sha shva to me bh'a bahri da ya me aa dhi tishth'a sarba siddhi me pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-18: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo sbyar ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-19: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-20: badzra mushti zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-21: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-23: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong bzhag nas bsdams la mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-24: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-25: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-26: rdo rje ro'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-27: yi ge h'um lan gsum du brjod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-28: 'dis rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-29: aom badzra mu: aom sarba p'a pam a'a ka rsha na bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ye h'um phat /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-30: ces bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'gro thams cad dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-31: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis nang du /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-32: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-33: legs par gyen du 'phags pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-34: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-35: aom badzra p'a ni bi sgro ta sa sarba aa p'a ya bandha na ni pra mo ksh'a ya sarba aa b'a ya ga ti bhya: sarba satv'a na /
T02TD2512.1E:90b-36: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma yatrat ces bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-37: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams byas te //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-38: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:90b-39: tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-2: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje la h'um yid kyis mngon par bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-3: de nyid yid la gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-4: de nas yi ge h'um de dang dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gis /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-5: rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur yongs su gyur pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-6: de'i steng du yang yi ge h'um dang ka la sogs pa rnams kyis skar ma lta bu'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-7: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po de nyid h'um dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-8: dang po'i rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-9: rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-10: rdo rje ni bdag go zhes bsgoms nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-11: rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams sbrul la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-12: des sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-13: de rnams rdo rje der bcug nas rdo rje chen po de /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-14: bdag ni sems dpa' kun bdag grags //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-15: bdag nyid kyang ni bdag la gnas //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-16: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-17: sems dpa' ni bdag go zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-19: badzra satva hom zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-20: bzlas ma thag tu bsgoms pa'i rdo rje chen po //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-22: de nas snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-23: yang sgrub pa pos badzra satva hom zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-24: de ltar sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-26: de thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid so sor snang zhing ;
T02TD2512.1E:91a-27: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-28: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-29: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-30: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-32: de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-35: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91a-36: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-37: de nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas la /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-38: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dril bu blangs la snyems par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-39: lag pa g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje blangs nas gsor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91a-40: rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-0: h'um 'don pas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya @91b chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-1: de lta bu'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-3: mdun du sna tshogs padma'i gdan la rdo rje bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-4: h'um brjod de rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-6: yang h'um de nyid zlos shing badzra satva ham zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-7: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-8: de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas snying po dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa 'di dag gis /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-12: dbang du bya ba byas te badzra aam ku sha dza: badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-15: de nas 'di dag gi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'i mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-17: mthe'u chung lcags kyu chen por bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-18: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-19: mkhrig ma mdud pa ni zhags pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-20: mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-21: rgyab gnyis bsnyams te mnan pa ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-22: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la h'um dri shya zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-23: bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-24: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-25: rang gi lus la bsgom par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-26: bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-27: dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-28: h'um dang gsang ba'i lcags kyu dang po'i rdo rjes gung mo rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis su byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-29: de dang dgug pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-30: rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-31: yang dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-32: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-33: rgyab tu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-34: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-35: bdag nyid dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-36: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-37: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes lan gsum brjod pas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-38: mdzub bcas zla ba'i mdog can la //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-39: rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog / rdo rje phreng sogs kyis spras shing //
T02TD2512.1E:91b-41: ces bya ba sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-42: dga' ba chen pos gzigs pa zhal 'dzum zhing rnam par g-yo ba bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-43: mig gnyis su h'um gnyis bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-44: lce la yang h'um bkod de /
T02TD2512.1E:91b-45: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya gar las byung ba bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-1: bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-2: yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis dza: h'um bom ho: zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-3: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la sbyor ba 'di dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-4: phyag rgya 'dis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-7: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bom ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ri h'um zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-11: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-14: don yod grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-16: aom badzra dh'a tu dri shya /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-17: dza: h'um bom ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-19: aa ham badzra dh'a tu zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-20: yang de rnams kyi gsang sngags ni /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-24: aom badzra karma h'um zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-25: 'di dag ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sngags yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-26: de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-29: rdo rje sems ma brtan byas la //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-30: gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-31: gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-32: sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-33: gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-34: gung mo padma 'dra bar dgug / sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-35: de bzhin mdzub mo bkug pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-36: de nas badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ljags la bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-37: de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-38: de la 'di dag ni rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-39: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-40: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-41: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-42: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-43: mi g-yo ba yi sa la reg / rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-44: tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog gdon mi za bar mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02TD2512.1E:92a-46: de bas na go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas don yong grub pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-47: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba thun mong gi snying pos byang chub mchog dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92a-48: sa gnon pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang rab tu sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-0: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thun @92b mong gi snying pos sngags pas rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-1: mtshan ma rnams dang bcas par rab tu sbyar na /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-3: de nas dang po'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-4: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-5: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la dang po'i rdo rje bskyed do //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-6: badzra ratna aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-7: dpral ba'i phyogs su rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-8: badzra dharma aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-10: badzra karma aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-11: spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-12: de nas aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-15: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-16: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-17: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-18: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-21: tsittam shre yam: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-22: bha ga b'ana sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-24: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: zhes bya ba'i yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-25: de nas rdo rje thal mo lan gsum bskor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-26: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bcal dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-27: aom sarba buddha bha ba ratna sanytsa ya /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-28: pra tyuta da bi bya mu ku ta n'a ma /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-30: pra ba ra badzra dha ra shr'i badzra satva sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-33: dang po kho nar sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-34: de yang spyi gtsug tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-35: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-36: aom bh'u kham aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-37: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog dkar pos gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-38: badzra satva aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-39: rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung gnas bee d'urya sngo bsangs kyi mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-40: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-41: badzra ratna aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-42: ltag par 'od dpag tu med pa btsag yug snam gyi mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-43: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-44: badzra dharma aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:92b-45: rna ba g-yon pa'i sted du don yod grub pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:92b-46: phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas badzra karma aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-1: yang zhal dkar po dpung pa'i mtha' nas phyag gnyis pa la sha'i mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-2: lhag ma ni kha dog sngon po //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-3: zhal gyi 'og nas lte ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni dmar skya /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-5: bus mo man chad kha dog dkar po'i mdog dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-6: de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-7: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis bsnol bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-8: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo nang du bkug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-9: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs dang por sbyar ba 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog ces bya ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-11: de nas phyogs thams cad du cod pan bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-12: mdun du rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdud pa byed pa lta bus phreng ba bcing ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-13: rgyab tu de bzhin du mdud pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-14: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa las dgrol bas logs gnyis su dar dbyangs 'phyang bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-15: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-16: badzra tushya ho zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-17: de nas yang badzra ratna aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-18: rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-19: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-20: rdo rje thal mo kha thur du bstan la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-22: mthe bong la rtse sbyar bar byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-23: de snying ga nas bteg ste dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag pa 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-24: rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-25: de nas aom padma m'a la aa bhi sh'inytsa lo ke shva ra te /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-27: zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di dang /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-28: padma'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-31: phyag rgya 'dis sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-32: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-33: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-34: srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnyams te brkyang la ba dan ltar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-35: de ltar na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje'i phreng ba la sogs pas sbras par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:93a-36: de nas yi ge gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-37: h'um zlos bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje'i dbang dang bdag po'i dbang blang la /
T02TD2512.1E:93a-38: rdo rje rang gi mgo la gzhag la h'um de nyid zlos shing ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-0: @93b de nas 'dis dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-2: aa bhi sh'inytsa mi ma h'a badzra dha ra /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-3: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje yin //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-5: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-6: rdo rje 'chang chen brtul zhugs yin //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-7: rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po'i mchog ste /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-8: 'di yongs su mi spong bas 'di rtag tu chongs shig ces bya ba'i gsang ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-9: hr'i badzra garbha pa ti aa ti shr'i he badzra n'a ma siddhya sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba: sva:/
T02TD2512.1E:93b-10: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-11: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-12: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-13: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-14: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-15: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-16: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-18: g-yas pa'i mig tu ta las zla ba bya /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-19: g-yon par ma bkod la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-20: h'um gis mig 'bras dus mtha'i me lta bur //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-21: gnas pa 'di ni rdo rje'i lta ba bya //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-22: de nas yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs la 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-23: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-24: de'i dbus su yi ger bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-25: de las dus mtha'i rlung gis sbar ba'i sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me lta bu'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i rdo rje des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thal bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-26: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam pa'i yi ge khom dkar po'i gzugs can gyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun rnam par 'bebs pas /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-27: sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du tshig pa bkrus la /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-28: 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho dpa' rlabs kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pas gang bar gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:93b-29: de nas ri'i mes 'om can gyi rgya mtsho bskol la /
T02TD2512.1E:93b-30: de'i dbus su padma chen po'i gzugs can de la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-0: de bas chung ba'i padma dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor ba de'i yang rtsa bar yi ge pra las tshad mtha' yas pa'i gser gyi rus sbal yang padma'i lte ba la yi ge pra nyid gser gyi mdog can gyi yi ge kham gi gzugs @94a * //
T02TD2512.1E:94a-2: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyang nam mkha'i phyogs nas byon te bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:94a-3: de nas h'um sum h'um zhes bya bas padma de ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi pa /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-4: rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gser gyi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor bar rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-5: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarba na sv'a h'a /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-7: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-8: de bzhin du sa la reg par byas te byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:94a-9: de nas de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje las gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang pa /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-10: nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad la gnas par sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-11: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-12: nam mkha'i phyogs nas bcas la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-13: dbus kyi padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-15: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-16: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis 'og min gyi gnas su song ste /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-17: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gong bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-21: chos nyid dag kyang dran par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:94a-22: de nas theg pa chen po'i nges par 'byung ba'i chos so //
T02TD2512.1E:94a-23: de nas theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun rjes su dran par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-26: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis bsdus pa rnams su lhag par byams pa bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-27: ngan 'gro thams cad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis kun du gzir ba rnams la snying rje ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-28: 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-29: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la yang btang snyoms par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-30: chos thams cad la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94a-32: mig yor lta bur lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-0: byang chub kyi sems dang shes rab kyi pha @94b rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-1: thabs mkhas pa'i spyad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-3: rdo rje dang dril bu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-10: theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i tshul thams cad ston pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-11: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams mngon sum du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-12: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-13: bde ba dam pa grub par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-14: rnam par snang mdzad du gyur cig ces smon lam btab la /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-15: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-16: de nas rim pa 'dis mngon par byang chub ba mngon du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-17: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas la de'i steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-18: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par bsams nas 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-20: dper na til gyi gong bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-21: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-23: byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs pa gang na ba de gshegs te /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-24: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-25: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-26: ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam mam ;
T02TD2512.1E:94b-27: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-29: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-30: de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-33: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:94b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2512.1E:94b-35: rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la rtog cing mnyam par zhog la /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-0: @95a * // rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags cing gar zlos shing bsgrub pa gyis shig / aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro mi /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-1: de nas byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2512.1E:95a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so //
T02TD2512.1E:95a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-4: rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-5: de ni ji lta bur sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-6: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur pa bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:95a-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-8: aom bo dhi tsi tta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-9: zhes rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo zhes so //
T02TD2512.1E:95a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis de legs par bsgrubs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-15: sngags 'dis rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig / aom tishtha badzra /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-16: byang chub sems dpas gsol pa /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-17: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:95a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2512.1E:95a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig / aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-0: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku @95b dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-3: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-4: rdo rje'i dbyings rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong lags so //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal ba /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-8: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-9: sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis ci dgar zlos la bsgoms shig / aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-10: de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings kyis bdag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-15: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig / de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi sam bo dhi dri dha badzra ti shtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-21: spyi bo rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-23: rdo rje rin chen ma dang /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-25: rdo rje las mas brtan par bya ba'i phyir mngon par byang chub pa rdzogs par byas par gyur to //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-27: yang badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos pas /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-28: de la rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:95b-29: dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba byin no //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-31: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:95b-32: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-0: @96a * // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-2: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-6: khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-7: zhes bya ba'i rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba byin pas /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tshogs kyi ye shes bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-9: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i las dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-10: sems can gyi bya ba'i las kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-11: sna tshogs pa'i las nyid la rab tu gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-12: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas su bzhag par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-14: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad kyis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs so //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-15: de nas aom badzra dha tv'i shva ri h'um badzri ni /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-16: zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-19: spyi bo rnams su bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-21: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-22: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-23: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-24: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-25: ces bya ba 'di ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-26: de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-27: rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-28: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis sgo'i chos ston par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-29: gzhung 'di dag gis ni dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ston par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-30: de ltar dang po'i sbyor ba mngon du byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-32: h'um zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rang rang gi snying ga las phyung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-33: ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bkug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-34: bcug la bcings te dbang du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gyur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-37: chu lha'i mthar thug gi bar du rang gi gnas su h'um nyid kyis gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:96a-38: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:96a-39: de nas rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya gnyis pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-0: aom @96b badzra sa ma ya dza: dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.1E:96b-2: sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-3: de nas rdo rje bsdu ba des rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byon par byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-6: zhes brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-7: ae ma'o byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-8: kun tu bzang po spyod pa mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-9: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-10: de nas ched du brjod pa de skad du smras nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs su zhugs so //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-13: chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du phyung nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-14: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-15: chu lha'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-16: gcig tu gyur nas gnas te /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-17: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-18: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-19: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-20: rdur phran ji snyed thams cad kyi //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-21: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-22: de nas bde ba chen po yis //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-23: rdo rje'i phag rgya thams cad bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-24: h'um zlos pa la 'bad pa'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa de rnams kyis blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-25: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar gyur par bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-26: dbang bskur ba thams cad blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:96b-27: de ltar dbang bskur ba blangs nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:96b-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdo rje gzugs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-31: rdo'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bkug la bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-32: bcings la dbang du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-33: mchod yon phul te phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.1E:96b-34: rang gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-0: @97a * // 'di ni las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-1: de la rang gi las la nges par spyor pa'i rab tu sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-3: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-4: sems can gyi khams thams cad rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas la dgod par mdzod cig / h'um de bzhin du rdo rje ro'i bar du phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-5: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-6: sems can gyi khams thams cad ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas la rab tu dgod par mdzod cig / h'um de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-7: yang rdo rje bsdu ba bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-8: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-9: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-10: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-11: lan cig bar du brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-12: dpal mchog dang po sems dpa' che //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-13: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-14: mgon po khyod la dad bgyis pas //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' deng pa dag grub //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-16: ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-17: de nas sngar bshad pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-20: dbang du bya ba dag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rang rang gi gnas su nges par dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-22: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-23: rab dang dra ba byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-24: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-27: rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-29: mthe bong dang mthe chung gnyis thad kar sbyar la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-30: mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pa 'di ni rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon h'um dang bcas par phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-32: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-33: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la h'um las dang po'i rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-34: h'um dri shya zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-35: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya satva /
T02TD2512.1E:97a-38: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97a-39: de nas rang gi lce la rdo rje de bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-0: lha thams cad kyi ljags la yang @97b h'um bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-1: 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-2: de nas rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rang gi las kyi phyag rgya h'um zlos shing gar las byung ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-4: ba dan gsum brtse gsum can //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-5: bsgyings pas mtha' sogs las grol bas //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-7: de ni rdo rje gar zhes bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-9: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas g-yon pa dkur bsten nas /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-10: g-yas pas bstod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar 'dzin pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-11: rdo rje khu chur gnyis kyis mda' gsor ba dang bcas pa g-yon du 'phen pa ni rdo rje yid las byung ba'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-12: khu tshur gnyis pa de dag nyid kyis rang la 'khyud par byed pa de ni k'i li k'i la'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis po de dag nyid kyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje bdug pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-14: rdo rje khu tshur de dag nyid bkan nas lag pa gnyis rked pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-15: me tog la sogs pa nas gar gyi bar gyi las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i tshul du byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-16: rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa nas chu lha la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni bris pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyag rgya chen po gang dag yin pa de dag nyid las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul rab tu sbyar ba 'dir las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur las byung ba yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-18: g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur snying ga'i phyogs su chos gos kyi rtse mo 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-19: g-yas pa'i sor mo thams cad brkyang pas /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-20: sa la reg pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-21: 'di nyid lag pa g-yas pa rkyong pa'i tshul du bzhag pa 'di ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-22: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya las g-yon pa'i chos gos kyi rtse mo 'dzin pa'i lag pas padma'i sdong bu bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:97b-23: lag pa g-yas pa'i padma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa lta bu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:97b-24: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya las lag pa g-yas pa ba dan gsum pa ltar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-0: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni don @98a * //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-1: yod grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-3: lag pa gnyis snyems pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-4: 'degs pa'i tshul gyis 'jog pa 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-5: lag pa g-yon pa snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-6: g-yas pa ral gri 'dzin pa lta bu ni 'jam dpal gyi'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:98a-7: / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog pa lta bu ni nam mkha'i snying po'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-8: rdo rje gar bskor la dkrol te thal mo khong stong du byas nas spyi gtsug tu 'jog pa ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-9: g-yas dang g-yon gyi padma kha 'byed pa lta bur byed pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-11: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba lta bur bya ba ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-12: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis nges par 'tshir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-13: mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo mche ba ltar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-14: de nas phyag rgya chen pos thams cad rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-15: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-16: gzhan dag gis yang bris pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-17: rjes su mthun par bcing bar bya'o //
