T02TD2512.1E:98a-18: de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba la sogs pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-20: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs chu lha'i bar du yang rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-21: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-22: rdo rje ro'i mthar thug ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-23: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ni /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-24: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-25: de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-26: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-27: rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-28: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-29: rdo rje sems dpar deng 'grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:98a-30: ces bya ba'i de kho na nyid kyis yang dag par bskul la /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-31: bstod pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-32: yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod do /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-34: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:98a-35: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas badzra spha ra na khom h'um zhes 'don zhing yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-0: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bcu @98b gnyis kyis kyang legs par mchod do //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-1: de nas phyag bzhi byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-3: zhes bya bas lha thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du ye shes bdag nyid bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-4: aom sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-5: zhes bya bas gzugs rnyan dang mtshungs shing de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-7: zhes bya bas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du ye shes gcig gi rgyu mthun pa yin par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-8: lha thams cad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i rdo rje la h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bkod de /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-9: de nyid 'don cing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-10: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen pos dbang phyug che //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-11: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-12: rdo rje sems dpar bdag gyur cig / ces brjod la bsgoms te /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-13: lha thams cad kyi zhal gyi sgo nas h'um gi sgra mngon par sgrogs par mdzad par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-14: de ltar na yang thams cad kyi yang bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-15: bsgoms pas dub par gyur na /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-16: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang yang du bstod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-17: mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-18: phyag byas te 'di dag gis ni thams cad spyan drangs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-20: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-21: sgrub pa bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-22: de nas bha ra ta dang bi shi kha la mkhas pa'i sgrub pa dang rjes su sgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-23: de la h'um gi glu ni rjes su sgrub pas te /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-24: rdo rje dang dril bu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-29: rnga bo che la sogs pa'i rol mo rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-30: brdung ba'i thal mo dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-31: h'um gi glu nyid kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag par ston pa ni rjes su sgrub pas te /
T02TD2512.1E:98b-33: rang lha ji bzhin sbyor ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-34: rdo rje kun mchog lus dang ni //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-35: glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-36: rdo rje nyid kyis mnyes par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-37: rang lhar ji bzhin sbyor ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-38: rtsa ba'i dbyangs kyis rab bskul zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-39: glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-40: dril bu nyid dang glur blang ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-41: rang lhar ji bzhin sbyor ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-42: sna chogs phyag rgya'i bdag po'i mchog / glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang //
T02TD2512.1E:98b-43: dam tshig nyid kyang rjes su sgrub //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-2: sna tshogs brtson pa'i rol mo dang //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-3: rang gsang cho ga legs brjod pas //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-4: g-yas pa'i thal mo rab tu 'grub //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-5: 'di yis rtog pa thams cad la //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-6: rdo rje'i cha lugs bskul byas pa //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-7: rang gi lha yi gzhir gyur gyi //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-9: de nas rjes su sgrub pa'i lan bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-10: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-11: shin tu byang bar bslabs pa'i bud med kyi tshogs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-14: sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya mchod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyi sa kyang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-15: de la rdo rje'i gar ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-16: rdo rje'i gar gyis gar byed cing //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-17: bsgyur bcas 'dzin pa chen po dang //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-18: dkyil 'khor du ni gar byed cing //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-19: yongs su bzlog nas rab tu sbyar //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-20: de nas phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-21: shin tu gsang ba'i sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-22: rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-23: rtogs pa kun gyis rnam brgyan pas //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-24: gtam dang mtshan ma'i rgyu dag gis //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-25: gang zhig byed pa de gar yin //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-26: gser ram yang na dngul dag dang //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-27: de bzhin shing las byas pa'i gdong //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-28: rang gi gdong ngam lha rnams kyi //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-29: grub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-30: de ltar lan cig bsgrub byas nas //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-31: de yi 'og tu ci bder bya //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-32: kun za de bzhin thams cad byed //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-33: spyod pa ci dgar 'dod par byed //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-34: langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-35: 'chag gam de bzhin gnas pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-36: dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-37: gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-38: dbang po gang dang gang las gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-39: de dang de yi ngo bor bya //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-40: mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-41: rang gi lhar ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-42: de nyid sbyar ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-43: 'di dag thams cad bsgrub byas nas //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-44: thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos //
T02TD2512.1E:99a-46: zhes gsungs pas gal te shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba bsgoms pas dub par gyur cing mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor bas gnas par 'dod na /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-47: de'i tshe phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas su gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-48: dang po'i rdo rjes bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la gnas par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:99a-49: bya ba thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-0: @99b dang po'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-1: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-2: bcom ldan 'das rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-3: phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-4: dbus su 'dug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-5: phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-6: gnyis kyis kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-7: de nas phyag byas te de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-8: gal te phyag rgya lhod par gyur tam /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-9: rang nyid gtong bar 'dod na de'i tshe yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-10: gang gi tshe gnas skabs dang po nyid dam /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-11: gnas skabs gnyis par lha gshegs su gsol bar 'dod par gyur na /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-12: de'i tshe mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod cing mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-13: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-14: phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-15: rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas rjes su phyag bya ba'i sbyor bas kyang phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-16: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongs su bsdos la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-17: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya de gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-18: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dgrol bas badzra mu: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-19: de nas snying gnas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-20: mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba 'ching ba'i tshul du bcing zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-21: de bzhin du go cha bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-22: de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-23: sarba mu dra mee tri ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam zhes bya ba ni go cha bcing ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-24: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-27: mthe bong gnyis dang rtse sbyar ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-28: de nas mnyam pa'i thal mo brdabs pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:99b-30: thog mthar rab dga'i ngo bo brtan //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-32: sems dpa' chen po brtan mdzod la //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-33: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-35: me tog gi thal mo gyen du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:99b-36: h'um mu: yang zhes brjod nas des ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:100a-0: ji ltar mngon par sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor @100a * //
T02TD2512.1E:100a-1: gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo yang yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' lan gsum bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-5: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-6: langs te mchod rten gyi las dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-7: glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa'i dge pa'i bya ba la sbyor ba ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100a-8: de ltar nyin re zhing byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-9: ji srid zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-12: dus ji srid du nyin re'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-13: rnal 'byor chen pos ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-14: rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-18: dus ji srid kyis rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100a-19: gang zhig sgom par byed par mi nus pa des ni rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-20: sngags thams cad kyi bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2512.1E:100a-21: de la rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-22: bdag bsrung ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nas /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-23: dam tshig sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-24: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po bcings la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la yid kyis zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-25: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dang mnyam pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-27: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-28: rang gi mgo la me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-29: rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100a-30: de nas dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-31: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su hri las sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-32: dkyil 'khor de rang gi lus la chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu gyur pa'i rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:100a-33: rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i dbyibs la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-0: h'um zlos @100b shing 'dug pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhi'i lus la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-1: phyi rol du nam mkha'i phyogs su h'um aa zhes bya bas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po sna tshogs padma'i steng du bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-2: h'um badzro hom zhes bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-3: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-4: de bzhin du rang gi lus la ji srid rdo rje'i ro'i gnas su rdo rje ro'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-5: h'um zlos shing 'dug pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhi'i lus las phyi rol du nam mkha'i phyogs la h'um aa zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-6: rdo rje ro'i rdo rje'i snod sna tshogs padma'i steng du bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-7: h'um badzra sa ra bhanytsa nam aa ham zhes bsgom par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-8: ro rdo rje'i snod de ro rdo rje ni bdag po zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-9: de bzhin du lha thams cad kyi gzugs mdun du sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-10: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-14: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la h'um dri shya zhes bya bas thams cad blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-15: de nas sngar bshad pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-16: h'um gi rang rang gi gnas su thams cad bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-17: yang dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-18: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes lan gsum brjod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-19: sa ma ya satvam zhes bya bas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-21: aa ham h'um zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-22: lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-23: lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-24: bdag nyid rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid yin par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-25: de nas lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-26: snga ma bzhin du lha thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-27: phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-28: de nas lha thams cad kyi sku dang gzhi'i lus la yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-29: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-30: de nas gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-31: sngags pa'i snying ga'i zla pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-33: rdo rje yid las byung ba bsam par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-34: dpral bar k'i li k'i la dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-36: lkog ma'i phyogs su 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2512.1E:100b-38: spyi bor rdo rje snyems pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:100b-39: mgo bo la rdo rje dpyid ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-0: @101a * // mdoms kyi gsang bar rdo rje sprin no //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-1: mig gnyis su rdo rje ston ka'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-2: nu ma dang brang dang snying ga rnams su rdo rje dgun no //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yon logs su ni rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-4: sngags pa'i so'i phreng ba gnyis la ni rdo rje bzhad pa mo'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-5: rdo rje chos kyi g-yon logs su ni rdo rje glu mkhan ma'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-6: rdo rje snyems pa'i g-yon logs su ni /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-8: sngags pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched la ni rdo rje'i gzugs so //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-9: sgra'i skye mched la ni rdo rje sgra'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-10: dri'i skye mched la ni rdo rje dri'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-11: ro'i skye mched la ni rdo rje ro dgod par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-12: ye shes kyi nang du ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-13: phrag pa gnyis ni nam mkha'i mdzod do //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-14: lte ba la ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-15: rked pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-16: khar ni rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thams cad du khyab pa yin pas de rnams kyi gnas nges pa yod par mi 'dod do //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-18: phyag rgya dgrol ba'i dus su yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug gi gnas su dgrol ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-19: mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-20: rin chen 'byung ldan ni k'i li k'i la'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-21: 'od dpag tu med pa ni rdo rje sdug pa'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-22: don yod grub pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'i gnas su dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-23: de nas de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-26: spyi bo rnams su byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-27: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-28: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:101a-29: go cha mchog gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-30: de nas de bzhin du dngos grub dang /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-31: brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-32: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-33: mchod pa de rnams rang gi gnas su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-34: rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i rab tu 'dud pa dang ldan pas kyang /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-35: phyag byas la phyag rgya chen por bsgoms te /
T02TD2512.1E:101a-36: de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-37: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2512.1E:101a-38: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-0: kun du bzang po kun bdag @101b nyid ;
T02TD2512.1E:101b-1: / rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu nyid do zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-2: yi ge h'um ni rdo rje'i sa bon no //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-3: aa las dril bu rdo rje snyems mar bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:101b-4: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-5: bcom ldan 'das mchog de nyid ni //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-6: srid pa'i bdag po kun gyi mchog / dam pa'i dbang phyug dam chos mchog / bde gshegs bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-7: srid pa rang bzhin dag pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-8: do bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-9: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-10: srid pa mchog tu byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-11: dril bu 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid de //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa byed pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:101b-13: lha rnams bsgrub pa na dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:101b-14: des ni chos thams cad khong du chud pa la 'jug pas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed cing /
T02TD2512.1E:101b-15: rdo rje thams cad dbab par bya ba rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:101b-17: bsgrub par bya ba rab tu grub par byed pa'i chos so //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-18: de nas dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-20: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-21: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-22: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-24: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-25: ci 'dod par ni bsten nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-26: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-27: bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa bya //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-32: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pa //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-33: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-34: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-36: de la 'di skad ces kyang bshad de /
T02TD2512.1E:101b-37: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-38: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-39: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-40: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-41: gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-42: bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed cing //
T02TD2512.1E:101b-43: rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-0: @102a * // kun du 'gro ba'i don byed do //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-2: don 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa'i h'um yang bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-4: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-5: mchod pa dang dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-6: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-7: thog ma tham med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-9: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-11: mi 'gyur dam par bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-12: khyod ni nyes bral dam pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-13: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su mnyes //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-14: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-15: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-16: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-17: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-18: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-19: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-20: dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-21: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
T02TD2512.1E:102a-22: rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag / de nas snga ma bzhin du badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags gsum brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-23: de bzhin du nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi snying gar zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-24: dang po'i rdo rje las sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa'i tshad tsam gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-25: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen por bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-27: yid kyis de'i dbus su gnas la /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-28: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-29: chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor bas h'um nyid kyis bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-30: badzra a'atma ko& ham la sogs pa sngags gsum brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-31: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid dang po'i rdo rjer byin gyis rlob pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-32: lha thams cad kyi thugs ka na yod pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bkod de /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-33: de bzhin du thams cad du bdag yin no zhes bsgom zhing zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-36: dus ji srid kyis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:102a-37: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-0: @102b sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-1: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-4: lo re zhing rnal 'byor chen po nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-5: de la dad po lo kho nar yo byad thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pas /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-6: mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-7: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la bdag dang slob ma zhi bar byed pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-8: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis sems can gdug pa rnams bskrad la /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-10: yang de nyid kyi sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-11: chu dang thal ba rnams kyis gtor la /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-12: sa'i phyogs der khru gang tsam mam /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-14: bzlog la skra dang rus pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-17: thal ba la sogs pa bsal te /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-18: dag cing dri zhim pa'i sas bkang la /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-19: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus spong zhing 'thas par bcag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-20: shin tu mnyam pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-21: rta babs bzhi sa mdzes par byas ba /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-22: sgo bzhi'i sgo glegs bzang pos bskor ba'i gnas su slob ma shin tu mkhas pas shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags yongs su bzlas pa'i ba'i rnam pa lngas legs par byung cing /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-24: de nyid yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-25: de nyid lan bdun bzlas pa'i rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-27: sman thams cad sa'i dbus su gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-28: sa yongs su sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-29: de las yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu 'thas par bcags zin pa'i gnas su rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-30: yungs kar dang chu dang thal ba rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas pas mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-31: de nas yang slob ma shin tu mkhas pas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags bzlas pa'i ba'i rnam lngas legs par byug cing /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-32: spos chus kyang sa phyogs de bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:102b-33: de nas kyang rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-34: 'bru dang sman thams cad la bzlas brjod lan bdun byas pa'i sa'i cha de'i dbus su gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:102b-35: 'di yang 'dir sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-0: de nas yang 'dir slob ma shin tu mkhas pas @103a * //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-1: sa'i shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-2: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa'i dris nye bar byug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-3: de nas lugs ma'am 'bur du brkos pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-4: ris su bris pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-6: rigs pa'i tshogs rnams kyis brgyan cing tha mar tshon gyi ra ba nye bar mdzes par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-7: rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-8: bla re mchog dril bu btags pa bre ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-20: mtshams bzhir spos khang gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-22: glu dang gar rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-23: sa la lag pa bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-24: h'um dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-25: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-26: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-27: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-28: dang po'i rdo rjes dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-29: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang gzhal yas khad dang gdan rnams bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-30: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-31: 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-32: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-33: bdag gis gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-34: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-35: gyur pa bdag ni som nyi med //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-36: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-37: mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-39: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-40: ded bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-41: bdag gis mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-42: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-43: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-44: de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la bdug spos phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:103a-45: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-46: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-47: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-48: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-49: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-50: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2512.1E:103a-51: dngos grub 'dir ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-0: @103b yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-3: las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-4: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-5: h'um zlos pa la brtson zhing phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-7: bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba gdab par gyur par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-8: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-9: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-10: snying po 'di yi rtag pa nyid //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-11: bde chen myur du grub par mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-12: ces bya bas gsol ba gdab par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-13: de nas de las langs te /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-16: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-18: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-19: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-20: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-21: bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-22: h'um zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-23: mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-24: slob dpon rang gi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-25: rdo rje dril bu 'chang bya zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-26: 'khor lo'i cho ga thams cad bya //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-27: rtog pa kun la mnyam 'jug pas //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-28: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-29: dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-30: rgya 'di gsang sngags sgrub byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-31: dngos grub kun gyi cho ga la //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-32: rdo rje dril bus rab bskul bas //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-33: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang //
T02TD2512.1E:103b-35: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-36: dang po'i rdo rjes h'um badzra auttishtha ma h'a mandala autp'a da y'a zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-37: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-38: bdag nyid dang po'i rdo rje de nyid du h'um gis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-39: yang phyag rgya chen por bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-40: badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod de /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-41: de bzhin du langs la phyag rgya la gnas pas thams cad du bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:103b-42: snyems pas h'um 'don cing song la rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-0: nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa dang mnyam par @104a * //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-1: gnas pa'i sa'i cha rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-2: rdo rje'i lta bas kyang g-yon pas bgegs bsal te /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-4: nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-5: rab dang dra ba dag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-6: de nas sgo 'byed pa'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-7: rdo rje rgyu'i ngo bo zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-8: phyag bzhi pa'i gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-9: sngags 'di dang ldan pas dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe bo dang mdzub mo rdo rjer bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs par byed pa rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-12: aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul du mgal me bskor ba ltar bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-14: de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu la mtha' yas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-17: gsus po che zhes bya ba rim pa bzhin du steng gi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-19: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-21: rta mgrin lta bu la 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-24: me tog gi phreng ba dmar pos bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-28: zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-29: de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-30: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te ;
T02TD2512.1E:104a-31: rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-32: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la bsrung ba byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-33: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-34: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba rnams yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-35: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-36: de nas spos chu las rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-37: de nyid 'don cing spos chu des dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi byug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104a-38: de nas lha thams cad kyi gnas su dri'i dkyil 'khor byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:104a-40: h'um lan bdun de dag la bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-0: de rnams su @104b dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nam mkha'i phyogs las phab ste /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-1: h'um nyid kyis bcug la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod do //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-2: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-3: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-5: rin po che la sogs pa dag yang dag par ldan par byas nas chu cung zad bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-7: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mchod yon bum pa'i steng du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-9: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-10: me tog gi yal ga las re re zhing yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-11: me tog bcug la bdug pas bdugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-12: de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-14: de la dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-15: de ltar bum pa'i bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-18: sangs rgyas spyan gyis mar la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg re re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-19: 'di ni lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-21: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-22: mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa legs par mchod la snga ma bzhin du phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-24: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-25: de la dang por re zhig lag na me tog thogs pas /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-26: slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-27: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-28: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-29: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-30: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-31: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-32: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-33: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-34: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-35: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-36: thar pa chen po grong mchog tu //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-37: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid //
T02TD2512.1E:104b-38: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-39: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:104b-40: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:105a-2: badzra siddhyi ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba'i snying pos rang gi snying gar rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-3: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:105a-4: rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-5: shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-6: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-7: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-8: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-9: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-10: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-11: spyan sngar da ltar ma lus so sor bshags //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-12: bde gshegs rnams kyi cho gas gnyis ma lus dang //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-13: sras rnams kyi ni zab cing mtha' med pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-14: 'gro ba ma lus don rnams bsgrub mdzad dang //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-15: de las gzhan la'ang bdag ni yi rang ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-16: thugs rjes gdung bas thugs dang ldan 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-17: blo gros sdig med gti mug tshogs kun bcom//
T02TD2512.1E:105a-18: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-19: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-20: rab mchog blo yis kun dga' ra ba ste //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-21: dman pa 'jig par byed pas 'khor lo'i tshul //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-22: srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-23: gsung mchog chos kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-24: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug 'joms shing //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-25: blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje chen po yid //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-26: brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs gsol zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-27: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-28: rgyu yi rjes thogs bdag po'i yul nyid las //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-29: 'bras bu'i nus pas dgra yi tshogs las rgyal //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-30: so sor rigs dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-31: byang chub yang dag rig pa bdag gis bzung //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-32: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin phyir dang //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-33: bskyab pa'i phyir ram yang na bdag gi sems //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-34: yang dag nyid du dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-35: thams cad rtsva bzhin ltos pa med par sbyin //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-36: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-37: bsam gtan dang ni shes rab bla med pa //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-38: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya phyir 'di //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-39: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:105a-40: bde gshegs sngags la rgya cher mkhas pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-0: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun @105b gyis grub ba ni //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-1: 'gro 'di rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-2: 'di na mkha' bzhin du ni gnas par bgyid //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-4: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pa 'dis /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-5: bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-6: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-7: bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-8: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang sems can 'ga' yang mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-9: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-10: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-12: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang dag par rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-13: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas pa so sor rtogs pa'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-16: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-18: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa la mngon par gnas shing /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-20: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje lta bur byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste /
T02TD2512.1E:105b-24: 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:105b-25: de ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di gnas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-0: bde ba mtha' yas pa la gnas pa'i kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs pa la gdul bya'i skye bo'i tshogs ma lus pa la @106a * //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-1: bde ba'i dbang phyug gi bar du dbye ba mang po yang dag par bstan pas smin par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-2: rab tu dga' ba'i gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-3: de nas dpal chen mos slob ma'i lag tu dri sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-4: rab tu dga' bas me tog / rab tu dga' bas bdug spos ;
T02TD2512.1E:106a-5: spyan gyis mar me sbyin zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-6: badzra ha sa ha zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas shing /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-7: phyag rgya mchog gis bsrung ba byas pa'i aa shvattha las byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-8: dris bsgos shing me tog gis bcings pa'i so shing dang /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-9: badzra tishtha zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i ku sha gsar pa slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-10: de nas dpung pa g-yon par mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa'i srung skud la /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-11: aom badzra raksha ham zhes bya ba 'di bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-12: bdag nyid kyis yang dag par bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-13: de nas aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-14: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i byams pa'i go chas go bskon par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-15: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-17: mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-18: bdag gam gzhan la go bskon na //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-19: rtag pa yi ni bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-20: aom badzra sa tva aushn'i sha h'um phat /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-21: zhes bya ba slob ma'i spyi gtsug tu dgod do //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-22: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad de /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la ;
T02TD2512.1E:106a-24: / mthe bong snyim par bcug nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-25: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkab pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-26: sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes byar grags //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-27: de nas slob ma rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag gis shig / nang par thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-30: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-31: de nas mchod pa byas la bdug spos phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:106a-32: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa nye bar snyan gsan dbab pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-34: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-35: bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-36: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-37: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-39: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-40: de bas gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD2512.1E:106a-41: sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dgra @106b bcom dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-1: gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-2: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-3: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-4: gang du lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-5: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-6: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi ;
T02TD2512.1E:106b-8: / sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-9: 'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-10: cho ga bzhin du bri lags na //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-11: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-12: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-13: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-14: byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-15: zhes lan gsum brjod de lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-17: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-18: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-19: slob ma rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-20: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i mtha' logs su nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-21: de nas skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-22: khrus bya ba sngon du 'gro bas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-23: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-24: de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bskyed nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:106b-25: dang po kho nas srad bu tshon dmar po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-29: dkar po'i dri zhim pas so sor btso bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-30: de nas rim pa 'di nyid kyis bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-31: hr'i: aa h'um tr'am aom zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams las /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-36: rnam par snang mdzad rnams srad bu la rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pas /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-38: rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi srad bu rang rang gi thugs ka las yang dag par gtor bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:106b-39: de nas de rnams 'bar ba'i lta ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-40: lcags kyus dza hi zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:106b-43: rang gi lag pa gnyis su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-0: rang gi lag par bzhag pa de rnams kyis phyi rol gyi srad bu @107a * //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-1: la kun du bkang la bsgril bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-2: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a spha ra spha ra aa nu phra bishta sarba dharm'a /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-3: aa tyan ta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-5: de nas dri bzang pos byug pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag la me tog gis gtor te /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-7: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a tikra ma h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-8: zhes bya ba rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-9: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis dri zhim pos byugs la me tog gi sil ma gtor te /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-11: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-12: glu dang rol mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-13: mig g-yas g-yon du dza gnyis las nyi ma dang zla ba kha dog ser po bskyed de yid la h'um zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-14: rnam par snang mdzad du bsgyur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-16: rang gi snying ga las sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs su drangs la phyung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-17: h'um zhes zlos shing yang rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-19: yungs kar dang ldan pa'i tshon dkar po dang lhan cig bsgos te /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-20: srad bu de dang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-21: phyi nas ci bder bya ba dang //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-22: rim pa 'dis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-23: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-24: yi ge dzas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu gtad la phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-25: slob dpon nub tu gnas nas shar du bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-26: yang lho phyogs su gnas nas byang phyogs su bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-27: de nas shar lho mtshams su gnas nas byang phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:107a-28: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-29: de nas nub byang mtshams su gnas nas lho phyogs su kha bltas te nub phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-30: de bzhin du gnas nas kha shar du bltas te byang phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-31: yang shar lho'i mtshams kyi cha la 'dug nas nub phyogs su bltas te lho phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107a-32: de bzhin du khyams kyi thig dang /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-0: @107b lha'i snam bu'i thig kyang gdab par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-1: thams cad du slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog ni bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'gro bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-2: de nas shar lho mtshams su gnas nas nub byang mtshams kyi bar du srad bu brkyang ste thig gdab pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-3: yang lho nub kyi mtshams su 'dug la byang shar gyi mtshams su srad bu brkyang ste thig gdab par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-4: de nas sgo dang sgo khyud gdab ste /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-5: de la thig gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-6: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-8: dza: dza: dza: zhes bya ba dza: gsum dang /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-9: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis srad bu drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-10: de la sgo thams cad sgo khyud ni brgyad char bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-11: sgo 'gram dang kha khyer dang lha'i snam bu ni sgo phyed kyi tshad do //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-12: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyar gyi phyed kyi tshad do //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-13: rta babs kyi tshad ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad ni nang gi dkyil 'khor te zur bzhi pa /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-17: rta babs med par legs par thig btab la /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-19: steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bur bya ste h'um las bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-20: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-22: ces bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-24: de la btags pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-25: de la dkyil 'khor brgyad cha 'dra ba'i ka ba brgyad nyid kyi thig cha mnyam par thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-26: shar phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni lho phyogs kyi char 'dug la byang du bltas te thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-27: nub phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni byang phyogs kyi char gnas la lho'i phyogs su bltas te gdab po //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-28: byang phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni nub phyogs su 'dug la shar du kha bltas te gdab po //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-29: lho phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni shar phyogs kyi char 'dug la nub tu bltas te gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-30: da ni lung las gsungs pa'i thig gdab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:107b-31: de nas thig ni gdab bya ba //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-32: srad bu nyis 'gyur dag gis te //
T02TD2512.1E:107b-33: nam mkha' thams cad tshad gyur pas //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-2: bzang po sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-3: phyogs rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-4: shar dang nub dang byang dang lho //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-5: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-6: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa /
T02TD2512.1E:108a-7: khyams rnams kyis ni legs par bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-8: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-10: dkyil 'khor kun gyi grva rnams dang //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-11: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-12: zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-13: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-14: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi ste //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-15: dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-16: bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-17: ting 'dzin kha khyer shes par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-18: kha khyer la brtan rdo rje'i bdag / gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-19: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-20: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-21: gdul byas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-22: me long ye shes rtag med rtog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-23: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-24: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-25: bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-27: de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-28: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-29: rdo rje'i thig ni yongs btab pas //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-30: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar grags //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-31: byang chub sems ni theg pa che //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-32: rdo rje thig ni rab bskor bas //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-33: rdo rje thig ni yongs btab la //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-34: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-35: yang dag bris te kun gyi mchog / thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin grong //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-36: thog ma med cing mchog nyid pas //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-37: phyogs rnams thams cad mnyam pa yin //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-41: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:108a-43: bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2512.1E:108a-44: ces brjod la dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i phur bu phyung la /
T02TD2512.1E:108a-45: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna ldas phur bu'i bu ga bkang ste mnyam por bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-46: de nas mig gnyis su hi las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:108a-47: khro bo'i lta bas kyang kun du bltas te sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108a-48: de nas tshon sbyang ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:108a-49: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'u /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-0: zhes bya bas phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas tshon thams cad la lan @108b bdun bzlas na /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-1: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-2: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-3: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-4: mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-5: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-6: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-7: hi zhes bya ba'i mthar khro bo ti rinti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-8: de la tshon rtsi dkar po la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i phra rab rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-10: ser po la ni ser po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-11: sngon po la ni sngon po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-12: ljang gu la ni ljang gu'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-13: dmar po la ni dmar po bcug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-14: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas mngon par sbyang ba'i dus su yang dang po'i rdo rje thog mar tshon dgye ba brtsam par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-15: tshon thams cad dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-16: bskor phyogs su h'um zlos shing dgye la de'i 'og tu ji ltar dga' ba'i tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-17: de la tshon dgye ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-22: dkar po ni thams cad kyi nang rol du'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-23: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma'i gdan la /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-24: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan nyid sngar bshad pa lta bu'i lugs ma la sogs pa'i sku gzugs bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-25: h'um gis kyang bar snang gi phyogs su spyan drangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-26: gzugs dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-27: de bzhin du thams cad la yang shes par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-28: gang gi phyir lha thams cad kyi yang dgod pa'i snying po ni h'um 'di nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-29: de la de'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba sku mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod phan can g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-31: me tog can gyi gzhu bsnams pa //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-32: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u can gyi mda' gsor ba la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-33: de'i g-yas logs su rdo rje k'i la k'i la sku mdog rdo rje yid las byung ba dang mthun pa /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-34: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang gi thugs ka'i phyogs su dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa mdog dmar po bsnams nas 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:108b-35: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa sku mdog sngo skya /
T02TD2512.1E:108b-36: phyag g-yas na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-1: g-yon gyis gdan la snyems pa dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-2: de'i g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-4: dku gnyis su snyems pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-5: dbu g-yon du cung zad 'dud pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-6: nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams su rab tu dga' ba sku mdog rdo rje yid las byung ba dang mthun pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-7: lho nub mtshams su rab tu dga' ma sku mdog k'i li k'i la dang mthun pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-8: nub byang mtshams su rdo rje spyan sku mdog rdo rje dran pa dang mthun pa'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:109a-9: / byang shar mtshams su dpal chen mo sku mdog rdo rje snyems pa dang mthun pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-10: de dag kyang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du me tog gi za ma tog dang /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-13: dri'i dung chos rang gi spyi bo'i phyogs su thal mo kha 'byed pas 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-14: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi nang du shar phyogs su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-15: de'i g-yas logs su phyag na rdo rje /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-16: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams shing /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-17: g-yon snyems pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-18: g-yon du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nam mkha'i mdog can gzhon nu'i sku'i cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-19: 'dzum pa dang bcas pa phyag bzhi na ral gri bzhi dang /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-21: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan beed'urya sngo bsangs lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-22: rdo rje rin po che mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gis bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-23: de'i g-yas logs su byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po sku mdog margad lta bu rang gi mgo la dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang nyid 'ching ba zhal rnam par bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109a-24: g-yon logs su nam mkha'i mdzod sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag na sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-25: sna tshogs dril bu bsnams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:109a-26: rdo rje snyems pa bsgyings nas bzhugs pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-0: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang gi nub phyogs su 'od dpag tu med pa gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can padma bsnams pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas @109b chos ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-1: de'i g-yas logs su 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-2: g-yon pa snyems pa dang bcas pas padma'i sdong bu bzung nas /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-3: phyag g-yas pas rang gi thugs kar 'byed par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-4: g-yon logs su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-5: gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yon pas gdan la brten pa /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-6: phyag g-yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mor rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rang gi thugs ka'i phyogs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-7: zhal rnam par bzhad pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-8: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang gi byang phyogs su don yod par grub pa sku mdog sna tshogs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-9: de'i g-yas logs su rdo rje khu tshur gser gyi mdog can dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-10: rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-11: g-yon logs su rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog sngon po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pa'i 'od mda' ba /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-13: ha ha zhes gsal bar bzhad pa'i zhal gyis kun du bzhugs shing /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha bsnams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-15: zhal gyi grva gnyis su 'jog pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-16: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-17: shar lho'i mtshams kyi phyogs su rdo rje sgeg mo //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-18: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-19: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-20: gnyi ga snyems par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-21: dbu g-yon du 'dud pas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-22: lho nub mtshams su rdo rje bzhad pa rdo rje k'i li k'i la dang mdog 'dra ba phyag g-yas na so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis bsnams nas bzhad pa'i tshul du mdzad cing /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-23: g-yon gyis gdan la brten te bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-24: nub byang du rdo rje glu chen mo sku mdog rdo rje dran pa dang mthun pa rdo rje pi wang brdung bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:109b-25: byang shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje gar sku mdog rdo rje snyems ma dang mthun pa /
T02TD2512.1E:109b-26: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te gar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-0: nang dang phyi rol du bcas pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje gzugs sku @110a * //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-1: mdog rdo rje yid las byung ba dang mthun pa phyag na me long bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-2: lho phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje sgra sku mdog rdo rje k'i li k'i la dang mthun pa'i pi wang brdung ba la brtson par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-3: nub phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje dri sku mdog rdo rje dran pa dang mthun pa phyag na dri'i dung chos bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-4: byang phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje ro sku mdog rdo rje snyems pa dang mthun pa phyag na ro'i snod bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-5: de'i phyir 'di dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa nyid yin par 'dod de /
T02TD2512.1E:110a-9: ro'i snod rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-10: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan no zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-11: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams kyi nang du 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug rnams sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du chung ma dang bcas par 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-12: de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje gzugs kyi bar du ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' ni shar phyogs su gzigs nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-15: lhag ma rnams ni rang gi bdag po la gzigs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-16: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:110a-17: phyi dro'i dus su mtshams la bab pa na dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:110a-18: khro bo ti rinti ri bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:110a-19: badzra dang h'um bzhi zlos shing dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-20: de nas bskor ba lan bdun byas la lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje dril bu dkrol la dkyil 'khor la blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-21: de nas me tog gi phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul la gar bya ba'i tshul gyis blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:110a-22: phreng bas dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rang gi mgo la bcings nas sgo dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110a-23: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-0: su ra ta badzro h'um zhes bya ba la @110b sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-1: gzhan yang rang gi ming brjod cing /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-3: h'um a'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rang gi rdo rje'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-5: de nas h'um badzro ham zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-6: h'um badzra sa tva ham zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-7: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-8: de bzhin du rdo rje ro'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-9: h'um a'a zhes bya bas rdo rje ro'i gnas su /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-10: rdo rje ro'i snod bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-11: de nas h'um badzra ra sa bhanydza no ham /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-12: zhes bya bas phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-13: h'um badzra ra so ham zhes bya bas phyag rgya'i gzugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-14: rdo rje ro'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-15: de nas rdo rje bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-16: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa de bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-17: rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-18: yongs su brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor der gsang ba'i lcags kyus bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-19: de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-22: de bzhin du mchod yon phul nas dang po'i rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-23: de nas de bzhin du lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-24: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyis las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-25: phyag rgya chen pos nye bar bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-26: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis de rnams dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:110b-28: bum pa gang ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-29: dril bu'i mchog btags rgyal mtshan dag / grva rnams su ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-30: phyi yi mtshams kyi gnas su ni //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-31: bum pa yal gar bcas pas mdzes //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-32: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yang //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-33: bum pa spos chus gang ba gzhag / gang zhig rdo rjer bcas pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:110b-34: nags kyi lcug mas bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-2: rtsa ba nag po ra ri med pa lto ba che ba /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-9: padma r'a ga ste rin po che thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-14: aa pa ra dzi ta dkar po ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:111a-22: tsandan dkar po dang ldan pa'i chu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-24: dri shin tu zhim pa rnams kyis yongs su bkang la /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-25: phyi rol kun du dri zhim pos byugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-26: me tog gi phreng ba btags la /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-27: rang gi lha'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-28: mgul par ras gtsang ma bzang pos dkris pa /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-29: 'bras bu dang lo ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i yal gas kha brgyan pa dang po'i rdo rjes yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug ma la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas shing /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-30: h'um yang bzlas la phyi rol kun du lha re re zhing dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-31: de la dang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du gcig dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-32: yang bum pa gcig 'jug pa'i sgor mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-33: de ltar bum pa phul nas bum pa gang ba yang so sor dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-34: de ltar 'byor par ma gyur na //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-35: bcom ldan 'das la bum pa gcig / lhag ma rnams la bum pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-36: bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-37: bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-38: de ltar bum pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-39: bum pa gang ba yang phul nas /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-43: lha re re zhing rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-48: ba dan sna tshogs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-50: bzhi 'am me tog thams cad kyang sngar bshad pa'i me tog gi rig sngags kyis dbul ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-51: dri thams cad kyang dri'i rig sngags kyis dbul ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111a-55: tsandan la sogs pa'i bdug pa rnams ni bdug pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:111a-56: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa ni aa k'a ro la sogs pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-0: @111b mar gyi mar me la sogs pa ni mar me'i rig sngags mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-1: badzra spha ra na kham zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-2: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-3: ma 'byor na yang bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-4: mar me sdong bu dang bcas pa'i snod chen po stong gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-5: tha na snod chen po bzhi mar me'i rig sngags nyid bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-7: rol mo'i sil snyan bcu h'um gis rol mo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bzlas la dbul te /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-8: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo brdung ba lta bu rnam pa bcu po 'di lta ste /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-18: ti mi la brdung ba'i rked nyag tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-19: phyi rol du gar la sogs pa yang h'um nyid kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-20: dar dpyangs 'phyang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-21: me tog gi chun po dang ;
T02TD2512.1E:111b-22: rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-23: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas sbras pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-24: zla ba phyed pa dang bcas pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-25: rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-26: ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-27: rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu dang bcas pa yang dbul bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:111b-28: / de nas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-29: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-30: aom gyis rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-32: kha zas ro brgya pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-34: gar la sogs pa'i sprin rnams sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-35: dpral ba'i phyogs su thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-36: aom sarba bid p'u ra p'u ra /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-37: a'a brta ya a'a brta ya ho //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-38: zhes bya bas de rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-39: de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpan na tv'a ta /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-40: zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-41: 'di nyid brjod cing phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:111b-42: de nas rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-44: rdo rje spyan ma la sogs pas sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:111b-45: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis thab kyi dbus su me tog gis bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-1: la sogs pa'i rdzas las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-2: de nas rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-3: rdo rje ro'i bar las yang h'um zlos shing re re la sbyin sreg bdun bdun dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-4: de nas phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-5: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-7: byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-8: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs nas rang gi snying gar legs par bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-9: h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-10: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-11: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-12: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-13: de nas sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-14: ras dmar po zung gyon zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-15: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-16: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la ji skad du bshad pa'i gar las byung ba'i rdo rje thal mo bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-17: de dang me tog blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-18: de'i snying ga'i phyogs su bskor nas bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-19: badzra badzra h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-21: shar phyogs kyi sgor badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod la rdo rje lcags kyus bdag nyid dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-22: yang lho phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin du 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-23: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa las zhags par byas pas bdag nyid gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-25: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor de bzhin du bdag nyid zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-26: badzra spho ta bom zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-27: rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings te bdag nyid bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-28: yang byang phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-30: zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-31: yang shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-32: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha su to sho su su sho badzra sa tva a'adya siddhy'a m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-34: rdo rje gar las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-36: zhugs nas mgon la phyag byas te //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-37: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mig dang ni //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-38: g-yon snyems 'dzum pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-39: rol pa'i mig ni btsum par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:112a-41: aom par ma su kha aa sha ya /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-42: su la li ta bi la se na mi te /
T02TD2512.1E:112a-43: na ma m'i bha ga b'ana tam /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-0: dza: h'um bam ho: @112b hi hi hi hi h'i /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-1: pra t'itstsha ku su ma aanydza li n'a tha ho //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-2: zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i rig sngags so //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-3: yang zhugs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-4: dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-5: de nas yang mdun du 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-6: de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-7: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che ;
T02TD2512.1E:112b-8: / rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-9: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag 'grub //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-11: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhye m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-12: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-13: aas bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-14: aa yang g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems ma phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-15: bdag nyid dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-16: aom a'a zhes bya ba brgya bzlas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bdag nyid kun du gang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-17: de nas h'um gis me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-19: rang gi mgo la de nyid kyang bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-20: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-21: de nyid zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-22: rdo rje gzugs kyi bar gyi dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-23: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhugs pa'i phyag rgya snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-25: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-26: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi mthong ba gnang nas /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-27: dngos grub thams cad stsal pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-28: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-29: shis pa brjod pa'i tshul gyis bdag gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-30: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pas bstod pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-31: 'dod chags rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-32: glu dang rol mo la sogs pas kyang mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-33: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-34: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-35: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:112b-37: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:112b-38: de la dang po kho nar dang po'i rdo rjes bzung ba'i me tog gi yal ga la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las sngags 'di bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-1: ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha sa ma yo da ka siddhyi /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-2: aa bhi shinytsa sarba su kha so ma na sya ni aa dad ku ru ku ru dza: h'um bam ho: aa /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-3: de nas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-4: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rang gi lus la rnal 'byor chen pos bshad pa'i gnas rnams su lha thams cad dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-5: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du phyag rgya chen pos 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-6: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-7: mchod yon blangs nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs rang gi mgo la bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-8: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-9: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-10: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-12: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-13: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva dza: h'um bam ho: su ra ta stvam zhes bya bas thog ma'i rdo rje rang gi mgo la bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-14: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-15: de nas sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba thams cad yang dag par blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-19: byas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i cod pan rdo rje rin chen gyi sngags dang phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags bzlas pas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-20: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-21: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis rdo rje'i dbang blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-22: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-23: phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-24: de nas de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-25: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-26: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-27: h'um zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la gsang sngags bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-29: tshigs su bcad pa lnga bas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-31: lung bstan pa yang blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-32: bdag la byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113a-33: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das rab tu bsgrubs la phyir 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:113a-34: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-0: // / @113b de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho ga nyid kyis slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-1: slob dpon gyis lnga po bsdus pa 'di nyid bcings la slar yang zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-2: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyong nas /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-3: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-4: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
