T02TD2512.1E:113b-5: khyod sdon khyim la dga' ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-6: sred pa'i bde ba dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-7: 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub ces //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-11: de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-13: dge slong gi bslab pa yongs su bzung bas /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-14: sdom pa bzung la de slob dpon la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-15: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-16: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pas //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-18: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-19: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-20: sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-21: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa'i ras dmar po bzang po gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-22: gcig gis stod g-yogs byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-23: yang rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-25: gdong g-yogs la yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-26: des slob ma'i gdong g-yogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-27: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-28: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-29: yang lag na me tog thogs pas slob dpon la phyag byas la lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-30: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-32: gsol ba gdab pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-33: slob mas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:113b-34: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-35: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-36: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-37: slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la ;
T02TD2512.1E:113b-38: / sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-39: mi ldog pa yi 'khor los sbyor //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-40: thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-41: gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-42: gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-43: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:113b-44: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-2: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-3: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-4: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-5: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-6: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-7: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-8: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-9: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-10: de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:114a-11: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-12: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-13: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-15: de nas yang slob dpon gyis yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:114a-16: bdag nyid chen po khyod gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa shin tu sbas pa yongs su 'dzin par 'dod dam zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-17: des kyang bdag 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-18: de nas yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:114a-19: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-20: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-21: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-22: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-23: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-24: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-25: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-26: shes rab dril bu zhes bsgrags so ;
T02TD2512.1E:114a-27: / slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-28: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-29: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-30: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-31: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sngom pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-32: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-33: dge ba'i chos rnams sdud pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-34: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-35: khyod kyis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-36: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-37: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-38: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-39: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-40: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-41: sngom pa brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-42: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-43: nyin dang mtshan du lan gsum du //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-44: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-45: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-46: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-47: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114a-49: dam tshig sngom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-0: @114b las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-1: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-2: yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-3: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-4: gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-5: phas pham par ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-6: spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-7: rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-8: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-9: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-10: gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-11: kha na ma tho spom por 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-12: khyod kyis srog chags gsang mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-13: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-14: 'dod la log par mi spyad cing //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-15: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-16: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi ;
T02TD2512.1E:114b-17: / chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-18: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-19: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-20: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-21: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-22: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-23: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-24: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-25: ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-26: theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-27: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-29: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-30: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-31: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-32: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-34: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-35: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-36: des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-37: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-38: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-39: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-40: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-41: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:114b-42: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-43: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-44: de nas de la aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:114b-45: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:114b-46: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:114b-47: deng khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:114b-48: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-0: dad pa med pa rnams la yang ma @115a * //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-2: de nas lnga po bsdus pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-4: 'di ni dam tshig gsang ba ste //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad rab grub pa //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-6: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-7: rigs rnams thams cad der brlag 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-8: aom ma h'a su kha ha na sa ma ya m'a ti pra ti nam su ra stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-9: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-10: sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-11: dang por rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-12: zhugs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-13: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-14: su to sho su su kho /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-15: badzra sa tva a'adya siddhy'a mam /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-17: de nas yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-18: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par yang 'thob na /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-19: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-20: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-21: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-22: de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-23: sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-24: gyen du bstan pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-25: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-27: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-28: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-30: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-31: mna'i snying po'i chu la yongs su bzlas na /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-32: slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-33: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyid kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-35: deng nas snying la yang dag zhugs //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-36: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-37: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-39: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgos shig / deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-40: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2512.1E:115a-41: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-42: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2512.1E:115a-44: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-0: de @115b nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems ma'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-1: 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-3: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-4: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / de nas badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya ba 'di lan brgya zlos su gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-5: yang g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-6: sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-7: h'um aa aa aa aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos su gzhug go / sbyor ba gnyis ka la yang 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od kyis kun nas 'khrigs pa'i rdo rje sems dpas kun nas gang bar bsams na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-8: lha'i ye shes kyang 'di las skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-9: de nas me tog gi phreng ba dor zhing phreng bas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-10: gdong g-yogs dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-11: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba dag slob dpon gyi las kyi cho gar bstan pa'i sbyor bas byed du gzhug go / de nas de bzhin du padma bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-12: slob ma rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-13: padma de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos nye bar gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-14: yon gyi mchog blangs te mchod yon byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-15: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de ;
T02TD2512.1E:115b-16: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-17: slob dpon gyi cho gas dbang bskur zhing chu de 'thung du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-19: 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-20: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-21: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-23: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-24: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-25: skyes bu 'dus pa'i nang gnas shing //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-26: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-27: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-28: cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-29: rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba dang ;
T02TD2512.1E:115b-30: rang gi dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhags dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-31: chos kyi de kho na nyid rnams kyi dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:115b-32: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-33: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas de yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-34: de la snying po byin te /
T02TD2512.1E:115b-35: dang por mna' 'dor du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-2: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bshad de /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-3: dbang bskur bar 'os pa bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-4: slob dpon gyis las kyi cho ga thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-6: lha'i de kho na nyid thams cad bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-7: 'di dag gis ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis dbang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-8: bskur bar gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:116a-9: de nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-10: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las bar du khru do yongs su dor bar dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor shar phyogs kyi skor bltas pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tsam la /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-11: zur ba zhi po sgo nub tu blta sa pa /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-12: tshon gyi phye ma sna lngas bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-13: dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-14: de'i steng du dang po'i rdo rje kha dog dmar por bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:116a-15: de nas dkyil 'khor de me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-17: ras kyis g-yogs pa'i seng ge'i gdan nam /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-18: stan nang tshangs can rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bzlas pa der gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-19: de yang dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-20: dpal rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-21: de'i lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su snga ma bzhin du padma'i gdan bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-22: gdan de rnams la dang po'i rdo rje'i snying po dang bcas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-23: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-24: gdan de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos 'dug nas dang po'i rdo rje de nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-28: spyi bo rnams su byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-29: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-31: me tog gi chun pos brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po rin po che'i me tog can h'um gis bzlas pa bzhag pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-32: g-yon phyogs kyi char dar sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-33: ba dan la nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags bzlas pa gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-35: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-39: rva dung la sogs pa'i rol mo'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgra dang /
T02TD2512.1E:116a-42: rdo rje mtshon cha bzlas pas mchod do //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-0: @116b de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-1: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs de'i spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:116b-2: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-3: de la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:116b-4: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-5: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-6: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-7: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed dang po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-8: de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-9: 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-10: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-11: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-12: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-13: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-14: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:116b-15: / sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-16: don rnams thams cad grub par brtul zhugs yongs ldan pa //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-17: tshogs kyi las dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-18: bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-19: gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-20: dbang bcas lhas bskor ba yi bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-21: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lu mbi'i tshal //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-22: lha mang dag gis bstan par mgon po bltams pa na ;
T02TD2512.1E:116b-23: / srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-24: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-25: lhums nas bltams pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-26: myur bskrun bdud rtsi chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang ;
T02TD2512.1E:116b-27: / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-28: rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pas //
T02TD2512.1E:116b-29: bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-0: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / dgyes @117a * //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-1: shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-2: dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-3: lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-4: bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-5: bee d'u rya ltar sdo ba'i rtsva bting steng bzhugs te //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-6: skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-7: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / chu bo'i 'gram na tsva sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-8: shin tu rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa ;
T02TD2512.1E:117a-9: / klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-10: bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-11: mang po btul ches steng dang ni nam mkha' la //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-12: bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-13: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje gdan bzhugs te //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-14: nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnam par btul //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-15: ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-16: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
T02TD2512.1E:117a-17: grong khyer b'a r'a na s'ir drang srong mchog bzhugs nas //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-18: chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-19: lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-20: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-21: bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-22: bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa seng ges mngon gsungs pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-23: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-24: 'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag / nye bar ston pa'i rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-25: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-26: tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs //
T02TD2512.1E:117a-27: sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-0: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed @117b shog / de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i mchog tu nyer gshegs pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-1: man d'a ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-2: lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-3: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa ;
T02TD2512.1E:117b-4: / mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchog gyur pa //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan gyi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-6: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-7: dang por bum pa gang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-8: rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa de dag dbul lo //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-9: de nas bum pa de rnams kyis so //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-10: de'i 'og tu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-11: de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya zhing 'thung du yang gzhug go / de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-12: cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-13: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-14: ming gi dbang bskur ba yang byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-15: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-16: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-17: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-18: chos kyi de kho na nyid kyis dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang mchod pa bcu gnyis po de dag nyid /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur las byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-21: rdo rje'i rigs la ni khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-22: padma'i rigs la ni padma'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-23: rin po che'i rigs la ni rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis las byung bar gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni dkar po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-26: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni sngon po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-27: padma'i dkyil 'khor la ni dmar po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-28: rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la ni ser por shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:117b-29: de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga rnams rjes su spyad pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-30: yi ge pras byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che'i thur ma'am /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-31: gser gyi thur ma blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:117b-32: slob ma'i mig gnyis su phra bkod de /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-1: ma des de'i mig tu byugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-2: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-3: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-4: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-5: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-6: rab rib rgyal bas bsal bar mdzad //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-7: aom badzra nee tra aa pa h'a ra phat lam hri /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-8: de nas me long blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-9: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-10: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-11: dang zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-12: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-13: rgyu dang las las byung ba ste //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-14: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-15: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-16: sems can don ni mnyam med byos ;
T02TD2512.1E:118a-17: /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skyes //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-18: de nas yi ge hos mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-20: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phen pa'i tshul byed du gzhug cing /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-22: aom badzra r'a ga ho zhes kyang smrar gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-23: de nas aom badzras tva zhes bya bas me long bstan la /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-24: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-26: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-27: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-28: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag gang //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-30: byang chub sems 'dir shes par gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-31: de nas badzra he tu mam /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-32: zhes bya bas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis su dgod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-33: badzra bh'asha ram zhes bya bas dung lag pa g-yas par byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-34: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:118a-35: di ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-36: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-37: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-38: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-39: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-40: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-41: gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-42: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-43: phan 'dogs shin tu gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-44: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-45: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-46: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-47: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-48: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-49: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:118a-50: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-0: sems can @118b kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-1: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-2: rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-3: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-4: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-5: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-6: khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-7: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-8: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-9: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-11: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-12: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-13: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-14: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-15: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-19: nam mkha'i snying po'i nga rgyal dang /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-20: tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-21: rjes su gnang ba byin la rang gi lha'i snying po sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-22: de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-23: gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-24: slob ma thams cad la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-25: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-27: srid pa mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-28: srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag las bton //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-29: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa siddhya sa ma ya stvam ;
T02TD2512.1E:118b-30: bhur bhu ba: sva: de la gzengs bstod pa 'di yin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-31: g-yon pa chos gos kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-32: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-33: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-35: rjes su bsgrub pa'i lan yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-36: de nas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-37: slob ma bsang gtor byas la g-yon logs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-38: de'i g-yas pa'i mthe bong lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-39: h'um gis mar gyi sbyin sreg lan bdun byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-40: blugs gzar gyis slob ma la bskor ba byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-41: de nyid kyis dgang blugs gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-42: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyis de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:118b-43: de nas slob ma'i lag par rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i gdu bu btags la /
T02TD2512.1E:118b-44: de nyid bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-0: aom ru ru sphu ru dzv'a la tishtha siddha lo @119a * //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-1: tsa ne sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-2: zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-4: slob ma gtang bar bya ba ni slob ma'i thun mong gi cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-5: gang zhig slob dpon gyi dbang gis dbang bskur ba de la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-6: de la dmigs te mar gyi sreg blugs brgya h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-8: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi yang sbrang rtsi dang /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-10: zho dang bsres pa'i til gyis sbyin sreg brgya sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags nyid kyis dbul lo //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-11: de nas de bzhin du gdu bu btags la bsad gtor byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-13: de nas yang snga ma bzhin du thab kyi nang du dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-14: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams la sbyin sreg phul nas /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-15: yang dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-16: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-17: de'i phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-18: phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-19: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-20: de nas de bzhin du rang gi lus la sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-24: rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-27: sems can chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-28: bde ba chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-29: blo gros chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-30: cho ga 'di ni legs par smras //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-31: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-33: rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2512.1E:119a-34: de nas snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid la bsrung ba legs par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:119a-35: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing dkyil 'khor phyags par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-0: de nas glegs bam bklag pa dang mchod rten gdab pa la sogs pa ci nus pa'i dge ba'i las rnams rjes su spyod par byed cing @119b gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-1: de nas brtsams pa 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la thun mong du gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-2: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams gang du khyad par du phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-3: bshad pa med pa dag la ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i dbang du byas nas bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-4: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-7: dam tshig thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'das ma thag pa'i don ston par byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-10: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-11: cho ga zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa 'grub par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi phyir rgyu dang byed par zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-12: 'byung ste zhes bya ba rtsom par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-13: zla ba nya nas brtsams zhes bya ba ni zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i mtshan mo nas nye bar bzung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-14: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma'am /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-15: brkos pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar te mdun du'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-16: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ni lnga po bsdus pa bcings pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-17: ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-18: ji srid skyo ba skye bar ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-19: dang por byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod kyi gang du bya ba thams cad drangs nas gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-21: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-22: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-23: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:119b-24: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rnams blang ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:119b-25: rdo rje'i dam tshig gis brjod cing zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i gsung gis bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-0: ji ltar slob dpon las rang gi 'dod pa'i lha bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir h'um zhes bya ba bzlas shing phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes brlabs @120a * //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-2: de nas brtsams te rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris la sogs pa bris pa'i sku mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-3: 'di spyan sngar ji skad bshad pa'i bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad ma thag tu /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-4: lnga po bsdus pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-5: h'um zhes bya ba'i 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-6: skyo bar gyur na mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje'i tshig kyang bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-7: bya ba thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-8: lnga bo bsdus pa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-9: ji srid thun dang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'am /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-10: thun gnyis pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-11: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-12: langs te ji skad du bshad pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-13: de ltar nyin re zhing bdag la byin gyis brlabs par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-14: ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-16: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-17: 'di nyid kyi 'og nas bshad pa'i ras ris la sogs pa sgrub pa thams cad sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-18: bka' nye bar brtsams nas 'grub par 'gyur zhing rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-19: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-20: rdo rje sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de ni de bzhin te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2512.1E:120a-22: 'drir 'jug par 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-23: ras ris sgrub pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-24: gtan tshigs de bas na sngon du bsnyen ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-25: de nas ras ris bdag nyid kyis bri ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-26: ri mo mkhan dkyil 'khor mthong ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:120a-27: dang po'i rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya bris la zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:120a-28: des dang po h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-0: de ri mo bri bar bya ba 'am byed du gzhug go / de'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o zhes @120b bya ba ni de phan chad kyi dus su ni phyag rgya med par yang 'dri ba 'am /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-2: dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang de nyid kyis dang por brtsams par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs te /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud 'dir dkyil 'khor ji srid gsungs pa de rnams su yang rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya dang po brtsam par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-4: phyi nas tshon rtsi thams cad dgye ba la h'um zhes bya ba nyid zlos bzhin du ci bde bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:120b-5: dbus su bcom ldan 'das cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bri zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-7: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-8: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-12: 'phan la sogs pas gnas mdzes par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-14: bum pa gang ba rnams kyang dgod de /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-15: sa'i phyogs pa'i rnam lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-16: spos chu'i dri zhim pos nye bar byugs pa'i gnas su bri bar bya ba'i ras gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-17: de snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar yongs su brtags pa'i gnas rnams su h'um zhes bya ba bkod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-20: mchod pa rnam pa lngas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-21: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ras kyi dbus su bri ba 'am /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-23: de'i 'og logs su phyag na rdo rje /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-24: shar lho mtshams su 'jam pa'i dbyangs /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-26: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha'i mdzod ;
T02TD2512.1E:120b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi cha la 'jig rten dbang phyug / nub byang mtshams su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-29: byang shar mtshams su rdo rje gnod sbyin bri ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-31: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-32: de ltar ras ris bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-34: tshes bco lnga nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-35: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:120b-36: ras ris la bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs nas yang dag par bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-0: mchod pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du @121a * //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-1: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-2: phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i nang du h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-3: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas nyin re'i sbyor bas ji srid zla ba nya ba gnyis pa la thug pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-4: de nas de'i tshe mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod byas nas tho rangs ka bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mthong bstsal nas /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-5: de la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-6: cho ga gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-7: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-9: h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-10: de'i mdun gyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-11: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-12: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-13: de nas de'i mdun du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-14: de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas zla ba'i mthar thug pa dang mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-15: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis mthong ba stsal nas /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-16: sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-17: ras la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo gcig pu ras la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121a-19: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-20: ras ris kyi spyan sngar de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-22: de nas zla ba nya ba la phyag rgya chen po bcings pa nyid kyis /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-23: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-24: tho rangs ka bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes mthong ba stsal nas /
T02TD2512.1E:121a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' po gcig pu'i ras ris sgrub pa yang shes par @121b bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-1: de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-2: h'um zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-3: las rnams bshad pa ni rjes su mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-4: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-5: ras ris kyi bsgrub pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-6: zla ba gcig ji skad du bshad pa'i bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ye shes ma babs kyang las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-7: gang zhig ye shes babs pa la ni las rnams shin tu yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-8: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-11: de rnams rjes su mnyes par byed pa ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams rang dbang du bya ba'i phyir mngon du phyogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-13: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-14: 'dod chags ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-15: de la sogs pa gang yin pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-17: bde ba thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-18: rdo rje yid las byung ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-19: rdo rje ro'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi lha thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-20: 'dod chags dam tshig ces su bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-21: ces bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-22: de rnams phul ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-23: gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bstabs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-24: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-25: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor du zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-26: de mngon sum bzhin du bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-27: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ngo bo nyid du byas nas las de yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la brtson par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:121b-30: de ltar de rnams rjes su mnyes par byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:121b-32: yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-3: de'i rnal 'byor de bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-4: de ras ris la sogs pa la mdun du bzhugs su gsol te /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-5: mchod pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-6: 'khyud pa dang 'o byed pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gnyis po rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa dag gis yid kyi rjes su mnyes par bya ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-7: dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga las gsungs pa'i sbyor bas rjes su mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-9: gzugs de la ni zhugs bzhin nam //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-10: yid kyis btud pa lta bu dang //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-11: 'dzum zhing mig gzhan mi lta bas //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-12: bzlas na ring por mi thogs 'grub //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-16: de rnams mnyes par bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas h'um zhes bya ba dpag tu med par bzlas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-18: rdo rje thams cad ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-19: de rnams rjes su mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-21: rang gi snying po la bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-22: dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-23: gang de rnams kyi snying po gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rgyud gzhan dag las /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-25: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes rang gi snying po gsungs pa gang yin pa de bzlas pas de rnams rjes su mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-26: lha la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-27: thams cad du bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha rnams bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-28: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-29: h'um zhes bya ba de rjes su dga' bar bya ba'i bsams pas /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-31: de nas de dag rjes su chags par sgrub pa po ci 'dod par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-32: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa rnams kyang chung ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122a-33: bdag bsrung ba la sogs pa la ni yungs kar la lan cig gis so zhes bya ba ni yungs kar h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:122a-34: rang gi mgo la gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-0: rdo rje @122b 'bar ba'i nang du bdag nyid chud par byas par bsams na bdag bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-1: gzhan bsrung ba la ni rdo rje bskor bas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-2: de bzhin du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-3: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thog ma'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-4: gzhan gyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams su rdo rjer bya ba'i bsam pas /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-5: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-6: des ni gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-7: thams cad du yang h'um zhes bya ba bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-8: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-9: las bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-10: thams cad bsrung ba la ni yid kyis lan cig go zhes bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-11: grong la sogs pa bsrung ba la ni yid kyis h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-12: mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni blta ba'am zhes bya ba ni h'um zhes bya bas mig gnyis su rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-13: bltas pas mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-14: yungs kar la sogs pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-15: h'um zhes bya bas yungs kar rdo rje'i rnam par bsams la des phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-16: de bzhin du chu dang thal ba la sogs pas kyang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-17: sems can thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin pas bzlos pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-18: seng ge la sogs pa'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi lus phyung la /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-19: dbugs mi 'byung ba'i sbyor bas gzhan mi g-yo bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-20: sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'tshir bas so zhes bya bas ni rdo rje bsdams pas /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-21: rdo rje blangs la bsgrub par bya ba'i lce 'tshir ba'i bsam pas btsir bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-23: tshig 'phrog par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-24: sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsums nas bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:122b-25: lhan cig tu byas la yid kyis mig btsums nas bzlas na des mi rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:122b-26: thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje dril bas so zhes bya bas ni lag pa g-yas pas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-0: g-yon du h'um zhes bya bas @123a * //
T02TD2512.1E:123a-2: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje la bsgrub par bya ba'i ming blos bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-3: lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje bsgrub par bya ba gsad pa'i bsam pas bsnun na /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-4: des ni thams cad gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:123a-5: sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-6: bstod pa dang bcas pas mda' 'phen pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-7: 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i snying kar bsnun par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-9: rgyas btab par gyur pa la ni mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-12: lkugs pa bzhin du 'dug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-15: ro ltar ci yang mi smra ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-16: lha la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ston pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-17: sor mo rnams bgrang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-18: mig mi 'dzum par lta ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-20: rims dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-30: snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni lha'i sbyor bas yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-31: de'i snying ga'i padma byung ste blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-32: rang gi snying la gzhag la gcig tu gyur par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-33: des ni thams cad kyi snying 'dren cing 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:123a-34: sems can thams cad za ba la ni bldad cing myur bar zlos pas so zhes bya bas ni bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo'i kha nam mkha' dang mnyam pa /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-35: mche ba gtsigs pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:123a-36: bsgrub par bya ba khas blangs la bldad cing bzlas na myur bar de zos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:123a-37: thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad 'jigs par bya ba ni skrag par bya bas so //
T02TD2512.1E:123a-38: de yang gar las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la kha phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-1: sgra gyen du brdzes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-2: 'og nas mgo 'degs pas so zhes bya ba smra bar byed pa 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-3: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-4: 'dis sems can thams cad skrag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:123b-5: nor thams cad 'gugs pa la ni gser gyi bzlas pas so zhes bya bas ni dong rtse 'gugs pa'i tshul gyis bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-6: des ni nor thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:123b-7: nor dang 'bru thams cad 'gugs pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las lag pa g-yas pa'i yang mdzub mo bsgreng la g-yon pa'i ye ge h'um dang sdigs mdzub bya ba'i tshul gyis 'dren pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-8: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-9: 'dis ni nor dang 'bru thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:123b-10: thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi wang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka le'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-12: sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba ni thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-13: rdo rje sgra dang phyag rgya chen pos bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:123b-14: thams cad 'bigs shing rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-15: rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni 'bigs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:123b-16: yid bde ba bskyed pa ni rjes su chags par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-17: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-20: thams cad dga' bar bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pa'o zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-21: sems can gyi khams thams cad ni thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-22: de dga' bar bya ba ni bsgrub par bya zhing rang dbang du bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-23: k'i li k'i l'i rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la des phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:123b-24: yid kyis bzlas brjod bya ste des ni thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-0: sdug pa'i bcing ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan par nges par btsir bas so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas sems can thams cad 'khor pa ji srid @124a * //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-1: par yongs su mi gtong ba'i chags pa ni sdug pa brtan pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-2: des 'ching ba ni dam por bzung ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-3: sdug pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la brtan pa'i 'khrul 'khor btsir bdes ni snying btsir bas de rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-4: ma rungs pa rab tu bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyems mas so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje snyems ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-5: des ma rungs pa rnams rab tu sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-7: ma rungs pa rnams la bltas la rdo rje snyems ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-8: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-9: bdag nyid de dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-11: bsgrub par bya ba 'dud par byed pa'i bsam pas gdud de /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-12: des ni de ltung bar byas par 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-14: rgyan thams cad ces bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-15: de rnams dbrog pa ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dbrog pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-16: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-17: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes grags te //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-19: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-20: de dbrog pa ni 'gugs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-22: thams cad yid tshim pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-24: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis snying gar bzhag pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-25: dam tshig rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-26: des ni thams cad yid tshim par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-27: mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-28: rdo rje kha shar du bltas te bskor bas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-29: dang po'i rdo rje blangs la 'od zer 'bar ba gtod ba'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su bltas la /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-30: bskor na mun pa mun nag snang bar byed do //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-31: lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyis bzlas pas so//
T02TD2512.1E:124a-32: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pas rang gi mtshan bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-33: lus kyi sdug bsngal gzhig par bya ba'i phyir bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-34: des lus bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:124a-35: g-yogs nas bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2512.1E:124a-36: gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-0: rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog @124b gis phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i bsam pa gar las byung ba'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-2: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo 'khyud /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-3: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo 'khyud /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-4: mthe bong gnyis rang rang gi mdzub mo dang rtse sbyar la mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar te brkyang ba 'di ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-5: 'dis gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-6: sgra thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sgra'o //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-7: de thos par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams kyis thos par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-9: rdo rje pi wang gis so zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-10: gar las byung ba'i rdo rje bsdams pa las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa ni yu ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-11: g-yas pa'i mdzub mos brdungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-12: 'di dang sgra rnams brag ca lta bur bsgoms pas sgra thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-13: 'di ni rdo rje pi wang ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-14: dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir na /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-15: sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dri zhim po rnams sna tshogs pa bskyed pa'i dbugs 'byin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-17: h'um zhes pa'i glu'i bzlas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-18: de bskyed pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-19: zas dang skom thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-20: rdzas thams cad rdo rje bsdams pas bcing zhing yid kyis blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-21: mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-22: de ltar na rdo rje spro ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-23: dbab pa thams cad ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-24: lag pa gnyis kyis se gol rdebs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'od zer 'bar bas kun nas 'khrigs pas bsgrub par bya ba kun du gang bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:124b-25: h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:124b-26: des ni pra se na la sogs pa dbab pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:124b-27: thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yid kyis zhugs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gar byed pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid gar byed cing /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-2: des na thams cad gar byed du 'dzud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125a-3: thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-4: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la h'um zhes bya ba'i glu la sogs pa'i gre 'gyur thams cad 'byung bar bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-5: de rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pas lce bskyod cing bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-6: des ni thams cad glu len du 'dzud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125a-7: thams cad smrar 'jug pa ni rdo rje chu yis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-8: thams cad babs pas yi ge h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-9: spos chu'i rdul phra rab rdo rje smra ba lta bur rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-11: khar blud na des ni thams cad smrar 'dzud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125a-12: thams cad babs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-13: gdon la sogs pa thams cad zhugs nas de rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams ston cing dris pa'i lan ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:125a-15: rdo rje 'bebs pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-16: dam tshig rdo rje 'bebs pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:125a-19: lce la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-20: de'i steng du h'um aa zhes bya ba 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrigs pa bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-21: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston par rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-22: h'um aa zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:125a-23: gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-24: srin po la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-25: gar las byung ba'i ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya gnyis byas la ;
T02TD2512.1E:125a-26: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pa mdzub mo rdo rjer bya /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-27: gung mo gnyis mdud de bzlog nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su mdzub mo rtse sbyar bar bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-29: khros shing gdong mche ba gtsigs pa 'od zer 'bar bas kun du 'khrigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-30: des kyang de'i mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-31: rkang ba'i mthar thug gi bar du bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-32: des ni gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:125a-33: 'di ni rdo rje mu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-0: @125b gdon thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-1: srin po la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad kyis sems can 'ga' zhig 'dzin par bya bar 'dod na /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-2: de'i tshe tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs brnyan mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-3: der tshogs kyi bdag po bkug cing bcug la dbang du bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-4: snga ma bzhin du rab tu bsgrubs la dbang bskur te legs par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-5: khros pas rdo rje gso ra zhing bzlas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-6: che ge mo gdon gyis zin du chug shing / h'um zhes bskul na /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-7: de'i tshe de gdon gyis zin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-8: rims thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje rims kyi gdon gyis so zhes bya ba la ;
T02TD2512.1E:125b-9: nyin gcig pa la sogs pa'i rims brgyad ni rims thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-10: gang gi tshe des sems can 'ga' zhig zin par 'dod na /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-11: de'i tshe h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-12: nam mkha' las rims blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-13: bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar sbyor ba 'dis rims gzhug par bya ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:125b-14: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang la snying 'dar bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-15: de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-16: rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje'i lta bas bsal ba'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-17: rdo rje'i lta ba ni chags shing rab tu gdangs pa'i mig ces bya ba ni rdo rje lta ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-18: des bya bas pas rims thams cad sel nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-20: ji skad du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la mig g-yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-21: g-yon par aa med pa'i yi ge ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-22: yang yi ge h'um las mig gnyis su rdo rje gnyis bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-23: de dang h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-24: byabs la mig gnyis las byung ba'i rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams kyis rims la bsnun par byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-25: des ni rims thams cad bsal nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-26: dug thams cad sbar ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-27: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug thams cad bems por gyur pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-28: bems po ma yin par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-29: rang gi nus pa bskyed par bya ba ni spar ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:125b-30: de ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:125b-31: rdo rje lta bu'i dug gi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni khros shing mig mi 'jums [?] pa'i lta bas lta ba 'di ni rdo rje'i lta ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-1: thams cad 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-2: 'dis ni don 'di skad du ston par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-3: khros pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-4: h'um zhes bya ba las mig gnyis su lta ba'i dug can gyi khro bo gnyis 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par 'khrugs par bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-5: lta ba des 'bar ba ni dug me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-6: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:126a-7: dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun pos so zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-8: rma bya'i chun po la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i mdog can nyid kyi dbu las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dgus phyogs bcu thams cad kun du gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-9: chun po nges bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la bya ba par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-10: des kyang bcom ldan 'das dug thams cad rnam par g-yeng bar byed pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus bkrus par gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-11: des ni dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:126a-12: dug thams cad bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-13: dang po'i rdo rje las mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-14: rkang pa'i sor mo bsgyur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-15: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing dug gi steng du bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-16: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-17: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dug la khyab pas bdud rtsir gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-19: bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mche ba rnam par gtsogs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-20: mdog nag po rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od kun du 'khrugs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-21: rdo rje gsor ba la sogs pa la brtson par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-22: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing ;
T02TD2512.1E:126a-23: rdo rje las rdo rje khro bo sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:126a-24: des bgegs thams cad skrag par bya zhing bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:126a-25: dpag tu med pa bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni h'um zhes bya ba nyid bzlas pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-0: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las gol [?] ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni bcom @126b ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-1: des mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las grol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-2: de yang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar bar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-3: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje chen po gsor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-4: de nas rdo rje las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams gsod cing 'joms par byed bar bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-5: phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so zhes bya ba ni srin po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-6: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig 'dos par gyur na /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-7: de'i tshe rdo rje sems dpa' khros par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-8: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-10: rdo rje 'bar ba'i steng du nges par bab par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-11: de ltar na phyag rgya des 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-12: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang gdul ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-13: dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-14: dkyil 'khor der mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad bkug nas de'i 'og tu bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-15: de nas rang gi bka' bsgo ba la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-16: de yang rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-17: khros pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-18: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-19: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo thad kar bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-20: g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung brkyang la /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-21: phyag rgya steng du bteg nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs kyis sbyar bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:126b-23: / ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-25: de nyid ni dam tshig ces bshad do //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-26: de rnams kyi snying po ni phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-27: phyag rgya ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-28: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-29: rig pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-30: de rnams ni gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:126b-31: de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:126b-32: rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phat kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pas khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis h'um phat ces bya ba'i khro bo @127a * //
T02TD2512.1E:127a-1: stong gi se ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos po gzhig par bya ba'i phyir sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-2: khro bo stong po mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-3: phyag na rdo rje'i sku las byung ba rnams kyis ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-9: gsang ba rnams 'jig par byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:127a-10: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mdag gzhug mar bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-11: ma mo'i gnas su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o zhes bya ba ni drag mo la sogs pa ni ma mo thams cad dang mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-12: de rnams kyi rig pa gang yin pas grub pa rnams /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-13: de rnams rang gi dbang du byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-15: rdo rje gsor zhing ma mo'i gnas rnams su h'um zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod ji srid stong phrag brgya rdzogs par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-16: de nas de rnams mngag gzhug mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:127a-17: bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs so zhes bya ba ni lha'i bu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-20: 'chi bdag gi rang bzhin ni bdud thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:127a-21: de rnams kyi stobs ni nus pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-22: de bzlog pa ni gzhom pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:127a-23: de ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs kyis 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-24: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' khros par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-26: bzlog nas kha'i grva gnyis su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-27: ha ha ha ha h'um zhes bzlas pa 'di ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-28: 'di nyid bcings la bzlas pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bdud thams cad za bar byed par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-29: de lta bu ni bdud thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:127a-30: gzhan gyi dbung thams cad gzhom pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-31: rdo rje la yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo zhes bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-33: g-yon du h'um zhes bya ba las khro bo rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:127a-35: mngon par bzlas la bskal pa sreg pa lta bu'i khu tshur de nyid kyis yang dang yang du gzhan gyi dpung gi steng du 'phang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-0: de lta bus ni @127b gzhan gyi dpung thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:127b-1: 'thab pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-2: rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-3: lnga po bsdus pa las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-4: srin lag dang mthe'u chung snyoms la phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-5: brkyang nas ba dan gyi rtse mo lta bur bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-6: gyen du 'degs pa 'di ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-7: 'di bcings la h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-8: rdo rje dran par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-9: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-10: des gzhan gyi dpung bcom zhing gzhig par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-11: de lta bus ni g-yul thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:127b-12: thams cad bcing pa la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-13: h'um zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha'i rdo rje'i thag par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-14: des rkun po la sogs pa yid kyis bkug nas h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing mdud pa'i tshul gyis bcing bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:127b-15: / thams cad dgrol ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-16: yi ge mu yis so zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-20: bskrad pa la sogs pa sngags kyi sbyor ba byas la de thams cad ni h'um mu zhes bya ba bzlas na bcing ba thams cad las grol zhing thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:127b-21: ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-22: ro langs thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor rnams ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-25: de la mi shi ba'i ro la srin po la sogs pa zhugs pa ni ro langs so //
T02TD2512.1E:127b-26: 'khrul 'khor ni lha ma yin gyis byas pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-27: gzhan dag gis byas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-28: dper na sa 'og tu 'gro ba'i lam du bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:127b-29: de rnams ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgyas 'jig par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-30: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-31: stang stabs kyis 'phangs la phyag rgya bcings pa las rdo rje 'bar ba byung bas ro langs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-32: 'khrul 'khor rnams la 'bab par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-33: de ni rdo rje 'jigs byed do //
T02TD2512.1E:127b-34: lcags sgrog thams cad dgrol ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-35: rdo rje kha ba long gis so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya gar las byung ba bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:127b-36: lcags sgrog rnams la 'phangs pas phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-1: byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba rnams lcags sgrog la babs pas lcags sgrog thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-2: 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-3: me yang dag par skyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-4: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mthe bong dang /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-5: mthe'u chud rdo rje rtse mo bzhi pa 'bar ba rnam par 'phro ba rab tu ston pa'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-7: 'di bcings la rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la h'um zhes bya ba bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-8: h'um zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing me bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-9: chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mchog bcings la rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-10: khro bo'i lta bas ji ltar mngon par dga' ba'i glu la lta bzhin du 'dir chu bskyed cing zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-11: h'um zhes bya bas bzlas na /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-13: 'di ni rdo rje chu shel lo //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-14: nam mkha' las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-15: nam mkha' la h'um zhes bya ba las nam mkha'i mdzod zas dang skom thams cad 'bebs pa la brtson par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-16: de nyid la lta zhing h'um zhes bya bas bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-18: thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2512.1E:128a-19: / nam mkha' las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-20: nam mkha' la h'um zhes bya ba las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-21: de nyid yid la bya zhing h'um zhes bya bas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-23: nam mkha' las sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-24: nam mkha' la yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-25: nam mkha' la yi ge aa bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-26: de nyid la sems zhing ji srid 'bum phrag gcig ma rdzogs par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du h'um zhes bya ba bzlas nas de nas yi ge aa de las /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-29: ma 'ongs pa rnams lung ston pa bden par ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128a-30: pra se na thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:128a-36: ral gri'i pra se na thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-0: de rnams la yi ge gzugs su 'das @128b pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-2: da ltar byung ba'i bya ba gang shes par 'gyur ba de ni /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-3: pra [?] se na thams cad las 'das pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-5: da ltar byung ba'i lung bden par ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-7: rdo rje pra se na thams cad dbab pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-8: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa las /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-9: g-yas pa'i mthe bo bsgreng la /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-10: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur bya ba ni pra se na thams cad dbab pa ste 'di bcings la h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gsal bar snang zhing sems can thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-13: bdag nyid la sgra brnyan gyi tshul du gsal zhing bden pa sgrogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-14: pra se na dbab pa'i bzlas brjod 'bum byas la bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-15: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-16: pra se na thams cad sgrub par byed pa de bzhin du rang gi mig gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje gnyis bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-17: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod 'bum byas na gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-18: de bzhin du rang gi rna ba gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-19: rna bar bzlas brjod 'bum byas na brag ca'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' las sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-20: sna'i rtse mo h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-21: de la dmigs pa'i sems kyis bzlas brjod 'bum byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dri thams cad bsnams par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-23: lce la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-24: de'i steng du h'um zhes bya ba bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-25: bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-26: lus la h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-27: lus la bzlas brjod 'bum byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-28: des thams cad tshor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-29: rang gi snying gar h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bzlas brjod 'bum byas na yid kyis thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:128b-30: rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-31: sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:128b-32: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku gzugs mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-0: @129a * // der gsang ba'i lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug nas bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-1: bcings nas dbang du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-2: mchod pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-3: de'i thugs kar h'um zhes bya ba bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa bsgom zhing bzlas brjod 'bum byas na ;
T02TD2512.1E:129a-5: rmad du byung ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:129a-6: sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun po la ni bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-7: rma bya'i chun bo la rdo rje bcug ste bcing ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:129a-8: de nas rma bya'i chun po de h'um zhes bya ba las dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:129a-9: de nas de nyid bsgom zhing bzlas brjod 'bum byas na chun po 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-10: de nas chun po de la bzlas brjod bya zhing gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis bskor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-11: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-12: brag ca'i tshul gyis thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
