T02TD2512.1E:129a-13: thams cad g-yogs par bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-14: zhi ba'i gnas su bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-15: thams cad g-yogs pa ni tshong dus g-yogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-17: de zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-18: lha chen po'i gnas su lha chen po bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-19: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:129a-20: de'i 'og tu de shes pa las de'i sbyor ba shes par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-21: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas pas de dang de g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:129a-22: thams cad la lan ldon par ston pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-23: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-26: da ltar byung ba'i dngos po'i gtam gyi sgra thos pa ni thams cad la lan ldon pa ston pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-27: de ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis zhes bya ba khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:129a-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-30: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:129a-31: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams la bden pa gang gi sgra rnams ni brag ca dang mtshungs pa yin pas bden pa des 'das pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-0: da ltar byung ba'i bya ba rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bshad du gsol zhes bden pa'i @129b byin gyi rlabs byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-1: rdo rje h'um mdzad snying gar zhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-2: de nyid zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-3: ji srid bcom ldan 'das thams cad ston par mdzad pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-4: rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-5: rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-6: rdzu 'phrul thams cad ni sems kyis yang dag par 'phrul pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-7: nam mkha' 'gro ba la sogs pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-8: de yang yid ltar mgyogs pa la sogs pa la rnam pa lnga ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-9: rnam pa lnga po de dag rdzogs par bya zhing mngon sum du bya ba gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-11: rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-12: dang po'i rdo rje'i bcings pa las nam mkha' la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po bskyed pa'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-13: rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-15: / cho 'phrul thams cad ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-18: gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis so sor dga' bar byed pas na cho 'phrul te /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-19: de rnams ston pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-20: rdo rje ting nge 'dzin ni mchog gis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-21: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-23: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-24: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-25: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-26: de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-27: rang gi lus la dngos po thams cad phyung ba la yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-28: rang gi lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-31: rtsig pa la sogs pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad phyung la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-32: rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-33: h'um zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:129b-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis glog 'gyu ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su dngos po thams cad sprul pa'i bsam pas bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:129b-35: 'di ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:130a-1: thams cad ni lha chen po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-2: de rnams dbab pa la ni lha dbab pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms pas /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-3: rdo rje bskor ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-4: rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu sbrel ba ltar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-5: g-yas logs nas g-yon logs su drangs te yang g-yas su drangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-6: bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje bskor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:130a-7: klu thams cad ni mtha' yas la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-8: de rnams rjes su 'brang bar byed par 'dod pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-9: klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-11: gnod sbyin thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-12: gnod sbyin dgug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bka' bsgos pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-14: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-15: gnod sbyin thams cad ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:130a-16: 'byung po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-18: gar las byung ba'i rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas khro ba dang bcas pas dgod pa'i bzhin dang /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-19: dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs la dbang phyug chen po [?] bkug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-20: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-21: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-22: h'um h'um zhes bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-23: 'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:130a-24: ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje las g-yas pa'i mdzub mo sdigs mdzub bsgreng la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-25: thog gam sprin gyi phyag rgya de las rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun du 'khrigs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-26: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa phyung la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-27: des ser ba rnams thal bar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-28: 'di ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:130a-29: glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-30: rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-31: rdo rje thal mo las mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba'i phyag rgya dpral ba'i phyogs su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-32: de nas sor mo lhag ma rnams 'bar ba gtong ba'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-33: rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-34: 'di bcings la rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:130a-35: h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje me 'bar bas glog la 'bar bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-0: des ni glog @130b bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:130b-1: char pa dbab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-2: char dkon pa'i dus su klu'i mtshor klu bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-3: h'um n'a ga h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po spel la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-4: rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya bcings nas bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-5: rdo rje 'bar bas klu tshig par gyur par rnam par bsam zhing ;
T02TD2512.1E:130b-7: khrag skyugs par 'gyur bar rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-8: des char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:130b-9: char pa bcad pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-10: dri ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin sreg bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-11: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' h'um zhes bya bas mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-12: chu dri ma med pa blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-13: der dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba'i mdog can snga ma bzhin du rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-14: klu'i tshogs kyi steng du dri ma med pa'i chu'i mtshe'u dbul zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-15: des de tshim par 'gyur zhing mtshe'u thams cad dang bral bar bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-16: de nas de char nye bar sdud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:130b-17: sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-18: bdug pas bdug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-19: ji ltar grags pa'i klu bris la bdug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:130b-20: de nas h'um zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-22: klu'i gzugs brnyan la bdug par byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-24: sprin gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i spyan gyis so zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-25: rdo rje'i lta bas lta zhing nam mkha' la sprin gtor bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-26: 'di ni rdo rje nam mkha'i spyan no //
T02TD2512.1E:130b-27: chu med pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-28: ri la sogs pa chu med pa'i sa'i phyogs su h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-29: dang po'i rdo rje bcings pa las /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-30: klu gnyis byas la yid kyis klu gnas na gnas pa'i klu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-32: ri la sogs pa phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-33: langs nas chu'i phung po bskyed par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-34: de ltar na shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i phung po mi zad par skyed par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-35: 'di ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:130b-36: gter thams cad shes par bya ba la ni snod du chu blugs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang du gter yod par re ba'i sa'i phyogs der bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:130b-37: yang dag par mchod de spos chus gang ba'i zangs ma'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la ji srid du chu ston pa de srid du bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-1: 'di na yod do zhes bya bshes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-2: snod gang gi chus blugs pa de'i don la snod chu blugs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-3: de ltar gter shes par bya bas gter gang na yod pa des par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-4: gter dang srung ma dag bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-5: rdo rje dra ba'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis grogs po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-7: rdo rje brko ba'i phyag rgyas 'jor la sogs pa la yi ge h'um bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-9: dang po'i rdo rje de nyid bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-10: dpral ba'i phyogs su bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-11: gter 'byin pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni rdo rje brko ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-12: de nas gter mthong nas rdo rje nor gyi phyag rgya bcings la blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-13: dang po'i rdo rje nyid dpral bar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-14: nor len pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni rdo rje nor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-15: rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-16: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-17: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-18: gang mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyal srid thob pa'i bsam pas /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-19: yi ge h'um bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-20: 'di ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-21: sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-23: dang po'i rdo rje bcings las thams cad thob pa'i tshul gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-24: dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-25: 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-27: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-28: de rnams sgrub pa ni rdzogs par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-30: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-31: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-32: mthe'u tshud mdzub mo rdo rjer bsdams //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-33: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar grags //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-34: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-36: phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-37: bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-38: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-40: de bsgrub pa ni rdzogs par bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131a-42: dang po'i rdo rje ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131a-44: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-0: @131b badzra aa nydza li zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-1: rdo rje thal mo bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-2: de nas badzra bandha zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-3: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-5: zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-6: de nas badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-7: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-8: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-9: de nas dbab pa bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-11: rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-12: badzra mushti bam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-13: de nas h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-14: dang po'i rdo rje bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-15: de lta bus ni phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-16: dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-17: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-18: lnga po bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-19: des dkyil 'khor thams cad grub bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-20: gang gi phyir slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-21: de bcings la yang slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-22: de bas na de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-24: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-25: des dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-26: des dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-27: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyems ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya grub pa ni dngos grub thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-29: de mngon sum du bya ba ni sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-30: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems pa ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:131b-31: de'i g-yas pa'i lcags kyu ni rdo rje snyems pa'i lcags kyu ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-33: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i gzugs mdun du bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-34: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-35: de nas thams cad dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-36: ma grub pa thams cad grub par sgrub pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-37: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ma grub pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-38: ma grub pa thams cad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:131b-39: de thams cad grub par bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:131b-40: yang sbyor ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad @132a * //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-1: bsgrub cing rdzogs par bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-2: ma grub pa thams cad grub par sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-3: dang po'i ni rdo rje ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-4: de bcings nas ma grub pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-6: gang gi tshe rdo rje snyems pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad bsgrubs na /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-7: dngos grub thams cad grub par ma gyur na /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-8: de'i tshe dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-9: h'um zhes bya ba'i glu'i bzlas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-10: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-11: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad sgrub pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-15: las kyi rig pa 'dzin pa grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-16: de sgrub pa ni rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-18: rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-20: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-21: nam mkha'i steng du 'dug nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-22: lag na rdo rje bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-24: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-25: nam mkha'i steng du 'dug nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-26: lag tu rin chen bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-28: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-29: nam mkha'i steng du 'dug nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-30: lag tu padma bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-32: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-33: nam mkha'i steng du 'dug nas su //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-34: lag tu sna tshogs bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-36: zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-37: rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang ;
T02TD2512.1E:132a-42: rin po che'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-45: de dag sgrub pa ni rdo rje thams cad sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-46: de bsgrub par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-47: rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-48: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba dang po'i rdo rje ni /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-49: rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:132a-50: / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-51: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:132a-52: de nas bsgrub par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:132a-53: thugs kyi rdo rjes so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-0: lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas @132b la h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-1: phra mo'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-2: shin tu mnyam par gzhag nas bsgom //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thugs rdo rje //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-6: de lta bu'i rang gi mtshan ma'i snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-7: gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dang de 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-8: 'di ni thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos so zhes bya ba ni shes par zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-10: de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa la yang h'um zhes bya ba glu dang zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-11: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-12: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-13: bde ba yang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-15: gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-17: mi zad pa yi dngos grub kun //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-18: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-20: de nyid ni rdo rje don yod pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-22: sprul pa'i sku rdzogs par byed pas 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-23: de'i dam tshig thams cad ni 'jig rten dang /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-24: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i tshul rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-26: chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'di skad du bshad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-27: gang gi phyir de rnams ni 'dir byang chub kyi sems chen po las byung bar 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-28: dam tshig thams cad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-29: rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-30: de nyid kyis rtog pa gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-31: 'bar zhin mdzes pas na rgyal po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-32: de ston pa'i sgra'i tshogs la yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-33: de bas na bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-34: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid chen po ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-35: de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-36: ming de skad ces bya ba ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-37: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-39: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-40: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-41: ngo bo nyid kyi sku la sogs pa ston pa'i rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:132b-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:132b-44: // / de ltar 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-2: de bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu yang gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-3: da ni rang bzhin bzang zhing cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs te ;
T02TD2512.1E:133a-4: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-5: 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-6: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-7: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-9: bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-10: phyogs bcu po dag tu rnam par snang zhing gzugs tham cad yang dag par ston par mdzad pas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-11: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-12: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ston par mdzad nas 'di yang dag par ston par mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-14: de rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid ni zhi ba'i nyams ston pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i gzung ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-15: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-16: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni thugs su chud pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-17: de'i sgrub pa ni gang gis mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-20: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-22: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'byed pa'i rnam pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-23: de ni bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin cing 'gro ba yin pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-24: de'i tshul ni rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-25: de thos pa la sogs pas rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa'i tshul te /
T02TD2512.1E:133a-26: gsungs te zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:133a-27: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag nas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-0: gsungs te zhes bya ba ni gang la ming ji skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ston par mdzad cing 'chad @133b par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-1: rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-2: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-3: byang chub kyi sems chen po de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-4: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni gzung ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-5: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-6: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni de bzhin nyid mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-7: de nyid ni byang chub chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-10: rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-11: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-14: rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-15: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-16: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin pa'i phyir na rdo rje ltar brtan zhing sra ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-17: rdo rje brtan par gyur pa nyid kyis na /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-18: rdo rje brtan pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-19: des rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-20: de ltar byang chub kyi sems chen po'i ngo bo nyid mi bskyed pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-21: de'i rigs kyi ngo bor bshad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-22: da ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-23: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid dang de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-24: don gcig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-25: de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-26: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-27: rin po che'i rigs ni don to //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-28: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni gnyis dang bral ba nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-29: de mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-30: de nyid ni byang chub chen po ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-32: don gcig pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-33: don gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bas don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:133b-34: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-35: don gcig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-36: de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-37: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:133b-38: gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-0: rin po che'i rigs de dag gi mnyam pa nyid rtog pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid dang gzhan @134a * //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-2: de bas na des don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-3: de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-4: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-5: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du yang bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-6: da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-7: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-8: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-9: ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-10: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-11: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-12: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos so //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-13: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-14: de'i mngon par byang chub pa ni zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-15: de ni 'dir byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-17: ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-18: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-21: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-22: ngo bo nyid dag par gyur pa nyid kyis na ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-23: des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-25: gang gi phyir chos rnams las chos can gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-26: de bas na gang chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-27: gang yang chos rnams kyi rnam par dag pa de ni gcig pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-28: de bas na des chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-29: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-30: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-31: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du yang bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-32: da ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-33: don yod par grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-34: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-35: thams cad la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-36: thams cad ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-37: don yod par grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134a-38: de'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:134a-39: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-0: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni zhes pa ni snga ma @134b bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-1: de nyid byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-3: thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-4: thams cad ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-5: de'i mi rtog pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-6: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-7: thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-8: des thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-10: de thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtog pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-11: gang yang thams cad la mi rtog pa nyid de //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-12: chos 'di nyid ni tha mi dad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-13: de'i phyir 'dis thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-14: da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul nyan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-16: sgom par byed pa rnams la spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje gang la la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-17: gang la la zhes bya ba ni skyes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-19: khye'u dang bu mo la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi tha mal pa'i gang zag gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-20: chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-22: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-24: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bzhir gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-25: de nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos kyi mngon par bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-28: bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya bar 'os pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-29: 'di dag ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i grangs bzhir yongs su chud pa'i byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-30: de nyan pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nges par gzung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-31: 'dzin pa ni tshig dang don gyi tshul gyis mi brjed par sems la yang dag par 'jog pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-32: klog pa ni glegs bam du bklag pa yang dag par blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-33: nyin re bzhin klog par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-34: bsgom pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dag gis bzung ba yang dang yang du mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-35: de zhes bya ba ni gang zag de'o //
T02TD2512.1E:134b-36: sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:134b-37: mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa yin yang /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-1: pa la sogs pa ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-2: mnar med pa la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i las dang bral nas /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-3: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba la yang dag par bsten te /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par mnyes par byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-5: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-6: ngan song thams cad du 'gro ba'i las rnams mi byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par mnyes par byas pas bsod nams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-8: ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs te /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-9: myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-10: de ltar na bshad ma thag pa'i phan yon gyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-11: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-12: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-13: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag par ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-14: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-15: de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi phan yon dang bcas par gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-17: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-18: ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-19: phyag gnyis kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcing bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-20: don gyi gnas 'di nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-22: rgya cher ston cing zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-23: sngar bshad pa'i tshig dang yi ge las tha dad pa aa zhes bya ba'i yi ge sprul par mdzad pas ston par mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-24: rgya cher ston cing zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-25: bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te zhes bya ba ni cung zad tsam bzhad pa'i zhal 'di la mda' bas na bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-26: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:135a-27: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:135a-28: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-0: de @135b lta bu'i ye shes ni snying po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-1: de ston par byed pa'i aa zhes bya ba'i sgra la yang nye bar gdags pas snying po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-2: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-3: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-4: aa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chos thams cad ston par byed pa /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa tsam gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-7: yang dag par 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni tshogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-8: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-11: de yang sems dpa' chen po brgyad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-12: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-13: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs brgyad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-15: phyogs dang mtshams su bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-16: bzhad pa chen po bzhad cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams btul nas /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-17: de bzhin gshegs par gyur par gzigs te /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-18: yid bde ba skyes par gyur pas bzhad pa chen pos bzhad par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-19: thams cad du 'gro ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-20: de la de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-21: bzhad pa chen po bzhad cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-23: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-24: gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-26: dam tshig thob pa rnams kyis ni bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las dang /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-28: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i tshe ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:135b-29: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-30: dam tshig gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:135b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi brtul zhugs sngar bshad pas /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-2: slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don gzhan gyi dgongs pa dang sbyar ba ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-5: byin gyis rlob pa ni ting nge 'dzin gang gis de byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-6: de la snyoms par 'jug pa ni mngon sum du mdzad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de sngar bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-10: de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni de kho na nyid bcu po sngar ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-12: de ston par byed pas gang la de skad ces bya ba ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba de gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-13: de la dam tshig chen po ni //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-14: byang chub kyi sems chen po zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-15: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-16: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams so ;
T02TD2512.1E:136a-17: /'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-18: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi mthar thug pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-20: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-22: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-23: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub la /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-24: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig tu bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-26: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136a-27: 'di ni mtshan ma thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes ston par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136a-29: de'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni dbyibs te zur bzhi pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ci skad du bshad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-0: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul des de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs su @136b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-1: de'i dbus su thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-2: thig gsum gyis zlum por thig btab la bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-3: 'di yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad kar sna tshogs padma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-5: gang dkyil 'khor 'di dag bar snang la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'og tu yang bri bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-6: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padmas nye bar mdzes pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-7: sna tshogs padma rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-8: de'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus so //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po zhes bya ba ni rtag pa chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-10: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'khor ba ji srid bar du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bar snang la phab ste /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-11: aa zhes bya ba'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-12: de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-13: de'i zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-14: phyogs thams cad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-15: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhag gam bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-17: sprul pa'i sku gzugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-18: de nas tshon gyi thig le rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-22: thig le'i tshul gyis bri ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:136b-23: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin ba dang bcas par bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-24: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sprul pa'i sku can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan brgyad kyis bskor bar dbus su bri la /
T02TD2512.1E:136b-25: rnal 'byor pa des rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la zlum por bskor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-0: dkyil 'khor gsum pa bris pa gang yin pa de mi bskyod pa la sogs @137a * //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-1: pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyis bskor bar /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul nyid bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-3: phyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad du bshad pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor lha'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad phyogs dang mtshams rnams su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-4: bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams su dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi legs par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-9: 'bras s'a lu las skyes pa'i ljang bu dang bcas pa'i sa'i dum bu dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni ne'u gsing ste /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-11: sa chen po ston pa can gyi mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-12: lho phyogs kyi sgor ro drug gis gang ba'i snod la /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-13: dbyig dang gser dang rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-14: gos la sogs pas brgyan pa dgod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-15: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-16: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i byang chub chen po'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-17: nub phyogs kyi sgor 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan la bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-19: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang spros pa dang bral ba'i byang chub chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi gdan ston pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-20: byang phyogs kyi sgor sprul pa'i sku'i gzugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-21: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-22: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub chen po ston par byed pa'i mtshan mar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-23: 'dir lha thams cad kyi sa bon ni aa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-26: de'i nang du cha bzhi'i tshad kyi zlum por rdo rje phur bu la btags pa'i tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor thig btab ste /
T02TD2512.1E:137a-27: gnyis pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-0: gsum pa ni sum 'gyur du zlum por de yongs @137b su bskor bar dkyil 'khor kun du thig btab la legs par bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-1: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i gzugs can phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa zhal gcig pa shar du gzigs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor zlum po gnyis pa la sprul pa'i sku'i gzugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:137b-5: / de nas dkyil 'khor zlum po gsum pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-6: shar phyogs su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-8: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang bcas par rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-9: lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-10: nam mkha'i mdzod dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-11: nub phyogs su bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-13: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-14: byang phyogs su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur dang /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-15: rdo rje gnod sbyin gnyis dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-16: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-17: shar phyogs su yang phyag na rdo rje /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-18: lho phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-19: nub phyogs su 'jig rten dbang phyug / byang phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-20: shar lho mtshams su 'jam dpal gzhon nu /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-21: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha'i mdzod /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-22: nub byang mtshams su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-23: byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs cha la /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-24: rdo rje gnod sbyin bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-25: lhag ma rnams ni sngar smras par zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:137b-27: bum pa gang ba rnams ni /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-28: aa zhes bya ba nyid kyis re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la snga ma bzhin du lha thams cad la dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:137b-29: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-0: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje @138a * //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-2: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-3: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-4: de nas aa zhes bya ba zlos shing sngar bshad pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-5: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-6: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-8: dbang du bya ba byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-9: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-12: ra ba dang dra ba dag kyang byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-14: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-15: aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-16: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-17: aa dri shya zhes bya ba nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad blta bar byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-18: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-20: aa ham aa zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-21: de thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-22: de nas rang gi lce la yi ge h'um las rdo rje bzang po rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-23: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ljags la yang aa zhes bya ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-24: de nas yang rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-25: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya aa zhes bya ba zlos bzhin du bcing bar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-26: chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-27: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-28: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-29: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-30: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-32: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-33: de bzhin du g-yon pa rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-34: g-yas pa brkyang bas sa la reg pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-35: g-yon pa de bzhin du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-36: g-yas pa sa la reg pa las zlog ste /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-37: smrang 'don pa'i tshul gyis bslang zhing mtshog sbyin pa lta bu ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138a-38: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya las g-yon pa chos gos 'dzin pa'i khu tshur g-yas pas padma dbye ba'i tshul du mthe'u chung nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:138a-39: 'byed pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-0: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya las lag pa g-yas pa ba dan @138b gsum pa ltar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-1: mi 'jigs pa ster ba'i tshul gyis bzhag pa ni don yod par grub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-3: gnyis kas snyims [?] pa dang bcas par bstod pa'i tshul du bzhag pa 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-4: g-yon pa'i snying gar bzhag pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-5: g-yas kyis ral gri 'dzin pa lta bu ni mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-6: rdo rje gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i tshul du 'jog pa ni nam mkha' snying po'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-7: rdo rje gar bskor zhing bkrol te /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-9: spyi gtsug tu bzhag pa ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-10: g-yas kyi g-yon pa dbye ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:138b-11: / mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor ba ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-12: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mnan pa 'tshir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-13: mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo mche ba ltar bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-15: byang phyogs na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya ni don yod par grub pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-16: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-17: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sog spa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-18: sngar bshad pa'i tshul nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-22: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-23: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-24: de nas yid kyis dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa'i sprin rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-25: phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:138b-26: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-27: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-28: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyin sreg bya ba nas /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sna ma bzhin du thab kyi dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bkod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-31: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgo ba'i gos la bzlas pa'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:138b-32: smad g-yogs bgo zhing ze'u kha bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-0: yang rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi'i snying bos gdong g-yogs kyis @139a * //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-1: ras la yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-3: slob dpon gyis sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-4: aa zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i bum pa sgon [?] gnas pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-5: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas badzra badzra aa zhes brjod cing zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-6: ji srid deng bdag rdo rje sems grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-7: ces bya ba'i bar du sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-9: rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-10: de la rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rje ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-11: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas shing /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-12: 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rjes su mnyes par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-13: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-15: de nas bskor ba lan gsum byas ya /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-16: de kho na nyid brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-19: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-20: de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-22: zhugs na zhes bya ba 'di'i don bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-23: bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-24: zhes bya ba 'di dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang ma bskur ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-25: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dbang bskur ba rnams ni /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-26: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i slob dpon nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon nyid du legs par byin gyis brlab par mdzad de zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-28: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-29: gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-30: 'dir ni dbang ma bskur ba des kyang /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-31: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bris te zhugs na /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-32: de lta na yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i 'bras bu thob bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:139a-33: deng nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-34: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:139a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtogs pa dang zhes bya brgyud gzhan dag nas gsungs pa dag tu yang /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-0: dngos grub thams cad la zhes bya ba sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa rnams la bdud la @139b sogs pas zil gyis mi non pas na mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-1: de dag nyid kyis gsod par mi nus pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-3: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-4: de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-5: rjes su gnang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsol te /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-6: de'i rjes thogs nyid la bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-7: zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-8: slob ma rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-12: dar dpyang gi dbang bskur ba byin la aa zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-14: de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-15: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-16: sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-17: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can thams cad la phan pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-18: bde ba'i rnam par smin pa rgya chen por 'gyur ba'i las rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-19: de'i phyir ni de rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-20: bstan pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-21: de yongs su skyong zhing nyams su len ba ni grub pa ste de'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-22: rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-23: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-28: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-29: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba des bzlas brjod dam /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-31: dge ba'i las gzhan gang yang rung ba de //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-32: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-34: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa spangs pas /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-35: dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la bya ba'i rgyud las bshad pa'i stan la sogs pa'i nges pa'i gnod pa spangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-36: ci bde bar thams cad kyis shig ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-37: de ltar dam tshig byin nas de nas de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bza' ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-39: gnas pa rnams kyis slob ma rnams longs spyod du gzhug cing /
T02TD2512.1E:139b-40: 'byor pa ci yod pas yang dag par tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:139b-41: de nas mtshan ma bzhi po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-1: chub kyi sems rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ne'u gsing dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-2: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-5: gos la sogs pas gang ba'i snod dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-7: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-8: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'byor pa ji lta bas skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-9: mi bskyod pa'i rigs la ni ne'u gsing sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-10: rin po che'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa rnams la ni ji skad du bshad pa'i snod do //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-11: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa rnams la ni stan no //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-12: don yod par grub pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-13: 'di ni 'dir skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-14: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-15: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-16: de nas de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-17: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bshad pa rnams ni /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-18: thams cad du song ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-19: dam tshig chen po yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-20: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la yang nye bar gdags pas dam tshig chen po zhes bshad de /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-21: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-22: de nas de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas brtsams te sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don slar yang gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-23: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-24: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas 'di las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-26: bum pa rnams kyang rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rjes aa zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140a-27: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-29: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis rdo rje bsdu ba byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:140a-30: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-0: @140b mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-1: aa zhes bya ba zlos shing gsang ba'i lcags kyus rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-2: rang ge gnas su bcug ste rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad cing /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-7: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-8: aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-10: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i ljags la de bzhin du aa zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-11: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-12: phyag rgya chen po dag bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-17: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-19: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-20: dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pas mchod bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-26: ba lang gi khyu la sogs pa phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnams kyang 'byor bar gyur na mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-27: me tog la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-28: de nas yid kyi mchod pa byas la phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-29: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-30: ji skad du bshad pa'i gos dang /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-31: rgyan dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-32: phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:140b-33: de nas aom sarba yo gtsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-34: zhes bya bas byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-35: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs la rang gi snying gar gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-36: aa zhes bya bas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la des bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-37: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-38: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02TD2512.1E:140b-39: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-1: nas sgo na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-2: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-3: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-4: badzra badzra aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-5: slob dpon shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-6: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-7: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-8: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-9: yang yid kyis zhugs pas 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-10: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la badzra spho ta bam zhes bya ba dang yid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-11: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-14: rdo rje 'bebs pas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-15: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-16: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha su to she //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-17: su su kham badzra satva aaddya siddhya mam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-18: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-21: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-22: rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-23: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag 'grub //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-25: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya mam //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-26: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-27: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-28: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-29: yang g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya phye nas /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-30: bdag nyid la dbab par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-31: aa aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas so //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-32: de nas aa zhes bya bas me tog der bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-33: de nas de blangs la rang gi mgo la de nyid kyis bcings bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-34: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-35: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-37: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-38: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por rang bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-39: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:141a-40: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bstan nas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141a-41: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-0: @141b bdag nyid dbul ba'i tshul gyis snying gar bzhag nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod de sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-1: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-2: de nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-3: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing rdo rje thal mos bskor bas phyag bya zhing me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-4: dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-5: de la dang po kho nar dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje'i me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-6: aom ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha sa ma yo da ka siddha aa bhishnytsi sa rba su kha so ma na sya ni aa ddya ku ru ku ru dza: h'um bam ho: aa zhes bya ba brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-7: de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-8: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen por gsungs pa'i gnas rnams su rang gi lus la lha thams cad dgod par byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-9: phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis 'dug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-10: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-12: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-13: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-14: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa aa zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-15: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-16: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-20: bris pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan rdo rje rin chen yongs su bzlas pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-23: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-24: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-25: de nas me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:141b-27: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-28: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-29: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-30: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2512.1E:141b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-1: pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-3: lung bstan pa dag kyang blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-4: de nas yang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-5: ci 'dod par bzlas pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-6: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-8: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-9: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-10: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-12: slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-13: 'di ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-14: de nas sngom pa sbyin par 'os pa'i slob ma la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-15: de nas de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa yang byed du bcug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-16: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-17: de rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-18: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-19: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-20: deng khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-21: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la brjod par mi bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-22: dad pa med par yang ma byed cig /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-23: de nas lnga po bsdus pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-24: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-25: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gsang //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsgrub pa //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-27: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-28: rigs rnams kun gyis khyod brlag 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-29: aom ma h'a su kha ha na sa ma ya aa dhi kra ma mi su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-30: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-31: phyi rol gyi sgo la mngon par phyogs nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-32: bdag nyid 'jug pa'i tshul du bcug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-33: cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyod la /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-34: dam tshig 'di slob ma rnams kyi rna bar bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-35: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-36: bstan pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-37: rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-38: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-39: lhag ma rnams ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142a-40: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-42: // / de ltar dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:142a-43: dam tshig thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-0: slob dpon gyi dngos grub kyi ye shes @142b bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-2: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-3: 'dis bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-6: ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-7: 'di dag ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-8: de nas des de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog bsgrub pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-9: ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgrub pa bshad pa de bzhin du /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-10: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub pa la yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-11: dngos grub mchog rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-12: ji ltar der rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris la sangs rgyas nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi dngos grub kyi mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du 'dir yang grub par bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-15: zla ba nya nas brtsams nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-16: ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur pas /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-17: dang po bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-18: rdo rje tshig gis aa zhes bya ba ji srid zla ba gcig gis sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ba de ji srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:142b-19: / de nas ras la rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya dang por brtsam zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-20: phyis ci bder bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-23: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-24: de bzhin du gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-25: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-27: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i sbyong bas zla ba phyi ma nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-28: de'i tshe mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-29: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong ba stsal nas /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-30: sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-31: gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:142b-32: snga ma bzhin du bsnyen pa byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:142b-33: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig po ras la bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-2: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-4: de nas zla ba phyi ma'i nya la bab pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-5: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-7: ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-8: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-9: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-10: ma bsgrubs pas kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-11: de nas ras ris grub pa ma bsgrub pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-12: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-13: ye shes babs pa med kyang zhes ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-14: gang zhig ye shes babs par gyur pa de la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-15: las rnams bklags pa tsam nyid kyis shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-16: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i mchod pa ni ;
T02TD2512.1E:143a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-20: ji snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-21: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-22: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bde ba gang zhig byung bar gyur pa de rnams ni chung du dang /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-23: 'bring dang chen po rnams ji snyed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-24: ji ltar thob pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-25: de rnams dbul ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid du sems can thams cad bskyed par yang dang yang du bsgoms pas phul ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-26: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-27: sangs rgyas ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-28: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-29: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-30: de rnams la mchod par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-31: bdag phul bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-32: phyag 'tshal ba bzhi'i sbyor bas bdag nyid phul nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:143a-33: dkon mchog gsum ni sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:143a-36: 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-0: sangs rgyas chos dang @143b dge 'dun ni //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-1: dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-2: ras la dkon mchog gsum dang ni //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mchog bri //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-4: zhes bya la sogs pa bshad pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-5: de rnams la mchod par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-6: me tag la sogs pa'i bzlas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
T02TD2512.1E:143b-10: lha mo dpal chen bzhi'i snying po bzla zhing phyag rgya dang ldan pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-12: khams gsum na spyod pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-13: de rnams la mchod pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams su bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-14: khams gsum pa rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgoms pas /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-15: des khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par byang ngo zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-16: thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-17: khams gsum gyi rdo rje rgyas par 'khor lo chen po thog ma med pa las byung ba bsgoms pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-18: khams gsum ma lus pa na spyod pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-19: bzlas pa ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-20: bzlas pa des sems can thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-21: chos thams cad bsdus pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-22: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-23: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-25: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi nye bar len pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:143b-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po 'don pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-28: rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-29: thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi 'don pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-30: des byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa'i chos rnams bsdus par gyur pa yin zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:143b-31: de lta bu'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-0: bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas so zhes bya @144a * //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-2: gang gi tshe sgrub pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bdud dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul las rnal 'byor pa'i sems phyir phyogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa mthong na ;
T02TD2512.1E:144a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sa gnon gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-4: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-5: aa zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-6: de lta bu brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas ni bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-8: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-9: aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-12: yang bdag nyid des dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-13: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid la rgyan thams cad gdags par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-14: de lta bus ni dbang thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-15: chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-16: de'i thob pa nyid ni rnyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-18: rdo rje padma la lta bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-19: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje padma la lta ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-20: de chos nyid thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-21: de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings pas /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-22: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam bar dag par bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-23: aa zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-24: de lta bus ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las ni 'gro ba'i don bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-28: de'i dngos grub ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-29: de thob pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:144a-31: thams cad rdo rje'i las kyi mchog gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:144a-32: dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la /
