T02TD2512.1E:160a-3: byang chub kyi sems chen pos 'dod pa'i khams la sna tshogs pa'i tshul du rnam par rtog pa'i khams gsum po thams cad kyi chags pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags so //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-4: de'i rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin nyid de des ni zhe sdang thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-5: 'jig rten ni 'jig pas na 'jig rten no //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-6: de ni khams gsum po ste 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-7: de la 'dod chags kyi rnam pa ni byang chub chen po'i sems la rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-8: gnod sems kyi rnam pa thams cad ni zhe sdang thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-9: de'i rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-10: zhe sdang thams cad kyi rnam par dag par gyur pa ni zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-11: de'i don du 'jug par 'gyur zhing rgyur gyur pas rab tu sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-13: 'dod chags thams cad ni rmi lam lta bur rtogs par thob pas /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-14: zhe sdang thams cad rmi lam lta bur rtogs par gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-15: rjes su chags pa med pas zhe sdang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-16: dri ma thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems chen po la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul du shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gti mug thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-17: de'i rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-18: dri ma thams cad rnam par dag par gyur pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-19: dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-20: des ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-21: de yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa rnams ni sdig pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-22: de'i rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-23: gti mug dang bral bas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-24: gti mug med pas na nye bar spyod pa la kun du spyod par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-25: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems chen po de nyid la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul du phyi'i rnam par rtog pa gzugs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-26: sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya la rnam par rtog pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:160a-27: de'i rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:160a-28: de'i rnam par dag par gyur pa ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyi ste /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-0: des sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la @160b 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-1: tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la mngon par zhen pa ni sems can thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-3: de rnams rnam par dag pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-5: chos thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur bas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-6: de la dmigs pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-7: shes pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug thams cad ni shes pa thams cad de ji skad du bshad pa'i shes pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-8: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-9: shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ni shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis so //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-10: de ni 'jig rten du ji skad bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur par sgrub par byed do //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-12: rnal 'byor pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-13: gti mug thams cad dang chos thams cad sgyu ma dang mtshungs par rtogs pas me long lta bu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-16: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-17: de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa'i ngo bo nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-18: shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-19: lag na rdo rje gang la la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:160b-20: 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thob pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa de ni ji skad du bshad pa'i 'dod chags thams cad de 'dod pa'i khams thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-21: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-22: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis gnas nas mchog tu 'gyur pa'i 'dod pa rnams la yongs su longs spyod par byed du zin kyang snga ma bzhin du 'dod chags kyi nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:160b-23: ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi glo bar ba'i dri ma rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-0: myur du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go @161a * //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-2: / de ltar de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-3: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-4: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-5: byang chub chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-6: don gyi gnas 'di nyid ces bya ba 'dod chags rnam par dag pa la sogs pa'i gnas lnga po bshad ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-7: yang rgya cher ston cing zhes bya ba ni sngar gsungs pa'i tshig dang yi ge dang don las gzhan du gyur pa dag gis hr'i: zhes bya ba'i yi ge sprul nas yang ston par mdzad pas na yang rgya cher ston cing zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-8: de bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te zhes bya ba ni zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-9: padma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis padma dmar po blangs nas bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas de 'byed la /
T02TD2512.1E:161a-10: ji skad gsungs pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la blta zhing rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-11: 'gro ba thams cad ni padma'i rigs te de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir padma'i gzugs sna tshogs pa zhes ming du btags pa'i hr'i: zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni snying po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-12: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'i 'chad par 'gyur ba blo la bzhag nas smras pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-13: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:161a-14: padma'i rigs bskyed par bya ba'i phyir nges par bskyed par mdzad nas hr'i: zhes bya ba gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-15: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni hr'i: zhes bya ba gsungs pa tsam gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-16: padma chen po de las zhes bya ba ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug padma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad pa de las so //
T02TD2512.1E:161a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-0: de dag nyid la sogs pa gang yin @161b pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-1: de rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-2: de rnams kyang khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-3: bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma chen po las mngon par byung bas na /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-5: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra zhing padma'i mtshan ma dang padmas mtshan pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-7: padmas mtshan par nges par byung nas zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-8: nges par byung nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas brtsams te bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-10: de nas 'dus pa mdzad pa sngon du 'gro ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-11: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-13: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-14: sngon du bsnyen pa'i las byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-15: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-16: chos thams cad ces bya ba la chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-17: 'dod chags la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa rnams dang padma'i rigs so //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-18: de dag nyid la gzigs pa ni ye shes gang gis so sor rtog par mdzad pa de nyid ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa'i ye shes te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o zhes nges pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-19: des dbang phyug tu gyur pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-20: de'i ye shes ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad nges par byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:161b-21: ye shes de nyid phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-22: gang la ming de skad ces bya ba de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:161b-23: ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-1: snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-2: 'gro ba thams cad ni sems can gyi khams te de gang gis 'dul bar gyur pa de ni /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-3: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-4: 'di zhes bya ba de ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-5: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-6: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-7: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas mtshan ma thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes ston par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-8: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-9: nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyi dbus su dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-10: de bzhin du sgo dang mtshams rnams su bcas pa bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de kho na nyid bsdus par 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dkyil 'khor dbus ma sgo bzhi la bltas pa dang mtshams bzhi ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyang sgo dang bcas par de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-11: de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig bzhi sa thig btab pa la ni zhes bya ba ni de ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-12: shar dang nub dang byang dang /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-13: lhor thig bzhi btab pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-14: dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i cho ga 'dis thig bzhi dang thig gdab pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-15: tshon dmar pos ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-16: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba ka ba brgyad kyi tshul gyis bris pa'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ste /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-17: padma'i lte ba la padma'i gdan la 'jig rten dbang phyug bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-18: de'i mdun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162a-19: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la shar lho mtshams su padma chen po la sa 'dzin lha mo ming shr'i zhes bya ba phyag g-yon pa padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162a-20: g-yas na gter gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162b-0: lho @162b nub mtshams su padma chen po rgya mtsho ming hr'i: zhes bya ba phyag g-yon pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-1: g-yas na sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-2: nub byang mtshams su padma chen po nyi ma'i ming gi zhes bya ba phyag g-yon pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-3: g-yas na padma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:162b-4: / byang shar mtshams su padma chen po rlung gi lha mo ming dh'i: zhes bya ba phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-5: g-yas na ba dan bsnams pa legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162b-6: shar phyogs kyi sgor padma chen po chags pa'i mtshon cha'i mtshan ma bud med kyi gzugs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-7: lhor padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug gi mtshan ma sprul gyi gzugs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-8: nub tu padma chen po nag po'i mtshan ma phag gi gzugs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-9: byang du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i mtshan ma padma'i gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162b-11: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor bas 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-12: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-13: ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162b-14: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum po bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-15: bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-16: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su thig legs par gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-17: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2512.1E:162b-18: de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi ri mo gnyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi la mngon sum du bltas pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-19: mtshams bzhi po ri mo gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-20: padma'i phreng bas kun du mnyes par mdzes par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-21: nang gi dkyil 'khor sgo med par bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:162b-22: 'dir ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du padma 'dab ma brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-0: de nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma rnams la dbus su bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug g-yon snyems pas rdo rje padma 'dzin cing thugs ka'i phyogs su 'byed par mdzad pa sku mdog dmar skya zhal 'dzum dmul ba sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs @163a * //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-2: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-3: zla ba'i 'od can bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-4: de'i shar gyi padma'i 'dab ma la padma chen po sku mdog dmar ba /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-6: me tog padma dang mda' gzhu bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-7: de'i lho phyogs su padma chen po gtum po'i dbang phyug sku mdog nag po dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-8: khros pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-9: de la phyag g-yas gnyis na tri sh'u la dang padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-10: g-yon gnyis na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-11: de'i rgyab tu padma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-12: sku mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-13: de la phyag g-yas gnyis na padma dang 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-14: g-yon gnyis na dbyig pa dang dung bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-15: de'i byang du gnas pa'i padma la padma chen po mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-16: sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-18: g-yas na dbyig pa dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-19: g-yon gnyis na padma dang ril pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-20: shar lho'i mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab mar sna tshogs padma la /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-21: padma chen pos 'dzin sa chen po 'dzin pa g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-22: de la phyag gnyis kyis gcig la gcig bzung ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-23: phyag g-yon pa 'degs pas sa 'dzin par mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-24: yang phyag g-yon pa gnyis na dung dang padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-25: g-yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyig pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-26: lho nub mtshams su padma chen po rgya mtsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po gdengs ka brgyad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-28: g-yon na sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-29: nub byang gi mtshams su padma chen po nyi ma sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yas na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-30: g-yon na padma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-31: byang shar mtshams su padma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-32: sku mdog nag po phyag g-yas na ba dan bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:163a-33: g-yon na padma bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-34: lhag ma rnams ni sngar smras pa bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:163a-35: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni hr'i: zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-0: de la padma chen po chags pa'i @163b 'dod chags ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-1: don thams cad la chags pa nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-2: de ston pa'i mtshan ma ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma bud med kyi gzugs zhes bya ba bud med kyi lus te /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-3: des ni de'i ngo bo nyid du ston te /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-4: bud med chags pas 'gro ba bde byed phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-6: padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug ni zhe sdang ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-7: byang chub kyi sems chen po des gdug pa rnams la sdang ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po zhes bya ba'i chos nyid de ston pa'i byang chub kyis zhe sdang bzlog par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-8: de'i mtshan ma ni sprul gyi gzugs zhe sdang ngo bo nyid med par ston pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-9: zhe sdang ni drag po'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-10: padma chen po nag po ni gti mug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-11: byang chub kyi sems chen po'i mtshan nyid can de la lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis rnam par rtog pas dbang phyug la sogs pa yongs su brtags pas gdul bya rnams yongs su 'khrul par gyur pa la de rnams kyi dngos po la mngon par zhen par spang bar bya ba'i phyir gti mug mnyam pa nyid ston par mdzad pas de'i tshul gyis na gti mug la khyab 'jug ces bshad do //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-12: de'i mtshan ma ni phag gi gzugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-13: chos nyid de ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-14: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni thar pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-15: kun du dga' ba tshangs pa'i bzhi //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-16: zhes zer ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-17: de'i phyir de'i mtshan ma ni padma ste /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-18: des dri ma thams cad dang bral ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:163b-19: de ltar mtshan ma de rnams kyis mtshon pa'i don bshad pas gdul bya rnams kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgoms nas thar pa chen po'i grong khyer gyi sgo 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga'i ngo bo nyid rtogs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-20: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer byang chub chen po'i sems la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:163b-21: de bas na 'di dag ni sgo rnams su bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:163b-22: / de nas gos dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la slob dpon ras dkar po la padma'i rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa des smad g-yogs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-0: gdong g-yogs byas la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa'i padma'i rigs @164a * //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-1: kyi slob dpon ni 'di ltar rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar 'dam gyi nang na gnas kyang 'dam gyis mi gos /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-5: rang bzhin gyis kha dog mar po'i padma dmar po ni rang bzhin gyis kha dog dmar po la rang gi nyes pa chu las byung ba'i 'dam pa la sogs pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-6: gang na zhe na 'dam gyi nang na'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-7: de bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bag chags dang bcas pa khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams med par thugs rje chen po'i 'dod chags kyi chags pa ni 'dod chags dang /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-9: gti mug la sogs pa 'khor ba'i mtsho'i dbus na 'khor ba nas byung ba nyes pa rnams kyis mi gos pas na de ltar zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-10: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra gnyis pa ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-11: ji ltar padma 'dam gyi nang na dmar du zin kyang chu'i nyes pas mi gos so //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi nang du skyes shing thugs rje chen po'i chags pas chags su zin kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-13: de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-14: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thugs rje chen po'i chags pas chags kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'khor ba'i chu'i nyes pa las nges par grol ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-15: de bzhin du las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o zhes bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-16: yang dang yang du mngon sum du byed la /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-17: snying rje chen po'i chags pas chags na blo ldan zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-18: nyon mongs pa can du gyur kyang zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs can dang /
T02TD2512.1E:164a-19: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang ldan du zin kyang ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-20: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas //
T02TD2512.1E:164a-21: myur du byang chub mchog thob 'gyur //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-0: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pas myur ba nyid du mngon par rdzogs @164b par sangs rgyas shing /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-1: sangs rgyas nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-2: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du byed pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-4: de bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ni dbang phyug nyid du 'thob par 'gyur zhing rtog par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-5: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas rang dbang du spyod par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so zhes bya ba ni rang dbang du gyur pa thugs su chud pa des de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i don las /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-7: bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-8: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i dus nas nye bar bzung nas so //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-9: bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnam par dag pa de thugs su chud pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-10: rjes su mthun pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su thob pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-11: dus ji srid cig gis bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-12: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-13: ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon sum du ma byas pa de'i bar du /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-14: de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ku dang gsung dang thugs thob pa la gegs su gyur pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-15: myur du 'tshang rgya ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-16: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-17: ji ltar slob dpon gyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bzlas ma thag tu bshad pa de bzhin du padma'i slob ma rnams kyi yang shes par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-18: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gti mug gi gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes rnam pa lnga ni ye shes te /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-19: de las byung ba'i padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:164b-20: de nas gos dkar po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:164b-21: 'di'i bar gyi don yang 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-1: dkyil 'khor bris nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-2: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i padma'i me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-3: lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-4: bum pa gang ba rnams hr'i: zhes bya bas re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-5: rdo rje bsdus pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-7: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-9: hr'i: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug pa la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad do //
T02TD2512.1E:165a-10: mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-11: rab dang dra ba dag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-12: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-13: rdo rje bsung bas bsrungs pa thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-14: hr'i: zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-15: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-16: dri dang dri shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-17: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-18: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-19: hr'i: zhes bya ba dang bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165a-20: rdo rje thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis pa snyams la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-21: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-22: padma'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar bya ba 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-23: padma chen po'i phyag rgya yang 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:165a-24: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya padma'i me tog dang ldan pa bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-25: de nas lce la hr'i: zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin bsam zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-26: lha thams cad kyi ljags la yang bsam pa 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165a-27: aa las snying gar sna tshogs padma bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-28: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya hr'i: zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-29: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-30: padma'i khu tshur bcings la g-yas pas g-yon pa dbye ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165a-31: gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya chen po nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:165a-32: de nas hr'i: zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar padma bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:165a-33: phyag rgya chen po bris pa'i rjes su mthun par hr'i: zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang bskur ba dang padma'i @165b phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-1: snga ma bzhin du mchod yon dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-4: na bza' bla re la sogs pa yang phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-5: me tog gi shing la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-6: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang rol mo dang rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-7: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:165b-8: de nas mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-9: aom las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-10: dpag bsam gyi shing dang kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-12: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo dpral ba'i phyogs su sbyar la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-13: aom sarba bitp'u ra p'u ra /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-14: su ra su ra a'a ba rta ya a'a barta ya ho: / de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-15: ras dkar po la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas te gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-16: gnyis pas stod g-yogs byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-17: yang gcig la rta mgrin la sogs pa sgo srung bzhi'i snying po bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-18: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-19: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-20: rdo rje padma rdo rje lte ba lta bu'i snying gar padma'i khu tshur bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-21: snga ma bzhin du sgo la mngon par phyogs nas gnas pa'i dbus su bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-22: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can padma'i me tog dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-23: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-24: badzra badzra hr'i: zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165b-25: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-26: raom hya gri ba ma h'a padma aam ku sha a'a karsha ya sh'i ghram sarba padma sa ma ya padma aam ku sha dha ra h'um dza: zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-27: rta mgrin gyis bdag nyid dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165b-28: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-29: aom aa mo gha padma p'a sha kro dha a'a karsha ya bra be sha ya ma h'a pa shu ba ti ya ma ba ru na ku be ra bra hma be sha dha ra sarba padma ku la sa ma y'am h'um h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-30: yang bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:165b-31: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:165b-32: aom padma spho ta bandha sarba padma ku la sa ma y'a sh'i gharam h'um bam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-0: @166a * // padma'i lcags sgrog gis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-1: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-2: aom shan mu kha natku m'a ra be sha dha ra padma sha na ta ya /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-3: a'a be sha ya sarba padma ku la sa ma y'am sarba mu dra bandha ya /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-4: sarba siddha yo me pra yatstsha padma a'a be sha ya aa aa aa aa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-5: padma'i 'bebs pas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-6: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-7: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-8: su to shyo su su kho badzra satva siddhya m'am zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-9: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-10: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-12: ma h'a r'a ga ma h'a soo khya /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-13: ma h'a badzra ma h'a dha na /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-14: ma h'a dznya na ma h'a karma badzra satv'a a'adya siddhya m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-16: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya h'am /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-17: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la bdag nyid 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-18: dang po kho nar sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la sems ma rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-19: de nas aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes brjod de /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-20: sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya sbyar la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-21: yang hr'i: aa zhes lan brgya brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-23: de nas hr'i: zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-24: de nas des blang la de nyid dang rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-25: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-26: de nas de nyid zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-27: shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-28: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-29: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-30: de nas 'gro ba 'dul pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-31: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-32: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas rang gi dngos grub stsol bar mdzad pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-33: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-34: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-35: rdo rje padma la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:166a-36: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166a-37: de nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-0: bcom ldan @166b 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-1: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams kyang blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-2: de la dang ba kho nar dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las aom ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166b-3: de nas bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-4: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen po las gsungs pa'i gnas su rang gi lus la 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa legs par bkod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-5: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-6: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-8: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod de /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-9: padma'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-10: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa hr'i: zhes bya ba 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-11: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166b-12: de nas 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-16: bris pa'i dbu rgyan 'od dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pas /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-17: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-18: 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma'i phreng ba'i sngags yongs su bzlas pas yang bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-19: dar dpyangs bcing ba yang byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-23: ming gi dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-24: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166b-25: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs la bsnyems pas bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-26: lag pa g-yas pas rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su kha 'byed cing /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-27: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje brtul zhugs stsol bar mdzad bzhin bar yang bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-28: aom padma ha sta badzra dharma tvam pha la ya zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:166b-29: yang 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-30: rdo rje chos nyid de ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2512.1E:166b-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos nyid ston par mdzad par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-2: 'dam gyi nang na dag pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-3: 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-6: de ltar brtul zhugs blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-7: me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mtshod [?] la /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-8: padma'i mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-9: de nyid kyis ni padma bzung //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-11: de kho na nyid 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-12: bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'phags pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-13: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-14: dag pa'i rol mos gar mdzad cing //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-15: gdul ba yi ni thabs rnams mdzad //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-16: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-17: zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-18: de ltar padma dmar po ni //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-19: mtshon gyis nyes dang gnas pa yi //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-20: nyes pa du mas mi gos te //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-21: de bzhin khams gsum dag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-22: dam tshig gi mi phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-23: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-24: zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-25: bya ba gang dang gang gis ni //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-27: padma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag / de dang des ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-28: zhes bya ba 'di dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-30: snying po blangs la tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-32: lung bstan pa bcom ldan 'das las mnos te /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-33: yang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-34: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-35: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-37: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-38: padma'i slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-39: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-40: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-41: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-42: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167a-43: de nas sngom pa dpog par 'os pa'i slob ma sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-44: byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-45: de'i snying gar de bzhin du padma bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-46: da 'gro ba 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-47: spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:167a-48: yon gyi mchod blangs la sgo'i phyogs su bltas nas gnas pa'i bum pas dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-0: @167b bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-1: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-2: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-4: // /'gro bar 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-5: slob dpon gyis 'di las gsungs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes bslabs par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-6: sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-7: sgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs la snying po blangs nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-8: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba ras la sogs pa la bris pa'i sku mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-9: de'i sbyor bas mdun du spyan drangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-10: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-11: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas yod pa'i rdo rje padma la hr'i: zhes bya ba rnam par bkod la de nyid dpag tu med par nyin re zhing bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-13: ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-14: de nas dang po rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya dang bri ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-16: dkyil 'khor du yang des dang por brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-18: de yang dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-19: gzhan dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-20: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi ras kyi ri mo'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-21: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-22: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-23: sngon du bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba ji srid du zla ba gnyis pa'i nya la thug gi bar du bzlas brjod de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-24: de nas de'i mtshan thog thag phyag rgya ma bkrol bar ci nas kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-25: de nas tho rangs ka bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-26: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-27: ras kyi ri mo dang po'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:167b-28: de nas ras kyi ri mo gnyis pa'i cho ga ni sngon du bsnyen pa de bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:167b-29: ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba dpa' bo gcig pu bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-0: de nas de'i spyan sngar phyag @168a * //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-1: rgya chen po la gnas pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-2: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas tho rangs bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-3: de bzhin du dngos grub rnams stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-4: ras kyi ri mo gnyis pa'i bsgrub pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-5: de nas ma bsgrubs kyang zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-6: thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad rang dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-9: padma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sbyor bas hr'i: zhes bya ba lan stong yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-13: mi la sogs pa gzhan dag la dbul zhing sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-14: padma de kha dog dmar zhing 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis bsgrubs par bya ba dmar po bsam par bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-15: de lta bus ni rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-16: thams cad gsang pa la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-17: sems can mang po la 'khu zhing gsod pa la sogs pa rnams la 'dul ba'i dbang gis nye bar bzung ste gsad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-19: padma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-20: padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug ni padma chen po'i khro bo'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-21: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni padma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-24: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas mig gdangs shing khro gnyer bsdus te 'dis padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-25: khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir gdul ba'i phyir skye bo rnams la yid kyis de gsad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168a-26: de nas gdul bya de rnams padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:168a-28: shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-0: thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ba la ni zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyun thams cad de de rnams rmongs par bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa @168b bsal nas /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-1: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhag pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-2: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la 'khu ba la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dran pa nyams par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-3: rang ngam gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-5: padma chen po phag gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-6: padma chen po sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po ni padma chen po phag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-9: bcom ldan 'das padma chen pos 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-10: bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can thams cad de'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-11: de ltar na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'das rmongs par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-12: de rtog par 'gyur ba'i stobs kyis rmong par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-13: sems can gyi khams gdug pa rnams kyang dran pa gzhig pa'i bsam pas bsgoms na de kun du rmongs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-14: nyon mongs pa thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-15: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa ni de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-17: padma chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-19: sa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du bya ba ni rgyal po thams cad thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-20: sa la skyil mo krung bcas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-22: gang rgyal po 'dod pa des ni bcom ldan 'das padma chen po'i nag po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-23: bsnyen pa byas nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su sa la skyil mo krung bcas la /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-24: bzlas pas stong phrag brgya byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-25: zla ba nya la mtshan yal nangs su bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-26: de nas nang par rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:168b-27: chu thams cad dgug pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das padma chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-28: chu drang ba'i bsam pas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gzugs bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-29: gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-32: dbang du bya ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:168b-33: de'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-0: @169a * // bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169a-1: thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-2: nyi ma'i snang ba la sogs pa bya bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das padma chen po nag po'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-3: de'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bzung nas mun pa'i phyogs su nyi ma 'bar ba rab tu gtong ba rang gi lus las gtong bar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-4: de lta bus ni snang bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:169a-5: rlung thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bhe ram pa ldang bar 'dod pas /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-6: bcom ldan 'das padma chen po rlung gi sbyor bas de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-7: de'i rjes thogs nyid la rlung thams cad bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-8: ji skad du bshad pa'i rlung thams cad dgug sa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-11: dbang du bya ba rnams bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169a-12: nyon mongs pa thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169a-13: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:169a-14: de'i dam tshig ni padma'i rigs te /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-15: ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-16: padma'i rigs kyi dbugs dbyung ba'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-18: // / de ltar gti mug gi gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa padma'i rigs bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-19: da ni ser sna'i gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa'i rin po che'i rigs bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-20: de nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-21: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-22: bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i khams tham cad kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:169a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang po zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams thams cad na gnas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i khams gsum mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-25: der nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i rmongs pa dang bral bas rang dbang brnyes pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-26: chos kyis sems can thams cad la rjes su ston par mdzad pas na de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:169a-27: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-0: yang zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag par ston par @169b mdzad pa la ltos nas /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-1: dbang bskur ba sbyin pa la sogs pa yang ston par mdzad pa ni yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de de rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis sems dang sems las byung ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin ba'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'khrud par byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-5: ye shes de las byung ba'i rin po che'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-6: de'i ye shes gang gis 'byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-7: de nyid snying po ste bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-8: ming de skad ces btags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-9: dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems chen po rtogs pa bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-10: spyan drangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-11: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-12: dkyil 'khor du slob ma rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan gang la byin pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-13: lha dang phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni dbang bskur ba byin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-14: khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i dbang bskur ba de byin pas ma lus pa'i 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-15: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams gsum po thams cad du sbyin pa po slob ma rnams kyi bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas chos kyi rgyal po 'thob par 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-16: khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid 'thob pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-17: de'i don du gnas par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:169b-18: nor sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni dbyig dang gser dang rgyal po la sogs pa phyi'i dngos po rnams dang chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spong ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:169b-19: gter dang lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa byin pa ni nor byin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-0: re ba thams cad yongs su @170a * //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-1: rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nor sbyin pa de ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-2: chos sbyin pa ni bcom ldan 'das glegs bam bsnams pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-4: chos kyi don gyi rin po che'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa byin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byin pa ni chos sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-6: chos kyi sbyin pa des chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-7: rmi lam lta bu'i chos rin po che khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-9: rtogs par 'gyur ba ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-10: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni rin po che chen po myang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-12: phyi'i yang zas dang skom dang gos ni zang zing ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-13: de yongs su gtong ba ni zang zing sbyin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-14: des sems can thams cad tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-15: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-16: zang zing gi sbyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-24: bka' bsgo ba'i tshig rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje ni sems can thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-32: de rnams las byung ba'i bde ba gang yin pa de ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bde ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-33: de rnams thob pa ni rnyed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-34: de'i don du gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-35: de ltar de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-36: bde ba thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-37: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-38: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin na //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-39: byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la sems dpa' ni /
T02TD2512.1E:170a-41: nam mkha'i snying po ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:170a-42: bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas te zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-0: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad @170b kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-1: rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha'i snying po la bskul ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-2: de nas de bzhin du rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i rin po cha las byas pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-3: dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-4: tr'am zhes bya ba gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-5: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni tro'm zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de las zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-7: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar gnas pa'i rin po che las so //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-8: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-9: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-10: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rin po che chen po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-11: nor sbyin pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-12: de dag ni dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-13: yo byad thams cad phyung ste zhes bya ba ni phyung bar gyur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-14: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-15: gzhung 'di dag gi ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-16: de nas 'dus pa mdzad nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-17: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-18: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhe bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-20: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-21: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-22: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-23: dbang bskur ba thams cad de rin po che'i rigs so //
T02TD2512.1E:170b-24: de la dmigs pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:170b-25: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-0: sred pa'i rnam pa thams cad @171a * //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-1: ni bsam pa thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub po //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-2: de yang de yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni dngos grub thams cad thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-3: de'i don gyi nor bu rin po che ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-4: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:171a-5: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-6: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-7: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas dkyil 'khor gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-8: 'dis ni mtshan ma thob nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-9: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs bzhin du 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor la yang bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-10: nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i nang du dbus su rin po che zur brgyad pa lta bu'i cha brgyad pa la rdo rje rin po che brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i kab gang du gnas pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-11: de yang ji lta zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-12: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-13: rin po che'i lcug mas kun nas 'khor bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-14: rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba smos pa ni rin po che'i lcug ma 'di'i phyi rol kun nas ri mo gcig gi rab la /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-15: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rtse mo'i gnas su btags pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba'i lcog yod pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-16: rdo rje rin po che'i lcog go //
T02TD2512.1E:171a-17: dkyil 'khor de 'di lta bu 'ba' zhig dang ldan par ma zad kyi /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-18: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-21: rnga yab kyis nye bar mdzes par bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-22: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-25: rnga yab rnams kyis nye bar mdzes shing brgyan pa der yang dag par bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:171a-26: / de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:171a-27: dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po rta bdun gyis drangs pa'i shing rta la bcibs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-0: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang gi dbul rang nyid 'ching bar @171b mdzad cing nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yi shes thugs su chud pa'i thugs kyi bde ba'i rab tu dgyes pas /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-2: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che ston par byed pa /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-3: margad kyi rin po che'i mdog can du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-4: de'i mdun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
T02TD2512.1E:171b-5: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal shar du gzigs pa de'i mdun du zhes bya ba rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su de la mngon du phyogs pas dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su rin po che chen po'i nor stsol ba'i dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su chos chen po rin po che'i glegs bam 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rin po che chen por myang ba zad dang skom thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i ro'i snod 'dzin pa gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-9: de dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-10: phyag g-yas na rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-11: g-yon gyis gdan la brten pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-12: mtshams rnams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-13: nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams su lha mo rin chen gdugs ma rin po che'i gdugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-14: lho nub tu lha mo rin chen rgyal mtshan ma rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-15: nub byang mtshams su lha mo rnga can ma rdza rnga rdung bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-16: byang shar mtshams su lha mo rin chen srog shing ma rin po che'i srog shing bsgreng ba gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-17: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag go //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-18: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rin po che'i cod pan no //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-19: lho phyogs kyi sgor ni rin po che'i bum pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-20: nub phyogs kyi sgor ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-21: byang phyogs kyi sgor ni zas dang skom thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i snod gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:171b-22: de bas na de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:171b-24: rdo rje bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-1: rjes thogs nyid la rang gi cho gas 'jug pa gsungs pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-2: rdo rje thal mo brkyang la mthe bong gnyis bsnyams la /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-3: mdzub mo gnyis dang rtse sbyar nas dpral ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-4: smin mtshams su bzhag pa 'di ni rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-6: de nas brtsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-7: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-8: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:172a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-10: de nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i 'jug pas zhugs nas rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi mgo la bcings te ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen blangs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-11: bdag nyid rin po che'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-12: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-15: ro'i snod dang ngo bo nyid kyi dbang bskur ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams la phul la slob dpon slar 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172a-16: slob ma zhugs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-17: ji ltar slob dpon gyi 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa de bzhin du slob ma rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172a-18: rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i dbang bskur ba spyin pa la sogs pa'i ye shes ni bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pas rin po che dang 'dra bas na rin po che ste /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-19: de las byung ba'i rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:172a-21: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyi sbyor bas de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:172a-22: de ji srid nyin re zhing de mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172a-23: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-0: snga ma bzhin du bar snang gi phyogs su bzhag @172b ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:172b-1: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-2: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-3: de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad la rin po che zur brgyad pa'i dbyibs can /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-4: nor bu'i ka ba brgyad dang yang dag par ldan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-5: phyi rol kun du ri mo gnyis kyi nang na gnas pa'i rin po che'i yal ga'i pa tra'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-6: yang phyi rol kun nas rin po che'i myu gu'i 'dab ma'i phreng bas ri mo gcig pa'i rab zlum por byas pas rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'i tshul 'dzin pas yangs su bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-9: gdugs dang rnga yab kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-10: de nas legs par bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-11: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-12: de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la ji skad du bshad pa'i rtas drangs pa'i shing rta'i steng du sna tshogs padma la /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-13: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-14: lhag ma rnams ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-15: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams kyang dag cing rnyog pa med pa'i nor bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-16: 'dir lha thams cad kyi gnas su tr'am zhes bya bas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-18: de bzhin du yang rnal 'byor chen po byas nas 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung ba'i rin po che'i me tog gi lcug ma las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-19: lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-20: bum pa gang ba rnams la re re zhing yang tr'am zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-21: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye ste bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-23: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod de /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-25: tr'am zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la //
T02TD2512.1E:172b-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-27: mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:172b-28: ra ba dang drva ba dag kyang byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-0: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi bcings nas rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba @173a * //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-2: tr'am zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-3: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-4: tr'am tri shu zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa blta ba byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-5: dza: h'um bom ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-7: aa hom trom zhes lan gsum brjod de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-8: de nas lce la rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-9: lha thams cad kyi ljags la tr'am zhes bya ba bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-11: de nas aa zhes bya ba rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-12: nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya tr'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-13: rin po che'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-14: gcig snying gar bzhag la g-yas pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis nor sbyin pa lta bu 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-15: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis po de nyid dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog pa ni rin po che dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-16: rin po che'i khu tshur bkan la snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-17: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bkan la pang par bzhag pa ni chos rin po che'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-18: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis mgor bzhag pa ni rin po che chen po ro myang ba'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-19: lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po nyid las las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul du bcings nas las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-20: de nas ras la bri ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-21: phyag rgya chen po bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-22: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur ba las snga ma bzhin du mchod yon dang /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-26: bla re la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-27: me tog gi shing la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-28: phyi rol tu glu dang gar dang rol mo dang rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-29: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:173a-30: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:173a-31: aom las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-0: dpag bsam gyi shing dang kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bkod pa sprul @173b nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:173b-1: de rnams 'dis dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-2: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-3: aom sarba bi dp'u ra p'u ra /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-5: a'a barta ya a'a barta ya ho //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-6: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa'i ras ser po gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-9: gnyis pas stod g-yogs byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-10: yang ras gcig la sgo srung bzhi'i snying po bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-11: de la sgo srung bzhi'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-12: aom sarba ratna a'arya a'a ru na /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-13: ma h'a satva bha ga b'an tam /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-14: a'arya a'a k'a sha garbha tso ta ya a'a karsha ya /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-15: aom sarba ratna pra be sha sa ma y'a na /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-16: ma h'a ma ni r'a dza ku la ratna p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-17: aom ma ni bandha h'um bom /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-18: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha ya a'a zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-19: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-21: de bzhin du rdo rje rin po che snying gar bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-22: shar phyogs kyi sgo la bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-23: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-24: de nyid kyi me tog phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-25: badzra badzra tram zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-26: de nas 'phags pa skya rengs lan cig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-27: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la rin po che'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-28: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-29: rin po che'i lcags sgrog gi snying po lan cig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-30: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-31: nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa'i snying pos bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:173b-32: de nas yang de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-34: su dri dha su to sho su su kho /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-38: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag bsal dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-39: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-41: ma h'a r'a ga ma h'a soo khya ma h'a badzra ma h'a dh'a na /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-42: ma h'a dzny'a na ma h'a karma /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-43: badzra sa tva a'adya siddhya m'om /
T02TD2512.1E:173b-44: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-0: @174a * // dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'a /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-1: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-2: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-3: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-4: de nas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis sngags mdzub lags g-yas pa rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas de dbye zhing aa zhes bya ba nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-5: de nas tram zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-6: de nas de blangs la trom zhes bya ba nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-7: de nas trom zhes bya ba zlos shing gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-8: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-10: / de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-11: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-12: de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-13: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-14: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bstan nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:174a-15: dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-16: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la shis pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du snying gar gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-17: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-18: rin po che'i mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-19: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-20: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-21: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-22: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la //
T02TD2512.1E:174a-23: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-24: de la dang po kho nar rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje'i rin po che'i me tog gi yal ga las /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-25: yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-26: bdag nyid 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:174a-27: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen po bshad pa'i gnas rnams su rang gi lus la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa yang dag par bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-0: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi @174b nang du rta bdun dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i steng du sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-1: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te 'dug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-2: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-4: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-5: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-6: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa tr'om zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-7: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-8: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-9: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-10: lugs ma'am brdungs pa la sogs pa'i rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-11: dar dbyangs dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-12: trom zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas pas yang bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-14: rin po che'i dril bu dang bcas par blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-15: bdag po dang ming gis dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-16: de nas dngos grub kyi rin po che'i rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-17: me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod cing rin po che'i mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-18: rdo rje rin po che de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-19: nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-20: thams cad mthong ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-21: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-22: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-23: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-24: rin po che'i dril bu chos kyis dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-25: bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-26: don bsam 'grub pa dam pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-27: 'dod pa de ni rab grub phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-28: 'dod las thar pa'i bde ba che //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-29: zhes bya ba ni chos so //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-30: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-31: 'dod dang bde ba kun gyi phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-32: mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya ste //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-33: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-34: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-35: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:174b-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te snying po bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-37: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-39: lung bstan pa dag mnos nas /
T02TD2512.1E:174b-40: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-2: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-3: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-4: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-5: rin chen slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-6: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-7: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-8: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so; ;
T02TD2512.1E:175a-9: // de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob ma la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-11: de nas de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-12: de 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-13: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-15: sgor mngon par phyogs nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-16: rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-17: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-18: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-20: trom aa aa aa aa zhes lan brgya bzlas so //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-21: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-22: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-24: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-25: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-26: sgrub pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-27: sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa la ras kyi ri mo gnyis gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-28: de'i dngos grub rnams ji skad du gsungs pa de bzhin du 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sgrub pa dang ;
T02TD2512.1E:175a-29: de sgrub pa rnams kyang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175a-31: ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba theb pa rnams kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku ras la bris pa la sogs pa mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-32: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:175a-33: bcom ldan 'das mdun du ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-34: phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-35: rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:175a-36: bzlas brjod dpag tu med pas zla ba gcig gi bar du sngon du bsnyen pa snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-0: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi @175b mal gyi sar ras ris bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-1: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la zla ba gcig gi bar du dpag tu med pa'i bzlas brjod de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-3: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa dang mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-4: nad par bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos zhal bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-5: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-6: de ras kyi ri mo dang po'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-7: de nas ras ris gnyis pa la sgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-8: sngon du bsnyen pa de bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-9: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dba' bo gcig pu ras la bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-10: de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-12: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-13: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-14: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos zhal bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-15: sgrub pa po la nam mkha'i snying po nyid stsol bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-16: de nas ma bsgrubs par zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-17: dbang bskur ba thams cad thob cing zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-18: dbang bskur ba thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-22: sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba rnams te /
