T02TD2512.1E:175b-23: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-26: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-27: de thob pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-29: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-30: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings pa'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-31: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-32: des dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-33: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-34: bsam pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na bsam pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:175b-35: de dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:175b-36: de yongs su rdzogs pa ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-0: nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu @176a * //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-1: med pa byas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-2: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya zhing nyin re zhing yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-4: 'di ni rin po che chen po 'dzin pa nor sbyin gyi dngos grub ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-5: chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-7: padma'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-8: de rnams kyi don ni ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-9: de shes pa ni nges par byas pa'o//
T02TD2512.1E:176a-11: dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-12: rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i nam mkha' de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang blos blta bzhin du bzlas brjod tram zhes bya ba bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-14: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o zhes bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-15: 'dis ni chos rin po che'i dngos grub gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-16: zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa re thams cad thob par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-17: bza' ba la sogs pa ni zas thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-18: zan dron dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-19: khu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni skom thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-20: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-21: ro thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-22: zhib la sogs pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-23: mdar ba dang skyur pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i ro brgya ni 'jig rten pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-24: de rnams thob pa ni rnyed par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-26: nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pas nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas pa stong byas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-27: nyin re ni nyi ma re re zhing pa //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-28: bcom ldan 'das ni rin po che chen po ro myang ba'i gzugs can gyi nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176a-29: bzlas pa stong byas pas ni tram zhes bya ba lan stong gi bar du bzlas pas sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176a-30: rin po che chen po'i ro myang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-0: gdugs chen po thob par bya ba @176b la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-1: rig pa 'dzin pa dang 'khor los sgyur ba nyid la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i rgyal srid thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-3: gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-4: lha mo rin chen gyi sbyor bas rin po che'i gdugs bzung la bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-5: rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-6: lha'i bu la sogs pa gzhan dag las rgyal ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-7: rnam par rgyal ba chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-8: de thob pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-9: de yang rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las gung mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-11: mthe'u chung gi sor mo brkyang la /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-12: srin lag dang mthe'u chung phan tshun sprel ba ni rgyal mtshan mchog ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-14: lha mo rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gi sbyor bas tram ham zhes bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-15: phyag rgya bcings pa de las rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa'i khro bo'i go cha dang /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-16: ya lad bgos par gyur pa sprul pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-17: de rnams kyis bdud la sogs pa'i sde skrag par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-18: de lta bus ni thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-19: grags pa chen po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten gsum du khyad par can du gyur cing /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-20: dga' bar bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi yon tan bsgrags pa ni grags pa chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-21: 'jig rten thams cad yang dag par bsrung zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-22: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las zlog par byed la /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-23: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o zhes snyen pa'i sga thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-24: ming ni rin chen mchog gi rin po che'i slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khams gsum mtha' dag tu rab tu grags pa ni ming ste /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-25: grags pa dang snyan pa chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-26: ming de lta bu thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:176b-28: nyin re zhing sgo thams cad nas bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-29: lha mo rin chen lnga'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-30: snga dro shar phyogs su kha bltas la zla ba dang nyi ma phyed la lhor blta ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-31: phyi dro nub tu blta ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:176b-32: nam phyed na byang du bltas la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-0: bdag po yang yin la chen po yang yin @177a * //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-3: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-6: rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-7: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rin po che'i srog shing 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-8: rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-10: lha mo rin chen srog shing gi sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-11: trom hri zhes bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-12: de lta bus ni bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-13: thams cad dbang bskur ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-14: de nyid rin po che dang chos thams cad mthun pas na rin po che ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-15: de'i dam tshig ni rin po che'i rigs te /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-16: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-17: dpal mchog dang po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu'i rin po che'i rigs kyi dum bu rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-19: // / de ltar ser sna'i gnyen po'i phyogs su rin po che'i rigs bshad nas //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-20: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gcig tu byas pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar sgrub po //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-21: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms pas grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-23: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-24: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du ji skad du bshad pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-25: de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:177a-26: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pas zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-27: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par des pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-28: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar des pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-29: de nyid ni sems can gyi khams thams cad rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-30: de thob pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-31: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:177a-33: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-0: phyag gnyis @177b byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'ching bar mdzad pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-1: rtag pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ji srid par bzhugs pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-2: rgyun gyi rtag pa nyid kyis na rtag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-3: yang zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba sbyin pa la sogs pa gsungs pa la ltos nas /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-4: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra smas so //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di skad du bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-6: de'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'khor ba ji sred par brtan par mdzad pa'i thos pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-8: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje ltar mi phyed par 'gyur ba ste ;
T02TD2512.1E:177b-9: ming de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-11: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni phyag rgya chan po bsgom pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-12: de'i nga rgyal bsgom pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-13: des don ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-15: gang gi phyir phyag rgya chen po thams cad ni gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs so zhes bsgom pa'i rnal 'byar pa ni byang chub chen po'i tshul du skye bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-16: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-17: gsung gi phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ljags so //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-18: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid bsgom pas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-19: des don ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-20: chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-21: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-22: chos dang don dang res pa'i tshig dang /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-23: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-24: de rnams 'thob par 'gyur pa ni rnyed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-26: rgyu nyid du sgrub par byed do //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-27: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-28: lce la rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:177b-30: rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-31: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:177b-32: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-0: ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin @178a * //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-3: lha thams cad kyi sbyor bas rang gi snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje lta bur sems rtse gcig tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-4: de rnams thob pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-5: 'dis kyang don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-6: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-7: rdo rje rnam par bsams nas de'i dbus su bzlas pa byas pa'i snying po bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-8: sgrub pa pos bzlas brjod dam bsgom pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-9: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-10: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-11: lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad rdo rje ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-12: de dag thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thob pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-15: rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-16: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas bzlas brjod dam bsgom pa byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-18: sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-20: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-21: las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa thun mong du gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-23: rang gi snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-24: byang chub kyi sems chen po bsgom pas phyag rgya chen po thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-25: lce la rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-26: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bsgoms pas sngags thams cad gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-27: yang rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-28: de'i dbus su rig pa'i sngags thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-29: dam tshig gi phyag rgya mig yor dang mtshungs par bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-30: chos [?] thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178a-31: rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-32: de'i dbus su bzlas par bya ba'i rig sngags bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-33: las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:178a-34: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-0: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bshad nas gang la la zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob @178b dpon las rna ba'i rnam par shes pas gzung bar 'gyur ba ni thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-1: ston pa ni gzhan rnams la 'chad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-2: dngos grub thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po thams cad grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-3: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni gsung gi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa'o /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-4: shes pa thams cad ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-5: dgos pa thams cad ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-6: 'di nyid kyis don bzhi po nyid ston par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-7: lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas zhes bya ba ni lus dang gnag dang sems thams cad rdo rje nyid thob pas byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-8: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-10: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-11: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-12: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-13: de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-14: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-15: da ni de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-16: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur la bskul ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-19: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba'i phyir snying po 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-20: dam tshig chen po phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-21: phyag gnyis dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya 'ching par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-22: rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-23: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni sprul pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:178b-24: de'i dam tshig ni rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
T02TD2512.1E:178b-25: ming de skad ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-2: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa'o zhes bya bar sbyar te //
T02TD2512.1E:179a-4: aa zhes bya ba gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-5: chos dang dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-6: phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-8: las kyi phyag rgya bdag nyid skyed par byed pas mi phyed par byas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-9: der gyur pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:179a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' de'i rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog gi rgyu ste /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' skyed par byed pa des sangs rgyas nyid dam /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thob pa nyid ni /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas btab pas /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pas sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179a-15: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-16: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar bsdu ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyus rgyas btab pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gsang ba las /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-19: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du dam tshig gi sems dpa' byung ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-20: gsung gi gsang ba las ljags kyi rig sngags rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-21: thugs kyi gsang ba las rdo rje'i gzugs rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-22: sna tshogs rdo rje las sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ba rnams phyung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179a-23: phyung nas kyang dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur yongs su bskor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-24: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-26: bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:179a-27: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:179a-28: gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-0: dam tshig dang dbang bskur @179b ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-2: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-3: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-4: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mthar snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa'i rjes tho gas nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-5: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-7: de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ni sems can gyi khams rnams rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-8: de la dmigs pa rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de mngon sum du mdzad pa'o /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-9: phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-12: las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-13: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-14: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-15: ming de skad ces bya ba ni 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-16: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-17: ting nge 'dzin gsum po ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-18: ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-19: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-20: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i sbyor bas bris la zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-21: 'di dag ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-22: nang du rdo rje thig gi 'khor lo bri'o zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su rdo rje phreng ba zlum por bri'o //
T02TD2512.1E:179b-23: de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par theg btab pa la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i thig gi 'khor lo'i dbus su shar dang /
T02TD2512.1E:179b-26: lhor thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-0: de nas de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gser gyi mdog can rdo rje rtse lnga ba dang @180a * //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-1: bcas pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya gnyis kyis 'ching bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-2: zhal rnam par bzhad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-3: cung zad 'dzum pa dang bcas pas /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-4: aa zhes bya bas yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-5: de bzhin du rdo rje'i sku mchog ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-6: ji srid lha mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i bar du lha thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-7: de nas dam tshig gi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-8: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyod de /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-9: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-11: zhugs nas slob dpon med par yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-12: gang zhig slob dpon yod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-13: de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad don yod par thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-14: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams dang rigs gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa rnams kyang don yod cing 'bras bu dang bcas pas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-15: phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-16: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa ni phyag rgya thams cad de ;
T02TD2512.1E:180a-17: de rnams kyi ye shes ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'o zhes nges par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-18: des dbang phyug tu gyur pa ni rang dbang du gyur pa'i gtso bo'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-19: myur ba ni shin tu skyen pa nyid du'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-21: de nas thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-22: bdag nyid la go bar bya ba'i phyir sku gsung thugs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-23: de yang sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyis gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba sta /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-24: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams bsgom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sbyor ba des sgrub pa po'i rgyud la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad ces bya bar grags shing nges pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180a-25: gang zhig ce na dam tshig ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180a-26: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-0: 'di'i las na ci @180b zhig yin zhe na dngos grub kun ster ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-1: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-2: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-4: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis dngos grub thams cad ster par byed pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-9: las dang phyag rgya rnams gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-10: de nas de'i ngo bo nyid du bsgom pa'i stobs kyis rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-11: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-12: slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar slob dpon gyi 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa de bzhin du slob ma rnams kyi yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-13: phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la phyag rgya thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-14: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-15: de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-16: thams cad rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor bas rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-18: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-19: ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-20: de nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin bsgoms la ;
T02TD2512.1E:180b-21: bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-22: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-23: de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi zlum pho'i rdo rje'i thig ka pa brgyad dang ldan par thig legs par gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-24: de nas legs par bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:180b-25: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:180b-26: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i lte ba'i phyogs su gnas pa'i padma la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog ser po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-0: dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin cing @181a * //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-1: thugs ka'i phyogs su 'tshir brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i cod phan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-3: zhal shar du gzigs pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-4: de'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje sku mchog rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-5: g-yas phyogs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su rdo rje ljags rdo rje smra ba'i cha lugs 'dzin pa phyag na lce bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-6: rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-7: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-8: g-yon logs su rdo rje snyems pa'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje snyems pa'i sku'i cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-9: de'i phyag rgya'i tshul can no //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-10: nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams su lha mo phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba rdo rje khu tshur gyi cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-11: dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-12: lho nub kyi mtshams su lha mo rin chen gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs 'chang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-13: dam tshig gi rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin chen 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-14: nub byang mtshams su bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba 'jig rten dbang phyug gi cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-15: dam tshig padma'i khu tshur gyis padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-16: byang shar mtshams su bcom ldan 'das ma las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dngos po thams cad rdo rje las dang 'dra ba rdo rje khu tshur gyis las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-17: shar phyogs kyi sgor bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje snyems ma bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra ba rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-18: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje ljags ma rdo rje smra pa dang 'dra ba /
T02TD2512.1E:181a-20: nub phyogs kyi sgor ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ma ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i cha lugs 'chang ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-21: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje rdo rje ma rdo rje las dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181a-22: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-0: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying @181b po ni aa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-2: de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-3: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-4: lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-5: gang ba'i bum pa rnams la aa zhes bya ba re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi yongs su phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-7: rdo rje bsdu ba byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-9: aa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug rnas /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-10: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba byas te mtshams bcing ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-11: dra ba dang rab dag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-12: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-13: rdo rje srung bas srung ba thams cad go bskon nas /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-14: aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-15: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-16: a'a: dri shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa la blta bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-17: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham aa zhes lan gsum brjod de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-18: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u chung gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong bcings la ma dzu ba mo bkug pa 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-19: de nas lce la rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-20: aa zhes bya ba lha thams cad kyi ljags la bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-21: 'di ni 'di ltar lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-22: rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-23: lha thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-24: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:181b-25: gcig la gcig btsir ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-26: gnyi ga snyems pa dang bcas pas bstod de 'jog pa 'di ni rdo rje'i sku'i mchog gi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-27: rdo rje gnyis kar bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje ljags kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-28: ting nge 'dzin mchog ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-29: rdo rje gar bskor te bkrol la mkhur ba dang spyi bor 'jog pa ni rdo rje rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:181b-30: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis nges par btsir ba ni lha mo phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-0: nam mkha'i snying po'i las kyi phyag rgya ni lha mo bcom ldan 'das ma nor @182a * //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-2: g-yas kyis g-yon dbye ba ni lha mo ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-3: rdo rje rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid ni lha mo las kyi khu tshur gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-4: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i ni sngar bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-5: rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa'i yang rdo rje sku mchog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-6: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-7: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-8: thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-9: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi thun mong gi snying po ni 'dir aa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-10: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba thams cad dbang bskur la snga ma bzhin du mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-14: bla re la sogs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-15: mchod pa rnam pa lnga byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-16: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang rol mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-19: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-20: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-21: aom zhes bya ba las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-22: dpag bsam gyi shing kha zas ro brgya la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-24: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-27: a'a brta ya a'a brta ya ho: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-28: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-29: sbyin sreg byas nas ras shin tu dmar ba la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-30: de las ras gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-31: gcig gis stod g-yogs byas nas yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi yongs su bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182a-32: de nas phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa yang dag par blangs la byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-33: de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-34: shar phyogs kyi sgo la bltas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:182a-35: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-0: @182b rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-1: badzra badzra aa zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-2: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-3: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-4: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-5: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-6: badzra spho ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-7: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas snga ma bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-8: badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-9: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-14: a'adya siddhya m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-15: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-16: dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-25: badzra satva a'a dya siddhya m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-26: yang 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-27: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-28: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-29: de bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-30: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-31: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-32: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-33: de nas aa zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-34: de nas de blangs la aa zhes bya ba nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-35: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-36: de nas de zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-38: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-39: tishtha badzra zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-40: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-41: de la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-42: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bstan nas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:182b-43: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor bas shis pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar ba zhag la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod de /
T02TD2512.1E:182b-44: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-1: dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-3: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-4: me tog la sogs pa dang dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-5: de la dang po kho nar rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje'i me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi gsang sngags de bzhin du yang bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-6: bdag nyid byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-7: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen po las bshad pa'i gnas rnams su lha thams cad dgod par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-8: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-9: de'i steng du rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug la me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid kyang yang dag par mchod de mchod yon blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-10: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-11: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-12: aom badzra aa bhishinytsa a'a: zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-13: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-14: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-18: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-19: de nas dang po'i rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-20: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur bdag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-23: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-24: phyag rgya kun zhes sbyor bas bsgrags //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-25: dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-26: zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-27: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-28: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:183a-29: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02TD2512.1E:183a-30: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-0: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya @183b cher ;
T02TD2512.1E:183b-1: / byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-3: snying po bzlas nas tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-5: lung bstan pa mnos la yang bdag nyid byin gyis brlab ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-6: ci 'dod par bzlas brjod byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-7: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-8: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-9: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-10: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-11: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-12: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-13: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-14: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-16: // / de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob ma sngar bshad pa'i cho gas sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-17: byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-18: de nas de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-19: de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-20: spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-22: sgor bltas nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur nas rang gi 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug cing dbab par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-23: yang rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pas rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan te /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-24: aa aa aa aa aa zhes bya ba aa lnga lan brgya'i bar du brjod pas dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-25: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:183b-26: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-28: // / da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-29: slob dpon gyi dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-30: sgrub pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-31: sgrub pa dang dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-33: ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur pas /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-34: dang po bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:183b-35: ji srid zla ba gcig gis sngon du bsnyen pa byas par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-0: de nas dang po rdo rje bri @184a * //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-1: ba'i phyag rgyas ras la bri ba 'am 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-3: de yang dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku mchog nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-5: lha mo rdo rje rdo rje'i bar du thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-6: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-8: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-9: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis zhal bstan nas ;
T02TD2512.1E:184a-10: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-11: ras kyi ri mo dang po'i sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-12: de nas ras kyis ri mo gnyis pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-13: sngon du bsnyen pa de bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur dpa' bo gcig pu bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-15: de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-16: de nas zla ba nya nas mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-17: nang par rdo rje khu tshur nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-18: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams kyang de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-19: phyag rgya thams cad bcing pa bsgrub pa la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-21: chos dang dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-22: de rnams bcing ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-23: de'i sgrub pa ni rdzogs par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184a-25: snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-26: phyag rgya de thams cad bcing ba bsgrub pa ni snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas grub par gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-27: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gcig la gcig lta bar snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag la btsir ba 'di ni snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-28: 'di bcings la aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-29: de lta bus ni phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-30: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos bcings la rang gi las la nges par sbyar nas /
T02TD2512.1E:184a-31: rang gi las rnams byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-0: phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni @184b zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-1: phyag rgya thams cad ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-2: de rnams bsgrub pa ni rang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-4: rdo rje chen po'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni ;
T02TD2512.1E:184b-6: rdo rje chen po'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-8: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par 'dod pas /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-9: dang po nyid rdo rje'i thal mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-11: rdo rje bsdams pa dgrol ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-12: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-13: badzra mushti zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-15: aa zhes bya ba gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-16: de nas sgrub pa po de'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rang dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-17: dam tshig thams cad bsgrub par la ni zhes bya ba la dam tshig kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na dam tshig thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-19: de rnams bsgrub pa ni spyan drangs pa rnams rang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-21: rdo rje 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud du mdud pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-23: mthe bong gnyis gshibs nas snying gar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-24: 'di bcings la rang gi lha'i spyan snga'am /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-25: rang gi lus la bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-26: aa zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni dam tshig thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-27: sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-29: sems can gyi khas rnams ni sems can thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-30: de rnams rjes su chags par bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:184b-31: rdo rje chags pa chen bo'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-32: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-33: des mda' 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni rdo rje chags pa chen po'i tshul du bya ba'i rdo rje khu tshur te 'di bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:184b-34: rdo rje chags par bdag nyid rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i sems dpa' @185a * //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-1: rnams yid kyis mdun du gnas pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-2: me tog gi mda' kha dog dmar pos yang dang yang du snying gar bsnun par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-3: aa che ge mo aa nu r'a ga ya ho zhes bzlas brjod byas nas de lta bus ni rjes su chags par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-4: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dbang du bya ba ni thams cad dbang du bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-6: bdag dang nor rang dbang du byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-8: rdo rje bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje bzhad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-9: 'di bcings nas aa zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje bzhad pa mdog dmar por bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-10: bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-11: de bzhin du 'od zer dmar po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba 'khyud cing bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-12: aa che ge mo me ba sham a'a na ya ho //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-13: de lta bus ni 'di dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-14: thams cad bcing ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pas rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag na bsnams pas bdud la sogs pa bcing ba ni thams cad bcing ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-17: rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur chen pos so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-18: rdo rje bsdams pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-19: de nyid ni khu tshur chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-21: yang rnam pa 'di nyid kyis thams cad bcing ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-22: thams cad bsdams pa la ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-24: ma the bo dang mdzub mo rtse sprad de /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-25: bcing ba ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu tshur te 'di bcings la aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-26: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi lag pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog tu bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-27: aa che ge mo bandha ya bam zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-28: bsgrub par bya ba'i rdo rje lcags sgrog dang bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:185a-29: thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:185a-30: ngag gi 'jug pa dang bral ba ni lkugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:185b-0: rdo rje zhal gyi khu @185b tshur gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-1: rdo rje dgun gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-2: rdo rje zhal gyi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-3: 'di bcings la a'a zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-4: bdag nyid rdo rje dgun gyi gzugs su rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-5: bsgrub par bya ba rdo rje kha ba babs pas 'khyag par 'gyur zhing tshig smra mi nus pas rmugs par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-6: de lta bus ni lkugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:185b-7: thams cad btsir ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-8: sngar bshad pa'i sbyor bas gdon pa la sogs pa bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-9: phyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-10: de dang yid kyis blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-11: rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du chud pa dang bsgrub par bya ba btsir bar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-13: thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-14: a'a: h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje khro bor bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-15: g-yas kyi khro bo'i khu tshur ram /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-16: g-yon gyi khu tshur gyis gzhan la sdigs mdzub bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-17: aa che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um zhes bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-18: mdzub mo'i rdo rje las rdo rje 'bar ba sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-19: bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du ltung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-20: de lta bus ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis thams cad gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:185b-21: thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-22: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor bas ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-23: a'a zhes bya ba nyid kyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi skra gyen du brjes pa /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-24: gsus pa che ba zhal nam mkha' ltar tshad med cing mche ba gtsigs pa khro ba chen po 'khrugs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-25: mdog nag por bdag nyid bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-26: de'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-27: bsgrub par bya ba'i sprin la sogs pa des rang gi khar bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-28: aa me gha aa ti aam bhaksha ya h'um zhes bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:185b-29: 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur te 'dis thams cad za bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:185b-30: thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nges par btsir ba'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-31: snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:185b-32: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya ba bzung ba'i bsam pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-1: ba'i bsam pas btsir bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-2: 'dis ni rdo rje nges par btsir ba'i khu tshur 'dis thams cad gzhig par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-3: thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-4: lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-5: bsgrub par bya ba dral ba'i bsam pas dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-6: 'di ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur te 'dis thams cad dral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-7: thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-8: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad dbab pa ni thams cad dbab pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-9: de yang rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la srin lag dang /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-10: mthe'u chung gi bar du mthe bo gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-11: 'di dang aa zhes bya bas thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-12: thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-13: 'di ni rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-14: rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-15: 'dis thams cad gar byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-18: aa zhes bya ba zlos shing thams cad gar byed pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yid kyis gzhug pas bsgrub par bya ba bkang la /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-19: bdag nyid kyis gar byas te des ni thams cad gar byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-20: thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni rdo rje gsung gi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-21: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis pi wang brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni rdo rje gsung gi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-22: 'di bcings la aa zhes bya ba bzlos shing rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis yang dang yang du pi wang brdung ba ltar byas na thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:186a-24: thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-26: snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i 'od can rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:186a-27: 'bar ba des phyogs bcu'i sprin la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba gnon par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-0: @186b 'di ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis thams cad rengs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186b-1: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad lkugs pa dang 'phye bor bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po 'phye bo'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-2: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-3: aa h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la ;
T02TD2512.1E:186b-4: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-5: aa pa ra see n+ya ma mu kha phag kam ku ru h'um /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-6: zhes khros pas bzlas brjod byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-7: phyag rgya bcings la de las rdo rje khro bo rnams sprul te /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-8: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad tshig dang bral bas na lkugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-9: rkang pa 'degs pa'i nus pa dang bral bas na grum por bya ba 'di ni 'phye bo'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:186b-10: gzhan gyi phyag rgya thams cad las sgrol ba la ni rdo rje thal mo'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-11: a'a: zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-12: dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi mthil gnyis su 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya thams cad yid kyis blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-13: dgrol ba de ni rdo rje thal mo'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:186b-14: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-15: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-16: a'a: h'um zhes bya bas dpal he ru kar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-17: dpal khrag 'thung gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'i steng du babs par 'gyur bar bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-18: 'di ni h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:186b-19: gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dbye ba la ni h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-20: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-21: a'a: h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings nas rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-23: srin po la sogs pa'i gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dral ba'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas mkhrig ma bcing ba dral bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-24: 'dis ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-25: ji skad du bshad pa'i las rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:186b-26: phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:186b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gyis las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-0: @187a * // phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams dam tshig gi bcing bas bcings nas aa zhes bya ba zlos pa 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-2: phyag rgya thams cad rdo rjer bya ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad byug cing aa zhes bya ba zlos pa 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-4: phyag rgya chen po rdo rjer byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187a-5: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma mo'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-6: aa zhes bya ba dang bsgrub par bya ba rgyas gdab pa'i bsam pas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis khar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje ma mo'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-7: nges sems can thams cad rgyas 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187a-8: thams cad phye mar bya ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-9: bdud la sogs pa phye mar bya ba'i bsam pas dam tshig rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-10: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-11: sa la btsir te rdo rje 'bar bas bsgrub par bya ba tha la bar byas par gyur par bsam zhing ;
T02TD2512.1E:187a-12: aa h'um zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod bya ba 'di ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur te thams cad phye mar byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187a-13: thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-14: gdug pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gzhig pa'i bsam pas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi rgyab tu g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur kha bkan te bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-15: dbus su gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-16: g-yon du blta ba dang bcas pa nyid kyis g-yon pa'i khu tshur mngon du phyogs par byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:187a-17: gcig la gcig btsir bar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur te thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187b-0: thams cad dbye ba dang rnam par gzhol ba la ni dbang po'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i phyir rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi steng du g-yon @187b pa'i khu tshur bzhag pa 'di ni dbang po'i rdo rje'i khu tshur te 'di bcings la stang stabs dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du 'phang zhing aa h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje 'bar bas bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gzhom par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187b-1: de lta bu'i dbang po'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis ni thams cad dbye ba dang rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187b-2: chu'i nang du gnas shing 'chag pa la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-3: rdo rje rnon po'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-5: dang po'i rdo rje la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-6: krung mo gnyis kyi steng du mthe bos sen mo mnan la /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-7: mig gi 'bras bu ltar byas nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis mnyam por brkyang ba 'di bcings la 'chag cing 'gro bas rang gi phyag rgya las byung pa'i rdo rje 'bar bas chu steng du bteg ste /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-8: chu'i nang du gnas shing 'chag par bya ba 'di ni rdo rje rnon po'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-9: bzlas brjod ni aa lam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:187b-10: gzugs mang por ston pa la ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-11: g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i sbubs su g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bcug pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i khu tshur te 'di bcings la hr'i: ta zhes bzlas brjod byas nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-12: de lta bus ni gzugs mang po ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:187b-13: mi snang ba'i dngos grub la ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-14: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor bas aa kham zhes zlos shing rdo rje rnon po'i khu tshur bcings la bdag nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bsgoms na mi snang bar gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-15: 'di ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:187b-16: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-18: a'a: tram zhes zlos shing bdag nyid nam mkha'i snying po'i rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2512.1E:187b-19: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-0: nam mkha' las dngos po thams cad bskyed par bya ba ni rdo rje nam mkha'i khu tshur te dngos po thams cad skyed @188a * //
T02TD2512.1E:188a-2: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor bas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la rang gi gnas nas ri rab kyi bar du ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-4: rdo rje skas kyi gdang bu rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-6: de lta bus ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-7: 'di ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la 'gro ba ster bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:188a-8: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-9: rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-10: de bcings la aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-11: ral gri 'dzin pa'i rig pa 'dzin par bdag nyid bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-12: bsgrub pa grub nas ral gri 'dzin pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i dngos grub la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-14: rdo rje de las kyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-16: aa zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-17: mchod pa ma lus shing lus pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa yid kyis bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-18: 'di ni rdo rje las kyi khu tshur gyis mchod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:188a-19: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-20: padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje padma 'dzin pa ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur te 'di bcings la aa zhes bya ba zlos shing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-22: des na 'di la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188a-23: nor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD2512.1E:188a-24: rin po che'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che 'dzin pa ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188a-25: 'di bcings la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin chen du bdag nyid bsgoms na nor thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-0: phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis @188b so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-2: 'dis phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-3: las thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-4: las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-5: 'dis sangs rgyas kyi sprul ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-6: sems can gyi don bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-7: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-8: des dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-11: da ltar byung ba ston pa la ni rdo rje ljags kyi mchog gi khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-12: rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje ljags kyi mchog gi khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-13: de bcings la aa zhes bya bas lce la dbab par byas na /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-16: da ltar byung ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-19: 'di bcings la aa zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-20: sangs rgyas pa nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-21: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-23: 'di bcings la aa zhes bya bzlos shing rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgom pa ji srid de'i skur bdag nyid mthong gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-24: de nas grub pas rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-25: phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-26: de bzhin nyid ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:188b-27: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-28: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:188b-29: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas gsang sngags rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bor gyur pa 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-4: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-5: sngar bshad pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-6: de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2512.1E:189a-7: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-8: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-9: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-11: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-12: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-13: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-14: so sor rtog par byed pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-15: gang rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-20: lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'di dag gi yul rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-21: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-24: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-25: ngo bo nyid kyis ku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-26: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-27: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-34: de rnams la spros pa ni rnam par rtog pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:189a-35: ma spros pa ni spros pa med pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-36: byang chub kyi sems la sogs par rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:189a-37: de gang la yod pa de ni chos thams cad spros pa med pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189a-38: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhing gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:189a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-0: 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba ni aa ra pa tsa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor @189b zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-1: mngon sum du gyur pa gang la thos pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-3: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pas mngon sum du byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor bzhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-4: ming de skad ces bya ba gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-5: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-6: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-9: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-10: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-11: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-13: de ni don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-14: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-15: rtag tu ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-16: de'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du ro gcig pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-17: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul des ji skad du bshad pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin gyi kun rdzob tu ni yod bzhin ba'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-18: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-19: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-20: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-21: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-22: rnam par smin pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-23: rin po che'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-24: de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni bdag la sogs par rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags te /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-25: rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-26: mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-27: don dam par rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-28: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-29: mtshan ma dang bral bas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-30: rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-31: de nye bar bzung ba ni rgyur byas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-32: ji skad du bshad pa'i chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:189b-33: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-34: smon pa med pa'o zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:189b-35: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-0: @190a * // rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-1: rtog pa med pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-3: padma'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-4: smon pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-5: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pas smon pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-6: smon pa med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-7: de ltar dngos po la mngon par mi zhen pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-8: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-9: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-10: smon pa ni smon lam rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-11: dngos por 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs par gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-12: smon par mi byed pas na smon pa med pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-13: dngos por 'dzin pa med pas gsol ba mi 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-14: de'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni smon pa med pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-15: des na chos de rnams smon pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-17: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-18: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-23: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-25: las kyi rigs ni chos thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-26: de rnams ni rang bzhin zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyis mun pa dang bral ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-27: don dam par rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-29: mi bden pa yongs su brtags pa rnams ni don dam par gdod ma nas ma skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-30: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-31: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190a-32: de'i rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-33: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de nyid ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-34: gang gi phyir chos thams cad gang yin pa de ni /
T02TD2512.1E:190a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos @190b thams cad yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-1: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-2: tshig de dag gis ni rim pa bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-5: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnams gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-6: de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-7: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-8: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-9: ral gri des zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-12: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar ston par byed pa'i ral gri bzhi phyag bzhis yongs su bzung bas so //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsgoms pas mi snang bar byas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-14: gang gi phyir 'dir yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin par blta'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-15: shes rab kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni gtso bor gyur pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-17: mchog ste bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis de las byung bas na /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-18: aa zhes bya ba'i yi ge yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-19: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag nas smras pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-20: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni de bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-23: dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:190b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyogs dang mtshams rnams nas yongs su bskor te bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:190b-25: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nas brtsams te bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-0: @191a * // de nas 'dus pa mdzad pa sngon du 'gro ba nas brtsams te gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-1: de nas da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-3: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-4: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-6: chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-7: chos kyang yin la thams cad yin pas na chos thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-8: byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa chos rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-9: de rnams kyi rang gi rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-10: de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-11: des spros pa med pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-13: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-15: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pas rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-16: de las byung ba'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pas ral gri dang 'dra bas na /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-17: ral gri zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-18: ral gri'i phyag rgya nye bar mtshon pas ral gri ste /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-19: de la dmigs pas na ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-20: de'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-21: 'di'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra bar bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:191a-22: 'di'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-24: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba lung las ji skad gsungs pa'i go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:191a-25: de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du thig btab la zhes bya ba ni /
