T02TD2512.1E:207b-19: mthong ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyi sems kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la /
T02TD2512.1E:207b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:207b-21: rdo rjes zhes bya ba rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms pa 'di ni mchod ba gsum pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:207b-22: phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:207b-23: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnams sam /
T02TD2512.1E:207b-24: rdo rje sbrang rtsi la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:207b-25: de dag gcig tu byas pa'i phyag rgya ni mchod pa bzhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:207b-26: slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du slob ma rnams gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams kyang bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:207b-27: las kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam ba bzhi ni las te /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-1: byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni las kyi dkyil 'khor yin pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-2: de bskyed pa'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-3: yang 'di'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-4: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-5: de nyid kyis rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-6: de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-7: dkyil 'khor ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur ba de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-8: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-9: bar snang gi phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ji lta ba bzhin du gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-10: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-11: 'di'i nang du 'di'i phyed kyi tshad du 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar thig btab la /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-12: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-13: de nas lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-14: dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su sna tshogs padma'i steng du bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod zhal shar phyogs su gzigs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-15: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2512.1E:208a-16: me'i phyogs su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-17: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su nam mkha'i snying po /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-18: bden bral gyi phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-19: rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-20: rlung gi phyogs su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-21: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-22: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje gnod sbyin legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-23: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la me'i mtshams su rdo rje sbrang rtsi /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-24: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje sprin /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-25: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje ston ka /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-26: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje dgun bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208a-27: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni dong tse /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-28: lho phyogs kyi sgor ni gser /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-29: nub phyogs su ni mu tig gi 'brum bu /
T02TD2512.1E:208a-30: byang phyogs kyi sgor ni rin po che padma r'a g-yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208b-0: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni aom @208b zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208b-2: de bzhin du sbyor ba chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-3: nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-4: me tog gi lcug mas bum pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-6: aom zhes bya ba re re zhing bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye nas rdo rje bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-8: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-9: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-11: aom zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas ba dkyil 'khor du bcug la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdon bsal la /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-16: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-17: rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba thams cad go bskon te /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-18: aom zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas aom dri shya zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-19: 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-22: aa ham zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-23: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-27: dar 'phan gyi rtse mo ltar bya ba 'di ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208b-28: de nas lha thams cad kyi ljags la aom zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsams pa 'di ni 'dir lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208b-29: aa zhes bya bas snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can aom zhes pa nyid zlos shing bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208b-30: de nas h'um las rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:208b-31: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su mthun par nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po aom zhes bya ba zlos shing bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:208b-32: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod phan dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-0: 'dir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi @209a * //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-2: aom zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la aom zhes bya bas mchod yin phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-5: bum pa gang pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-7: bla re la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-8: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-9: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-12: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-13: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-14: aom zhes bya ba nyid las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-16: kha zas ro brgya ba la sogs pa'i bkod pa rnams sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-18: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-19: aom sarba bi db'ur p'u ra su ra su ra a'a barta ya a'a barta ya ho //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-21: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-22: de nas shin tu dmar ba'i ras la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-25: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i snying po bzhi yongs su bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-26: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-27: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-28: snga ma bzhin du snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-29: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-30: nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-31: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-32: badzra badzra aom zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-33: shar phyogs kyi sgor badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-34: de nas lho phyogs nas zhugs la badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-35: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs nas badzra spo ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-36: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes pa dang bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209a-37: de nas de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:209a-43: a'a dya siddhy'a m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-0: @209b de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-1: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-3: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-4: ma h'a r'a ga ma h'a soo bya /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-5: ma h'a badzra ma h'a dh'a na /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-6: ma h'a dzny'a na ma h'a karma badzra satva a'adya siddhy'a m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-7: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-10: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la aa zhes bya ba brgya bzlas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-11: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-12: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-13: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod cing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-14: de nas aom zhes bya ba zlos shing me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-16: aom nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-17: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-18: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-21: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-22: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-23: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-24: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas rang gi dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-25: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-26: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-27: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-28: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:209b-29: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-30: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-31: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-32: me tog la sogs ba dang dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-33: de la dang po kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:209b-34: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-0: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod du byin gyis @210a * //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen po las gsungs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa aom gyis rang gi gnas su bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-3: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya chen pos bdag nyid 'dug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-4: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-5: mchod yon blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-6: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-7: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa aom zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing chu de btung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-8: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-9: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-13: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-14: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-15: sna tshogs rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu dang bcas par blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-16: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur bdag gis kyang aom zhes bya bzlos shing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-17: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-18: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas bdag nyid la yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-19: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-20: de nas rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-21: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-22: de kho na nyid la sogs pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-23: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar smras pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la snying pos blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-26: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-29: lung bstan pa mnos la yang bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-30: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-31: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:210a-33: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:210a-34: rdo rje slob don dka' thub ches//
T02TD2512.1E:210b-0: @210b sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-1: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-2: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-3: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-5: // / de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob ma sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom ba 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-6: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-7: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-8: de nam mkha' mdzod du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-9: dri dang me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-10: yon gyi mchog yang dag par blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-11: rang gi 'jug pa'i cho gas gzhug pa dang dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-12: de nas yang dbab pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-13: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan la /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-14: aom aa: aa: aa: a'a: zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa bzlas la dbab bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-15: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-16: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-18: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-19: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes rlabs lab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas sgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-20: sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-21: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa la sogs pa la sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-22: ras kyi ri mo gnyis la bsgrub par bya ba shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-23: de nas ma bsgrubs par yang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-24: byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-25: aom zhes bya ba zlos shing rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-26: de lta bus ni byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:210b-27: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:210b-28: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-0: aom zhes bya ba zlos shing chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bsgom par bya @211a * //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-2: de lta bus ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-3: dbang bskur ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-4: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-5: de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-6: aom zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-7: phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni sna tshogs rdo rje thams cad kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-9: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-10: aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya ba 'di ni sna tshogs rdo rje thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-11: de lta bus ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-12: stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni aa la sogs pa'i yi ge'i lung bstan pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-13: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-14: aa ra pa tsa na zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-17: aa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-18: ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-19: pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-20: tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-21: na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-26: rang bzhin med pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-27: snying po 'di bsgoms la bsgrubs na /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-30: sngags 'di ni aa la sogs ba'i yi ges lung bstan pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-31: 'dis ni stong pa nyid mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-33: bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs te /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-34: 'di bcings la sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-35: aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:211a-36: de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211a-37: mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-0: bcom ldan 'das nam @211b mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-2: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi sbyor ba byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-3: aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-4: de lta bus ni mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-5: gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos so zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-6: 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-7: aom ha zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas na gdug pa thams cad zos par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-8: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-9: me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sbrang rtsi la sogs pa dus kyi mchod pa bzhi'i snying po zlos shing 'di rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis de dag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-10: de lta bus ni me tog dor ba la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-11: sna tshogs rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba la sna tshogs rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-12: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba'i nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-13: ming de skad bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-14: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-16: // / de ltar tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa bshad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-17: da ni bsrung ba'i las kyi cho ga'i rang bzhin rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-19: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-20: de bzhin du thams cad mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal bo'i gnas na ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-21: de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-22: gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pa //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-23: zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:211b-24: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam bar rtog pas bcom pa'i gdug pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:211b-25: de rnams 'dul ba ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-1: par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa las bzlog pa'i chos bdag med pa bsgom pa ston par mdzad pas gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar spyod cing nus pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-2: cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis rang dbang du mdzad par spyod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:212a-3: ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:212a-4: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-5: sems can thams cad ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:212a-6: de'i snying po mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spong ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-7: ji skad du bshad pa'i mngon par zhen pa dag spong ba'o der nges pa ni ye shes te /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-8: de 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-9: de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:212a-10: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro bo mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-15: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni sems can thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-16: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni don dam par de bzhin nyid yin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-17: kun rdzob tu mdza' bo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-19: dgra bo rnams la thugs rje chen po'i gzhan gyi dbang gis sems mnyam pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-20: khro bos phan pa ma yin pa las bzlog pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-21: phan pa la sbyor ba'i sems kyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:212a-22: khro bo mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid des /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-25: dgra bo rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro bo'i gzugs yang dag par ston cing sdig pa las ldog par byed pa ni khro bo'i mnyam pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-26: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyi khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-27: khro bo'i bya ba bsgrub pa ni khro bo'i mnyam pa nyid do ;
T02TD2512.1E:212a-28: / gang gi tshe khro bo'i bya ba bsgrub pa las ldog par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:212a-29: sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid las khro bo'i dul ba nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-0: gang gi tshe sems can thams cad 'dul bar gyur pa de'i tshe khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams med pas thugs rje chen po'i khro @212b bos 'dul bar 'gyur zhing bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-1: khro bo de'i chos nyid gang zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-2: sems can thams cad chos nyid las khro bo'i chos nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-3: sems can thams cad don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-4: de dang lhan cig tu gyur pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-5: khro bo'i chos nyid yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-6: gang sems can thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de ni khro bo dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-7: de ni sems can thams cad med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-8: khro bo 'di'i ming mi phyed pa'i ming ji skad du bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-9: sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-10: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-11: de ni sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-12: des khro bo rdo rje nyid yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-13: sems can thams cad kyi rdo rje nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni thugs rje chen po khro bo'i ngo bo nyid yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-14: chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-15: yang na khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa ni sems can thams cad kyi rdo rje nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-16: sems can thams cad kyi rdo rje nyid de rgyur gyur pas khro bo rdo rje nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-17: khro bos gdul ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya ba'i bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-18: 'khor ba ji srid par khro bo'i bya ba bsgrub pa rgyu na mi gcod pa nyid ni khro bo rdo rje nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:212b-19: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gis na sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro bo mnyam pa nyid de zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-20: sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-21: gang gi phyir 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-22: 'di nyid ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-24: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid nas sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid kyi bar te /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-25: des khro bo rdo rje nyid do zhes bya ba ste khro bo mnyam pa nyid la sogs pas kyang sems can gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar mdzad cing /
T02TD2512.1E:212b-26: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'jog par mdzad pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-1: cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-2: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-3: byang chub bo zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-4: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin la de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-5: rang gi dkyil 'khor sprul bar bya ba'i phyir bskul pa mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-6: de'i rjes thogs nyid la snying po 'di rang gi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir smras pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-7: bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa ni khro bo'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs dang bcas pa'i zhal lo //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-8: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon bya bzung nas rang gi zhal gyi grva gnyis su 'dzin par mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-11: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-12: de dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du rab tu grags pas rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad pa'i phyir smras pa ni ha zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-13: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba la ;
T02TD2512.1E:213a-14: sems can rnams gdul ba'i don gyi sems dpa' rnams ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa'i rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-16: dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-17: de'i sbyor bas de'i dbyibs kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-18: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-19: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te ;
T02TD2512.1E:213a-20: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213a-21: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:213a-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-0: slob ma la gzhug pa la @213b sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-1: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-2: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-3: ji srid mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-4: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-5: thabs thams cad kyis 'dul ba'i khro bo zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-7: gdug cing ma rungs pa nyid 'dor du 'jug pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-8: thabs thams cad kyang yin la 'dul ba yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-10: de nyid ni khro bo'i rdo rje ste rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-11: de la dmigs pas na ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-12: gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-13: mi phyed pa gang yin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-14: ming de skad ces bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs shing bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-15: phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-16: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-19: de ni nang rim nyid du ni //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-20: dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-22: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zur bzhi pa shin tu mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-23: thig bzhir ldan zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i srad bu gnyis dang mtshams kyi srad bu gnyis gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-24: de ltar thig bzhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-25: tshon sna lngas ni rnam par bris //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-31: dkar po'i mdog can gyi tshon rnams kyis legs bar thig gdab nas ri mor bris pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-32: tshon sna lngas ni rnam par bris //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-34: ka ba brgyad kyi mdun gnas par //
T02TD2512.1E:213b-35: zhes bya ba la 'di nyid du gnas pas na gnas pa zhes bya la /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-36: mdun yang yin la gnas pa yang yin pas na mdun na gnas ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:213b-37: ka ba brgyad kyi mdun na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-0: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan gyi steng du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dang yang dag par @214a * //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-2: de'i zhes bya ba ji ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su ci rigs par zhes bya ba rdo rje gnod sbyin lugs ma'am /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-5: bris pa ha zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-6: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba gnyis gtsigs pa'i bu ga dang bcas pa'i zhal gyi phyogs so //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-9: 'bar ba rnams kyi phreng bar gyur pha gang yin pa de ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-11: phan tshun du 'gro ba'i 'od gang yin pa de ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-12: de'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-13: kun du zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'chang ba shin tu zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-14: khyad par du yang 'jigs par byed pa rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-15: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams ba zhir ni mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-16: phyi dang nang gi sgo rnams su ni khro bo'i rdo rje yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-18: ras sngon po la snga ma bzhin du sngags bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-19: de dag gi smad g-yogs la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-21: 'dis me tog gi phreng ba bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-22: ji lta ba bzhin zhugs na ji skad du gsungs pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-23: rdo rje mche ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtsa ba yod pa'i mche ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-25: de blangs la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-26: de'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin la bsnun par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-27: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyes pas /
T02TD2512.1E:214a-28: zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-29: de nas sgrub pa pos bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214a-30: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-0: de ltar bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs @214b pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-1: bcom ldan 'das las snying po mnos la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-4: chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-5: de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-6: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-7: de nas mchod la zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa byas nas slob ma bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-8: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-9: phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-10: ro dang kha zas dang gnas pa thams cad kyis slob ma rnams tshim par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-11: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro bo mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-12: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol to //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-13: dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdus nas slar dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-14: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-15: ji ltar rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-16: phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-17: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-18: 'di'i don slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-19: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi spyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-20: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-21: ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-22: de nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la bar snang gi phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-23: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:214b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig btab la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-25: nang du 'di'i phyi'i phyed kyi tshad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-26: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa grub bzhi la /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-27: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes par byas pa /
T02TD2512.1E:214b-28: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215a-1: dbus ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-2: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su phyag na rdo rje /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-3: shar lho mtshams kyi le'u tshe la 'jam pa'i dbyangs /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-4: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su nam mkha'i snying po /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-5: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha' mdzod /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-6: rdo rje dran ba'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-7: nub byang mtshams su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-8: rdo rje snyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-9: byang shar mtshams kyi le'u tshe la rdo rje gnod sbyin gnyis pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-10: de dag thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-11: sku mdog nag po shas cher gtum pa 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-12: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od mnga' ba rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-13: ha ha zhes gsal bar bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215a-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su mche ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-15: phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i sgo rnams su khro bo'i rdo rje rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215a-16: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni ha zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:215a-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-18: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje mche ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-19: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-20: bum pa gang ba rnams la ha zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye la bsdu ba byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-23: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-25: ha zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-31: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-32: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-33: ha zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215a-35: ha dram shya zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ngang bcas pa blta bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-0: dza: h'um bam ho: @215b sa ma ya stam /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-1: sa ma ya stvam aa ham ha /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-2: zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-3: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-4: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo'i rtse gnyis bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-5: mthe bo gnyis shin tu brkyang ba ni rdo rje mche ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-6: de nas lha 'di dag thams cad kyi ljags la ha zhes bya ba bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-8: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-9: ha zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-10: rang gi snying gar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la ha zhes bya ba zlos shing ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-11: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-12: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-13: ha zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-15: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-17: bla re la sogs pa phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-18: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-19: phyi rol tu glu dang gar dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-23: ba lang gi khyad rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-24: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-25: ha zhes bya ba nyid las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-27: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-29: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor gzhag la aom sarba bi tp'u ra p'u ra /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-31: a'a barta ya a'a barta ya ho zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-32: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:215b-33: de nas ras sngon po la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:215b-35: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i snying po bzhi yongs su bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-0: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin @216a * //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-3: snga ma bzhin du snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-4: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-5: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-6: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-7: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas badzra badzra ha zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-8: shar phyogs kyi sgor badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-9: de nas lho phyogs nas zhugs la badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-10: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la badzra spho ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-11: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-12: badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-14: de nas de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-17: su to shya ma h'a dh'a na su su kho /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-19: a'adya siddhy'a m'am zhes brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2512.1E:216a-20: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-21: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-23: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-24: ma h'a ra ga ma h'a soo khya /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-25: ma h'a badzra ma h'a dzny'a na /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-28: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-29: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhy'a m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-30: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-31: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-32: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje ma phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-33: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod cing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-34: de nas ha zhes bya ba zlos shing me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-36: ha nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-37: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-38: de nas de nyid zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-41: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-42: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216a-43: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:216a-44: bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-0: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas rang la dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa de srid @216b kyi bar du h'a zhes bya bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216b-1: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-2: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-3: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-4: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216b-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-6: bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i lta bas bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-7: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-8: me tog la sogs pa dang dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:216b-9: / de la dang po kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-10: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-11: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnal 'byor chen po las gsungs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa has rang rang gi gnas su bkod la /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-13: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-15: de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug nas mchod yon blangs la me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-16: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la ;
T02TD2512.1E:216b-17: aom badzra aa bhishinytsa ha zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:216b-18: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-19: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-23: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-25: dar dpyangs kyis dbang snga ma bzhin du bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-26: ha zhes bya bas rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:216b-27: ha zhes bya ba zlos bzhin du bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba dag gis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o//
T02TD2512.1E:217a-0: @217a * // de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-1: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-2: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-3: de nas rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-4: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-5: de kho na nyid la sogs pas ni //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-6: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su smras pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la snying po blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-9: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-11: lung bstan pa mnos la yang bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-12: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-13: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-14: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-15: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-16: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-17: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-18: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-20: // / de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob ma la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-21: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-22: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-24: dri dang me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-25: yon gyi mchog yang dag par blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-26: rang gi 'jug pa'i cho gas gzhug pa dang dbab pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-27: de nas yang rdo rje dang pa pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-28: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan la /
T02TD2512.1E:217a-29: ha aa: aa: aa: aa: zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-30: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217a-31: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-0: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub @217b kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-1: sgrub pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-2: sgrub pa dang dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-3: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa las ras kyi ri mo gnyis pa bsnyen pa bya bar gsungs pa de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sgrub pa la yang shes par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-4: dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-5: ma bsgrubs par yang dang po ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-6: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-7: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la ;
T02TD2512.1E:217b-8: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-9: ha zhes bya bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pa thams cad rang dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-10: sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni zhes bya ba ni bya ba ma yin pa thams cad las bzlog nas /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-11: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyar ba'am /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-12: theg pa chen po la dgod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-14: khro bas ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-15: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-16: khros par 'gyur bas ha zhes bya ba zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba rang gi kha nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i nang du zhugs par yid kyis bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-17: de lta bus ni sems can gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-18: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thar pa ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-19: 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pas so sor snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-21: chos gos dang snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-22: 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba'i bsam pas chos gos dum bur byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin thab kyi dbus su rnam par bsams la sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:217b-24: de lta bus ni 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-25: dbang bskur ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:217b-26: de dbrog pa ni med par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-1: kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-2: gser ba la sogs pa'i phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-3: thams cad rgyas gdang pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-4: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar ha zhes bya bas rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed pa ni thams cad rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-5: thams cad bcad pa la ni gzugs brnyan byas nas gtubs pas so zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams las byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-6: bsgrub par bya ba gsang ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste bcug pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-7: rdo rje rnon po'i sbyor bas ha las ral gri bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-8: ral gri des lha sbyin m'a ra ya ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ming nas smos shing bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-9: gzugs brnyan gtub par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-10: de lta bus ni thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-11: ma rungs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa la ni rdo rje bzung nas 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-13: 'og nas bshad pa'i gdug pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bris nas khro bo'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-14: ha dushta mandalam bha smi ku ru ham zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-15: gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i gdon gyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs la rkang ba gnyis kyis mnyes na de lta bus ni de rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-16: mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-17: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sbyor bas ha zhes bya ba zlos shing rang gi kha las rdo rje gnod sbyin phyung bas mchod pa thams cad thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-18: de lta bus ni mchod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-19: thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed kyi lta bas blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-20: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-21: sems can gdug pa can rnams la ha zhes bya ba bzlos shing 'jigs byed kyi lta bas bltas la rdo rje 'bar ba sprul te ;
T02TD2512.1E:218a-22: de'i mig gi mtha' sreg par byed par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-23: de lta bus ni thams cad skrag par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-24: rdo rje dam tshig ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:218a-25: de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:218a-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-0: // / @218b de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-1: da ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-2: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-5: de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:218b-6: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-7: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gcig pa nyid ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:218b-8: de la rab tu zhugs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas gnas par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:218b-9: de su zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:218b-12: de la dmigs pa'i ye shes ni mchog ste /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-13: de las byung ba'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-14: bsgom pa'i ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon sum du mdzad pa'i rgyu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang yin pa'i mchog ste /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-15: ming de skad ces bya ba bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:218b-16: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-17: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-19: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-21: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:218b-22: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas par bral ba de thob par byed pa'i thabs ni chos bdag med pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD2512.1E:218b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-0: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu @219a * //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-4: chos thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnyis su med pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-5: don dam par chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD2512.1E:219a-6: / thams cad don nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid do zhes bya ba la thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-9: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-11: de'i don ni thams cad don nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-12: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-13: nam mkha'i mnyam pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-14: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-15: don thams cad du gyur pa nyid kyis ni don thams cad nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-16: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don nyid do zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-18: de'i don ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang nam mkha'i mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-20: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-22: gnyis po 'di dag ni gnyis su med cing tha mi dad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-23: thams cad chos nyid pas zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-24: thams cad ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-25: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-27: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-29: de'i thams cad chos nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-30: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-31: thams cad chos nyid yin pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-32: de'i chos nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-33: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-35: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa ste gnyis po 'di dag ni dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219a-37: thams cad las nyid bas zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-38: thams cad ni 'dir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219a-39: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-5: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-7: de las nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-8: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-9: thams cad las nyid ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-10: de'i las nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-11: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos nyid do zhes rig par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-12: khong du chud par bya la shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni re re la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-13: de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-14: las nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-15: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-16: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-17: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la snying po 'di bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-20: de rnams kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor nges par sprul pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa las mi 'da' ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-21: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-22: de gang gis byin gyis rlob pa de la ni ming de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-23: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-24: don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-25: thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:219b-26: de rnams kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-27: der nges pa'i ye shes la ming snying po zhes bya la de ston par byed pa'i h'um la yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:219b-28: de gsungs pa ni ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-0: de yang bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor skyed par @220a * //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-1: byed pa'i rnam pa la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-2: h'um zhes bya ba gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis h'um zhes bya ba gsungs pa tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-6: 'jig rten pa dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi bar dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mtshan nyid du zhugs par gyur to //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-9: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-10: de nas 'dul pa mdzad pa nas brtsams te gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-12: // / de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-13: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-15: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-16: da nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-17: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-18: dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nye bar btud de zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-20: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dam tshig chen po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-21: byang chub kyi sems chen po chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-22: de'i dkyil 'khor ni de las byung ba'i bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-23: de gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-24: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor phyi dang nang du bcas pa snga ma bzhin du legs par bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-25: dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas brgyad du //
T02TD2512.1E:220a-27: shar phyogs kyi re'u cha la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-28: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar mtshams kyi re'u cha'i bar du /
T02TD2512.1E:220a-29: khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-0: 'phags @220b pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-4: sems bskyed ma thag pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-6: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor gnas par yid kyis rnam par bsam la /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-7: dbus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-8: 'dis ni yid kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-9: de ltar yid kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-10: da ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-12: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-13: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor thugs la brtan por mdzad nas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-14: de la dam tshig thams cad ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-15: de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-16: de gang gis byin gyis rlob cing brtan par mdzad pa de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rjer byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-17: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-18: dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te ;
T02TD2512.1E:220b-19: ming de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-20: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs su'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-21: phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la zhes bya ba ni kun du bri ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-22: de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje 'khor lo bris nas zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su ste /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-23: de'i nang du rdo rje 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i nang gi dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-25: nang gi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:220b-26: byang shar mtshams kyi re'u cha rnams su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po nas brtsams te //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-27: ji srid rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa 'bar gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya zhing sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:220b-28: de ji ltar bri zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-1: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis thig btab cing /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-3: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor de legs par thig gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-4: sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu lugs ma la sogs pa'i sku gzugs rnams h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-6: phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ni phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la shar lho mtshams su zhi ba mdung thung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-7: lho nub tu ma mo'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-8: nub byang du ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-9: byang shar mtshams su sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-10: sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba la shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2512.1E:221a-12: nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug / byang du nam mkha'i snying po gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-13: de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-14: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'dir bya zhing bsgrub pa'i ye shes thams cad kyang dang po nyid kyi snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-15: ras kyi ri mo gnyis nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-16: gang gsungs pa de thams cad 'dir yang bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-17: bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'byung pa'i bde ba ni bde ba thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-18: de'i dam tshig ni rgyu ste /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-19: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-21: // /'di'i don slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la ;
T02TD2512.1E:221a-23: des kyang rnal 'byor chen po de las gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:221a-24: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor de ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du nyin re bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-0: de @221b nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-1: bar snang gi phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-2: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus ma'i re'u cha la yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-4: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-5: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-6: rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-7: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-8: shar lho mtshams kyi re'u cha la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-9: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-10: nub byang mtshams su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-11: byang shar mtshams su rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-12: de nas h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis lha thams cad sngar bshad pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor du bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-13: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la shar lho mtshams la sogs par rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-15: ming po gsum dang sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-16: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2512.1E:221b-17: lhor ni rdo rje h'um mdzad /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-18: nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug / byang du nam mkha'i snying po legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:221b-20: de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-21: dang po rdo rjes yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug ma las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-22: bum pa gang ba rnams la h'um zhes bya ba re re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-23: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-24: rdo rje bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-26: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-28: h'um zhes bya bas lha thams cad rang gi sku gzugs kyi gnas su bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-29: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-34: rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgo bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:221b-35: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad go bskon la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-0: h'um zhes bya bas mchod yon dbul bar @222a * //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-2: de nas dang po'i rdo rje h'um dri shya zhes bya bas blta ba byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-4: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham h'um zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-5: de nas snga ma bzhin du lha thams cad kyi ljags la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-6: h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-8: rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa rnams h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-10: de nas yang rang gi snying gar h'um nyid las rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-12: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-13: h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-15: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-17: bla re la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-24: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-25: de nas rigs re re zhing phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-26: aom las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-28: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-30: thal mo khang stong du sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-31: aom sarba bid p'u ra p'u ra su ra su ra a'a wa rta ya a'a warta ya ho zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-32: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222a-33: de nas shin tu dmar ba'i gos la ;
T02TD2512.1E:222a-34: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa de dag las gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-35: gnyis pas stod g-yogs byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-36: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i snying po bzhi bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-37: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa bzung zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-38: byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-39: rang gi snying gar rdo rje de bzhin du bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-40: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-41: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i tshul gyis zhugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:222a-42: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-0: slog @222b dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-2: // / de nas slob ma rnams la yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad 'dir bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-3: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-5: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-6: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rang gi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-7: gang yang rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa sgrub pa po rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dod pa de rnams kyi ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dir bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-8: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-10: // /'dir 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la lhag par mos pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-11: zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ston par byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-13: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-14: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-15: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-16: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-17: sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-18: sems can thams cad ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la lhag bar mos pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-19: de rnams byin gyis rlob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid du mos pa bskyed pas bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang bral te /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la lhag par mos pa bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-21: ming de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bshad pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:222b-22: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes bya ba la sems can thams cad ni 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-23: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:222b-24: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-0: @223a * // de la byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-1: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-3: de nyid gang gi snying po yin pa de la ni de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-4: 'dir rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-6: de la byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de dag nyid ni byang chub chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-8: kun du bzang po'i byang chub kyi sems chen po rtogs par byed pa'i ngo bo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rigs rtogs pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-10: de rnal 'byor pa 'di yid las 'byung bar 'gyur bas kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la kun du bzang po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-13: de ni thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-14: de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-15: de rnams su gyur pas na rang bzhin nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-16: des na sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-17: de skad du lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med pa /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-19: sems can gyi rgyud la gnas te /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-20: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-21: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-23: don dam par byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-25: yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa nyid shin tu ma skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-26: sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni rdo rje nor bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-28: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:223a-29: 'dir yang rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:223a-30: rdo rje nor bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-0: @223b rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje snying pos dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje snying pos dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-1: de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang bskur ba nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-3: gang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid de nyid ni shin tu yang skye ba med pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-4: de bas na don dam par rdo rje nor bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-5: rin po che'i rigs kyi snying po can ni sems can thams cad yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-6: sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-7: chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang padma'i rigs so //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-8: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-9: 'dir rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-10: ngag thams cad rab tu byung ba nyid pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-14: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-16: padma'i rigs thams cad ni ngag thams cad do //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-17: de'i rab tu byung ba ni gang sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rab tu 'jug pa de la ni /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-18: ngag thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-19: de rnams kyi dngos po ni ngag thams cad rab tu byung ba nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-20: des na sems can thams cad la chos kyi snying po can no //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-22: gang so sor rtog pa can gyi shes rab dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-23: ye shes kyi rnam par shes pa ni don dam bar ma skyes pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-24: de bas na sems can thams cad chos dang /
