T02TD2512.1E:223b-27: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-29: padma'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snying po can no //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-30: sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no zhes bya ba la las ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-32: de nyid de rnams kyi snying po yin pa'am /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-33: de'i snying po can gang yin pa de dag ni las kyi snying po can no //
T02TD2512.1E:223b-35: sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-36: sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:223b-38: de'i byed pa ni de la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-0: de rnams kyi dngos po ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa @224a * //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-2: de dang mthar thug par rab tu sbyor zhing 'brel pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa nyid la sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-3: des na sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa nyid la sbyor bas so zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par bzung ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-4: sbyor ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-5: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-10: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni don dam par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin pas ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-11: de bas na sems can thams cad ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-12: las kyi rigs kyi ngo bo nyid ni las kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-13: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'dis /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-14: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la sogs pa ston par byed pas /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-15: don dam par sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-17: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-21: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-22: las kyi rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-23: gzhung 'di dag gis ni phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs bzhi'i thun mong gi dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-24: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-25: ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-26: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-27: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mdzad pas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs la lhag par mos pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-28: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bskul ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224a-29: de'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje'i dbang phyug ma la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzugs kyi zhib mdung gis mtshan pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor skyed par byed pa'i snying po smras par gyur pa ni dri zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas rdo rje'i dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224a-30: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la zhib mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi gnas pa thugs ka nas byung nas rang gi gnas su gnas par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-0: de ltar na gzhung 'di dag gis ting nge 'dzin @224b gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-1: bsdus pa nas brtsams te gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-3: // / dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-5: 'dis ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-6: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-7: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ston par byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-8: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-9: ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-10: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-12: zhes bya ba ni brtson pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-13: kun nas zlum pa zhes bya ba ni dbyibs zlum pa'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:224b-14: / thig gsum pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa gsum pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-15: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po gtso bor byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-16: sgo bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rim pa re re zhing so sor bsgo bzhi bri zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-17: mtshams su ni mdung rtse gsum pa bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-18: de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-19: dbang phyug chen po'i de'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-20: logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-21: ba lang gi rna ba'i dbang phyug gi bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-22: de'i mtshams rnams su ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad ces bya ba ni rim pa dbus mar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-23: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'og nas bshad pa bzhin du'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-24: sgo rnams su dbyig pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-25: phyi rol tu ni 'byung po rnams dang yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rim pa gsum pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi rim pa la ni 'byung po brgyad kyi yi ge brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-27: slob dpon thal ba gtsang mas lus bskus shing gos gtsang ma bgos te /
T02TD2512.1E:224b-28: mdung rtse gsum gyi mtshan mas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:224b-29: zhugs nas kyang sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2512.1E:225a-0: @225a * // sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phan pa rgya chen po'i bde bar rnam par smin pa las te /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-1: de'i don du drag po'i las dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-3: gdug pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-4: zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ma rungs pa'i las bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-6: de grub pa ni rdzogs pa ste de'i don du'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-7: 'dod pa kun gyi bdag po dang //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-8: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gi bdag po nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-9: rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i bdag po nyid ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po ste 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-10: drag po'i las kyi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-11: ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug gi las ni drag po'i las te /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-12: las de'i dngos po de gyis shig bod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-14: gang rdo rje dbang phyug gi las sna tshogs pa de gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-15: de lta bu des ni de'i phyag rgya chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-16: de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab ste zhes bya ba ni slob ma bcug nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-17: de nas nye bar sdud pa'i dus su yang phyi rol du gtor ma ji lta ba bzhin du byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-18: dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-19: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas nye bar gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-20: 'jigs pa med par zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi lha rnams kyi 'tshe ba dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-21: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-22: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi rgyur gyur pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-23: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-24: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis so /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-25: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rjes su myong nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-26: drag po'i 'jig rten du zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-27: mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug dang 'dra bar yang dag par mchod par 'gyur bas so //
T02TD2512.1E:225a-28: de'i don 'di yin par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:225a-29: rdo rje dbang phyug gi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-0: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa nas @225b brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-1: ji srid mtshan ma thob cing rjes su gnang ba thob kyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-2: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-3: bar snang gi gnas su dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du gzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-4: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-8: rim pa gsum pa ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-9: rim pa gsum pa sum 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-10: thams cad kyi sgo bzhi pa la mtshams bzhir mdung rtse gsum pas mtshan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-11: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po gdong bzhi pa dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-13: gdong lhag ma rnams ni drag cing 'jigs par byed pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-14: khro bo chen po 'jigs byed lag pa bzhi pa kha dog nag po lag pa gnyis na rtse gsum dang thod pa /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-15: yang gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlan dang bcas pa ba dan gyi tshul gyis 'dzin pas gnas pa /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-16: de'i spyi bor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-17: rdo rje dbang phyug de'i mdun gyi lag pa bzhin /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-21: g-yung drung gis mtshan pa 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-22: de bzhin du de'i rgyab kyi lag pa bzhi la yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-23: dkyil 'khor dbus ma de nyid shar phyogs kyi logs su nag po chen po lag na tri sh'u la thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-24: lho phyogs su dga' byed dbang phyug rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-25: nub phyogs su dril chen lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-26: byang phyogs su gar gyi dbang phyug lag na mdung rtse la sogs pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-27: shar lho mtshams su thod pa bgrang po lag na thod pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-28: lho nub mtshams su gtum pa'i dbang phyug phyag na tri sh'u la dang /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-32: nub byang mtshams su khatv'am ga lag na kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:225b-34: byang shar mtshams su ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug lag na tri sh'u la thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-35: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su drag mo lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-36: lhor tshangs pa mo lag na bgrang phreng thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:225b-37: nub tu khyab 'jug mo lag na 'khor lo thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-1: gzhon nu ma lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-2: shar lho mtshams su nag mo lag na thod pa khrag dang bcas pa dang 'khar gsil thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-3: lho nub mtshams su nag mo chen mo lag na chu gri thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-4: nub byang mtshams su zab mo lag na mche ba thogs pa'o//
T02TD2512.1E:226a-5: byang shar mtshams su srin mo lag na kha tv'am ga thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba lag na thod pa thogs pa'o /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-7: lhor bh'e runda lag na rus pa'i lu gu rgyud thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-8: nub tu gtum mo lag na bya rgod thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-9: byang du 'jigs byed ma lag na byi la thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-10: rim pa gsum po la 'byung po'i yi ge tri brgyad phreng brgyad du gnas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-11: phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgor dbyig pa'i dbang phyug lag na thod pa dang 'khar ba thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-12: lhor mgo bo'i dbang phyug lag na ti sh'u la dang thod pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-13: nub tu dril bu'i rna ba lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-14: byang phyogs su drag po chen po lag na thod pa dang tri sh'u la thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-15: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni tri zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-16: de ltar na rdo rje dbang phyug gi sbyor bas dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-17: mdud rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'i phyag rgyas bzung ba'i rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-18: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang bum pa gang ba rnams tri zhes bya ba re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-20: tri zhes bya bas rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-21: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-22: gos dang bla re la sogs pa bstabs te /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-23: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-24: ji skad du bshad pa'i rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-25: phyi rol du gtor ma byin nas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226a-26: de nas ras dkar po la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-28: de dag las gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-29: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-30: gsum pas rang gi gdong g-yogs la /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-31: tri zhes bya ba yongs su bzlas pa'i thal ba gtsang mas lus la byugs te /
T02TD2512.1E:226a-33: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-0: de bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams @226b la ;
T02TD2512.1E:226b-1: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-2: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-3: rtse gsum pas mtshan ma bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-4: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-5: badzra badzra tri zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-6: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-7: kye drag po 'byung ba'i bdag po dbang du mdzod cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-8: de nas phyag byas la dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-9: rdo rje dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-13: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-14: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-15: bdag nyid la dbab pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-16: yang g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems ma phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-17: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-18: de nas tri zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-19: de nas de blangs la de nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-20: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-21: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-23: de nas rtse mo gsum gyis mtshan pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-24: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-25: de nas rdo rje dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-26: rdo rje lta bas de la ba lta zhing ji srid du rdo rje dbang phyug gi mthong bar byin nas /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-27: rang gi dngos grub rnams ster bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du tri zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-28: de nas rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje'i lta bas bltas la /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-29: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-30: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:226b-31: de la dang po kho nar zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba'i mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-32: me tog gi yal ga las kyang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du yongs su zlos te /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-33: bdag nyid rdo rje dbang phyug tu byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-34: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:226b-35: de'i steng du rdo rje dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug ste me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-1: gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum ba las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-2: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa tri zhes zlos shing des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya la /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-3: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-4: de nas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-6: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-7: dar dpyangs kyis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-8: tri zhes bya bas mdung rtse gsum dril bu dang bcas pa blangs la tri zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing rdo rje dbang phyug gi ming gis dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-9: tri zhes bya ba nyid kyis bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-10: mdud rtse gsum de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-11: de la 'jig rten pa 'di dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor du bcug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-12: rdo rjer mdzad pa de rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-14: de nas dril bu chos kyi dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-15: de la chos ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-16: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-17: gdug pa 'dul ba grub phyir dang //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-18: 'dod kun bdag po nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-19: gdug pa'i lag la gnas par gyis /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-20: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-22: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig chos //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-23: yang dag bden par smra bya ba //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-24: de ni khyod kyis brnyas mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-25: bden pa yang dag yin zhes bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-26: ces bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-27: de nas brtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-28: 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-29: mi bden nam yang smra mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-30: 'byung po'i gdon yang gzhan min te //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-31: 'di ni bden pa min las byung //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-32: de nas brtsams te 'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-33: dbang phyug chen po yang dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-34: de nas me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-35: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-37: rdo rje dbang phyug la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-38: tri zhes bya bas bzang nas yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:227a-40: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227a-41: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-0: aom tri ha ha ha zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas @227b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-1: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227b-2: lag pa g-yon pa sor mo dbus ma gsum bsgreng la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-3: bden bral gyi phyogs su dpung pa gyen du brkyang nas /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-4: g-yas pas lag mthil du sor mo gsum bsdus la mthe bo dang mthe chung brkyang nas /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-5: kha tv'am ga 'dzin par bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-6: lag pa g-yon pa'i gung mo lcags kyur bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-7: 'dis dbang phyug chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-8: tri zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227b-9: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-15: rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba thams cad go cha bskon la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-16: tri zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-17: mdud rtse gsum pa'i mig gis tri dram shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-18: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham tri zhes lan gsum brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-20: de nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-21: mthe chung lcags sgrog ltar mdud rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227b-22: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-23: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lce la tri zhes bya ba bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-25: snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-26: rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ji ltar bris pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-27: rjes su mthun par tri zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-28: gar byed pa'i tshul gyis bcing ba 'di ni de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227b-29: rang gi snying gar h'um las rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-30: tri zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-31: ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:227b-32: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi bsdu ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:227b-33: tri zhes bya bas rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-0: phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par mchod @228a * //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-2: slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-3: rjes su gnang ba mnos nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-4: de nas slob ma rnams la cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-5: zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba la zhi ba ni dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-6: de'i mdung ni mdud rtse gsum pa'o//
T02TD2512.1E:228a-7: de'i mtshan pa ni des dkyil 'khor gang la mtshan par byas pa de ni zhi ba'i mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-8: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs la phyag bya ba na de la dad pa nyid kyis bya'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams la lhag par mos pa rnams kyis ni ma yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-9: de rnams kyis ni 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-11: sngags bzung ba rnams phyag mi bya bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-12: dpal mchog dang po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-14: // / de ltar zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-15: da ni ma mo rnams kyis 'dul ba nyid las brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-16: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-17: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-18: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-19: thams cad dgug pa dang zhes bya ba la snying po la sogs pas thams cad dgug pa ni dgug pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-20: gzhug pa dang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor la sogs par sems can thams cad la sogs pa gzhug pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-21: sems can thams cad bsad pa sems med par bya ba dang shin tu bsad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-22: sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-23: dam tshig ni thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-26: sgrub pa de rnams kyi rgyu ste /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-27: gang la ming de skad ces bya ba'i snying po ni nges pa'i ye shes te ;
T02TD2512.1E:228a-28: de bsgom pa dang de ston par byed pa'i sga yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-29: de smras pa ni bshad par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:228a-31: bshad pa 'di dag gi ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa smras pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:228a-32: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-0: gsum pa yin par shes @228b bar bya'o /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-2: // / da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-3: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-4: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-5: sngon du brten pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-6: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni snying po 'di'i'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-7: dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-8: zur bzhi pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de'i rjes thogs nyid lam mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa gtsang ba zhes bya ba ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi chus mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bkrus pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-10: phyi'i chu'i khrus kyis phyi'i dri ma dang bral ba ni tshes spyod pa dang gtsang ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-11: gos gtsang ma bgos pa zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-12: thams cad za ba 'am zhes bya ba ni nges pa ma bzung zhing phyi'i gtsang spra'i spyod pa dang bral ba /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-13: tshol ba'i rgyud la mngon par dga' bas /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-18: reg bya rnams la nye bar spyod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-19: thams cad spyad pa la yang smad pa med de zhes bya ba ni ma mo rnams bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-20: zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas zhugs la zhes bya ba ni mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol la /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-21: lag pa gnyis brkyang ste sa la bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-22: 'phags pa'i tshul gyis tsog pur 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-23: ce spyang gi sgra 'don par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-24: zhugs la zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgya 'dis ma mo thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-25: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs thams cad der 'dus par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-26: snying po bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bhyo zhes bya bar bzlas pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-27: de nas bhyo zhes pa bzlas pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas bhyo chen po thos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-28: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-29: gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni gang gdon gyis zin pa de ni gdug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gzhug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-30: gdug pa'i dam tshig de ma gtogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:228b-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar slob dpon gyi rang gi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.1E:228b-32: de'i rjes thogs nyid la slob ma rnams nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-1: pa mdun du dpung pa bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-2: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i khu tshur dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-3: g-yas pa'i dpung pa brkyang nas /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-4: ba dan gsum par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-6: srin lag gi thod ba 'dzin pa lta bu chu 'thung ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-7: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-8: 'dis slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-9: zhugs nas de rnams la slob dpon gyis rna bar bhyo zhes bya ba sgra chen pos sbyar bar bya zhing brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-11: bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bdug ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis phyi'i bdug pa la sogs pa blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-12: bhyo zhes bya ba nyid kyis dkyil 'khor pa thams cad mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-13: de nas bhyo zhes bya bas aa ra li zhes bya ba'i phyi rol pa'i snying po slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-14: nag po chen po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma kha tv'am ga la sogs pa de rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-16: de ltar rang gi mtshan ma rnams byin nas sems can thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-17: sems can du mal gnod pa byed pa'i gdug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-18: dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa de rnams khyod kyis rgyas gdab par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-20: gang dkyil 'khor la smod par byed pa de yang khyod kyis bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-21: khyod kyis rang gi sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-22: dam tshig gsum po de dag ni khyod la rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub ster bar byed pa yin no zhes slob ma la slob dpon gyi dam tshig bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-23: drag po'i dam tshig mdud rtse ste //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-24: zhes bya ba ni mdud rtse gsum pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-25: ma mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pa //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-26: zhes bya ba ni gang ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis rgyas 'debs ba'i las dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-27: de'i snying po khyed kyis nam yang mi smra ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-28: gal te 'das na khyed kyi snying //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-30: zhes bya ba ni drag po'i rtse gsum gyis khyed kyi snying gzhig par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229a-31: ma mo rnams kyis gang rgyas 'debs pa'i las des khyod kyi snying rtag tu rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:229a-32: gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te khyod 'das na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-0: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya @229b thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-1: bslabs nas slob dpon gyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-2: me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-3: dkyil 'khor du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor du bstabs pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-6: btung ba thams cad kyis slob ma rnams tshim par byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-7: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsdus te phyir 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-8: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba la phyag rgya ni rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-9: dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ni dngos grub rnams rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu la dam tshig ces bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-12: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i nag po chen po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-13: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-14: ji srid du mtshan ma dang rjes su gnad ba thob par gyur ba de srid kyi bar du ma mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-15: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ma mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-16: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-17: nyi ma 'char kar zur bzhi pa sgo byang du bltas par thig btab la /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-18: de bri bar bya ba ni dmar po la sogs pa tshon sna lnga 'am /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-21: de'i dbus su nag po chen po gar byed bzhin du gnas pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-22: lag pa bcu la kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-23: padma thogs ba ci dga' ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-24: de'i byang phyogs kyi logs su drag po lag na rtse gsum thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-25: shar du tshangs pa mo lag na bgrang phreng thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-26: lhor khyab 'jug ma lag na 'khor lo thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-27: nub tu gzhon nu ma lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-28: byang shar mtshams su nag mo lag na gri thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-29: shar lhor nag mo chen po lag na chu gri thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-30: lho nub tu zab mo lag na mche ba thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-31: nub byang mtshams su srin mo lag na kha tv'am ga thogs par dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:229b-32: sgo'i dbus su g-yas kyi cha la zhi ba mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-34: g-yon gyi cha la gtum mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:229b-35: 'jigs byed ma rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230a-0: @230a * // 'di rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du thod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-4: byi la'i mtshan ma thogs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230a-5: de ltar nag po chen po'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor bris la nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung pa'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-6: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-7: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-8: padma'i snod rnams la bhyo zhes bya ba re re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams ji lta ba bzhin du phyi la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-9: nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la bhyo zhes bya bas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas mchod yon byin zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-11: bum ba gang ba rnams kyang bstabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-12: yang nag po chen po'i mdun du thod pa dmar po gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-13: gos dang bla re la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-14: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-15: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-16: phyi rol du gtor ma byin te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230a-17: de nas ras sngon po la bhyo zhes bya ba bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-18: de dag las gcig gis ni smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-19: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-20: yang gcig la bhyo zhes bya ba bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs te /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-22: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-23: de bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-24: sga la bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-25: lag na me tog thogs shing zhi ba mo'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-26: badzra badzra bhyo zhes bya bzlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-28: g-yas dang g-yon gyi nag po chen po la phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-29: de nyid kyi mdun du 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-31: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-32: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-33: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230a-34: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje dbye zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:230a-35: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du bzlas la bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230a-36: de nas bhyo zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-0: de nas de blangs @230b la de nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-1: de nas de nyid kyi gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-2: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-4: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhi ba pho nya'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-5: rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o//
T02TD2512.1E:230b-6: de nas nag po chen po'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-7: de la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-8: ji srid nag po chen pos mthong ba byin nas rang gi dngos grub ster bar gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-9: de nas yang nag po chen po la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-10: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-11: dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-12: yang nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-13: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-14: bdag nyid de nyid nag po chen por byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-15: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-16: de'i steng du nag po chen po'i phyag rgya chen pos 'dug nas /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-17: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-19: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-20: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa bhyo zhes zlos shing des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-21: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-22: de nas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-23: thod pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-24: bhyo zhes bya bas kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-25: dril bu dang bcas pa blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-26: bhyo zhes bya ba zlos pa ni na du ming gi dbang bskur ba blang zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-27: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba yang kha tv'am ga de nyid gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-28: 'jig rten thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-29: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-30: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos so /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-32: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-33: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:230b-34: sems can thams cad rgyas btab cing //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-35: dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-36: sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-37: dam tshig rnal 'byor khyod grub ster //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-38: drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse sta //
T02TD2512.1E:230b-39: ma mo'i bdag nyid rgyas 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-3: de nas me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod de rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-5: nag po chen po la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-6: bhyo zhes bya ba dang rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi blang ngo //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-7: de nas bhyo kha zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-8: ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i nag po chen po la gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-9: khrag gi thig pa lan brgyad myang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-10: de nas nag po chen po'i mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-11: thod pa nag po blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-12: mthe bo dang srin lag gnyis dang /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-13: ha ha ha ha ha zhes zlos na skad cig ma de nyid la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-14: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-15: bdag gi ming nas brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-16: de nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjer bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-17: de nas bhyo bhyo zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-18: dkyil 'khor me tog la sogs pas mchod pa gang byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-19: khatv'am ga'i lcags kyus ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i nag po chen po'i aa ra lli bhyo bhyo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-20: de nas ma mo thams cad 'dus nas /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-21: ce spyang gi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-22: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang 'dus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-23: nag po chen po'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya las mdzub mo lcags kyur bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-25: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-30: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-31: rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba thams cad go bskon te /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-32: bhyo zhes bya bas ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i nag po chen po la mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-33: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-34: bhyo dram shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa blta ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-36: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham bhyo zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-37: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi lce la rdo rje bsams nas nag po chen po la sogs pa'i lce la bhyo zhes bya ba bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:231a-38: 'di ni 'dir lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231a-39: de nas aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-0: @231b nag po chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po gar gyi tshul gyis bhyo zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-2: 'di ni de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-3: de nas rang gi snying gar h'um zhes bya bas khro bo'i rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-4: ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par nag po chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bhyo zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-5: de nas rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-6: thod pa'i phyag rgya dag gis nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-7: bhyo zhes bya bas nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-8: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-10: gar gyi mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-11: zhi ba mo'i pho nya'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-12: bhyo zhes bya ba ji srid dkyil 'khor las bhyo'i sgra thos par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-13: de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-15: gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-16: de nas slob ma lag na me tog thogs pa ras kyis mig bkab la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-17: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-19: slob mas lag na me tog thogs la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-21: khyed la 'jigs pa med dam zhes bsgo'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-22: de nas 'dis kyang med do zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-23: de nas slob dpon gyis de'i rna bar bhyo zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po bsgrag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-25: me tog dor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bhyo zhes bya ba nyid kyis so //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-26: de nas gang du lhung pa'i lha de 'di la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-27: gal te lhung bar ma gyur na yang dang yang du 'dor du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-28: de nas lhung bas khro ba dang bcas par 'gyur zhing rang gi lha'i las byed pa'i rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-29: de nas bhyo zhes bya ba nyid kyis me tog blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-31: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:231b-32: de nas de nyid zlos shing sgo srungs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-34: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:231b-35: slob ma'i snying gar de bzhin du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-0: de nas de nag po chen po'i gzugs la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs @232a * //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-3: bdug spos la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-4: ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-5: 'dir phyugs chen po yon du blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-6: de nas 'di la de ltar gyur cig par bsgo ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-7: rang gi mi la spyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-8: de nas rang gi mi de slob dpon gyis blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-9: de bsrung ba'i phyir bag zan gyi gzugs brnyan tshos pa dang ma tshos pa'i khrag gis khengs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-10: de nas de blangs la slob ma dam pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-11: nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa de la byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-12: de la 'di skad ces brjod do /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-13: bhyo bhyo zhes bya ba gnyis bzlas la de nyid zlos shing byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-14: slob dpon la sogs pa slob ma'i tshogs thams cad kyis gzugs brnyan de bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-16: sangs rgyas pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la ni srog gcod pa rjes su ma gnang ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-17: du 'bod la sogs pa dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-18: de bas na bag zan gyis gzugs brnyan bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-19: de nas brtsams te slob ma rnams mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi mi gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-20: de na mi'i khrag gi thigs pa gnyis blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-21: ha ha zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-22: de lta bus ni slob ma grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-23: de nas snga ma bzhin du dam tshig dang chos kyi de kho na nyid bslab ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-25: sha chen kha na ma tho ba med pa la bhyo zhes bzlas nas gang zhig za ba de ring por mi thogs par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-26: yongs su dag pa'i sems can gang mi za bde dag kyang bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa dag gis 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-27: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams las 'jigs pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-28: de nas 'di'i dam tshig byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-29: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-30: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:232a-31: khyod kyis chos ni yong mi spang //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-32: dam tshig rnams ni bral mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-33: mkha' 'gro mas ni zin pa rnams //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-34: thar pa ru ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-35: mkha' 'gro rnams ni brnyas mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-36: gang phyir ma dang bu mo dang //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-37: de la chos ni gang zhe na //
T02TD2512.1E:232a-40: de la dam tshig gang zhe na //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-0: phyag rgya thams cad shes @232b pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-1: de la mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bzung ba gang zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-3: de la 'dul ba gang zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-4: 'di lta ste tshangs par spyod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-6: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ye shes 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-7: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-8: bhyo zhes bya bas mkha' 'gro ma thams cad gzhig pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-11: gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-13: gsod pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-14: lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo bar ma gsum bteg la /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-15: bden bral gyi logs su lag pa gyen du brkyang nas /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-16: g-yas pa de'i steng du bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-17: lag pas ba dan gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-19: srin lag gis thod pa 'dzin pa ni drag po ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-20: 'dis mig mi 'dzum par khro bo'i lta bas thams cad rgyas btab cing /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-21: ae aa ra lli bhyo zhes bya ba dang bstun la /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-22: lhag ma rnams las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-23: bhyo zhes bya ba zlos shing las thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dpal mchog dang po'i ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-26: // / ming po gsum gyis 'dul ba'i skye bo las brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-27: de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-28: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-29: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-30: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-31: sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa la //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-32: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i tshangs pa ni sbrang rtsir byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-33: de nyid dang por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-34: sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-37: don thams cad grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-39: dbang phyug chen mo gang ston bzangs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-40: khyab 'jug ni dpyid kyi gzugs 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni don thams cad grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:232b-42: tshangs pa 'dod chags gzhan sprul pa //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-43: zhe sdang drag po'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2512.1E:232b-44: gti mug khyab 'jug bstan byas pas //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-2: 'dod chags sbrang rtsi byed par bshad //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-3: zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par grags //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-4: gti mug der ni bsgrub pa ste //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-5: gsang ba'i ming ni thams cad du'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-8: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la rab tu 'dud pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-9: mgrin gcig tu zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-10: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-11: sva zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-12: ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-13: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-14: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-16: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-17: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-18: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-19: 'di'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-20: sgro yi mtshams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-26: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la grub pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-27: tshogs rnam pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-28: phyi rol na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-32: dril bu'i phreng ba ba dan gyi mchog dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-33: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-37: phyag rgya kun gyis gzhug par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:233a-39: rtse gsum pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-41: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-44: srid gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i srid pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233a-51: mchod gsum ni spun gsum gyis mchod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-0: @233b gti mug gi mchod pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-1: sbas pa ni skyes bu gsum gyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pas so //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar bdag gis las rnams byas nas so zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-3: rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i phyag rgyas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-4: de nas dril bu dang bcas pa'i phreng bas 'di skad du bshad pa'i ming po gsum 'ongs pas thams cad g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-5: thams cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni slob ma thams cad la phab la /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-6: slob dpon gyi 'jug pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-8: gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-9: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams ni gzhan dag ste /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-11: 'jig rten gsum po srid gsum mchog //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-12: ces bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid bshad par mi bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:233b-13: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-19: dga' ba ni rtse ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-26: de dag las byung ba'i mgu ba zhes bya ba yid bde ba'i shugs kyis mel tshe zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-28: gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa yang byas la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-29: ming po gsum gyi las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa ni phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-30: gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-32: de ltar phyag rgya gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-33: phyag rgya de dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-34: badzra mushti bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-36: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-37: zhes bya ba la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:233b-40: de las byung zhing de ston pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:233b-41: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor byas pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-2: badzra aanydza li zhes bya bas rdo rje thal mo bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-3: de nas badzra bandha zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-4: badzra bandha trata zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-5: de nas badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-6: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-7: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-8: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dbab pa'i phyag rgya dkrol la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-9: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sva rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-10: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-11: de nas sva dang bcas pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par rang gi sems bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-12: de'i steng du yang sva bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-13: ka nas ksha'i bar gyi yi ge rnams skar ma lta bur rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-14: de dang de 'dus par gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bsam mo ;
T02TD2512.1E:234a-15: / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i steng du yang sva zhes bya ba bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po las dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-17: sva zhes bya ba nyid la yang bzla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-18: de nas rdo rje me tog dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-20: thod pa dang bcas pa sva zhes bya ba las rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-21: mda'i dbus su sva rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-24: thod pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa la som bom hom zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-25: phyag rgya de sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-26: de nas sva las rdo rje sems dpa' ming po gsum gyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-27: ma h'a sa ma ya som bom hom zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-28: dam tshig sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-29: de nas ming po gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-30: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la dam tshig sems dpa' nyid du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234a-31: de nas sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-32: ming po gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234a-35: spyi bo rnams su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-0: de nas ming po gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar @234b bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-1: de nas de bcings la sva aa zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-4: thod pa'i phyag rgya mdun du bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-5: de nas mda'i dbus su sva rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-8: thod pa'i phyag rgya ni bdag go zhes phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-9: phyag rgya de sva zhes bya ba bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-10: bhra tri ta yam aa ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-11: ming po gsum gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-12: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas der ming po gsum bkug la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-13: bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas nas ming po gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sva dri shya zhes bya bas de dag blta ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-14: de gnyis kyi g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-15: sva zhes bya ba bzlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-16: rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-17: ming po gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-18: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham sva: zhes bzlas nas ming po gsum dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-21: bdag nyid lhan cig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-22: de nas lce la rdo rje de bzhin du rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-23: sva zhes bya ba rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-24: snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-25: ming po gsum gyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-26: h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-27: ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-28: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-31: thong pa'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-32: ming gi dbang bskur ba yang blangs la ;
T02TD2512.1E:234b-33: sva zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-34: de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-35: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-36: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-37: ming po gsum ni bdag go zhe snga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-38: ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-39: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di ji srid mtshan ma dang /
T02TD2512.1E:234b-40: rjes su gnang ba thob kyi bar du nyin re sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:234b-41: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-0: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas @235a * //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-1: ba teg ste gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-2: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-5: de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu de'i phyed kyi tshad de'i dbus su seng ge'i gdan byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-6: de'i dbus su ming po gsum rim pa bzhin bri bar byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-7: dbus su rgyal bar byed pa /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-8: de'i g-yas phyogs su sbrang rtsir byed pa /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-9: g-yon logs su don thams cad grub par byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-10: de dag thams cad go cha ba gos pas /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-11: g-yas na thod pa thogs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-12: g-yon na mda' gzhu thogs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-13: cung zad dgod cing khro bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-14: de la rgyal bar byed pa ni dkar po //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-15: sbrang rtsir byed pa ni ser po //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-16: don thams cad grub pa ni ljang gu'i mdog can no //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-17: shar phyogs kyi sgor grub pa mdog dkar po /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-19: lag na rtse gsum thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-21: lag na gter gyi bum pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-22: nub tu chen po mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-23: lag na me tog gi zam tog thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-24: byang du gnod sbyin nag po /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-25: lag na mche ba thogs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-26: gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-27: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i shar lho mtshams su gtum mo mdog nag po //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-28: lag na dbyig pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-29: lho nub tu khro ba mdog nag po //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-31: nub byang du mchog mdog nag po /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-33: byang shar du gsod pa mdog nag po //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-34: lag na ral gri 'phyar ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-35: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni sva zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235a-36: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas mdung gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-37: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-38: bum pa gang ba rnams la sva zhes bya ba re re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-39: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad phye ste /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-40: sva zhes bya bas ming po gsum 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-41: bum pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-42: bla re la sogs pa byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-43: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:235a-44: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-0: phyi rol tu glu dang gar la sogs pas kyang mchod @235b la ;
T02TD2512.1E:235b-1: phyi rol du gtor ma byin nas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-2: de nas gos bzang po la sva zhes bya ba bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-3: gcig gis ni smad g-yogs bya //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-4: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-5: gsum pas ni rang gi dgong g-yogs la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-8: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje bskyed de /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-9: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-10: rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-11: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-12: badzra badzra sva zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-13: glu rnams glu ru len pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-14: rol mo rnams brdung bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-15: gar byed pa bzhin du slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mchog tu 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-16: de nas yang ming po gsum gyi mdun du 'dug la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-18: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhye m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-19: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-20: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-21: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-22: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-23: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-24: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-25: de nas sva zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-27: de nas de nyid blangs la de nyid kyi mgo la bcing bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:235b-28: / de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-29: de nas de nyid zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-30: shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-32: de nas rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-33: tishtha badzra zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-34: de nas ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-35: de la rdo rje'i lta bas khro bo dang bcas pas bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-36: ji srid rang gi mthong ba byin nas rang gi dngos grub rnams ster bar gyur pa de srid kyi bor du sva zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-37: yang de la de bzhin du bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-40: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:235b-41: dbang bskur ba rnams blangs bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:235b-42: de la dang po kho nar rtse gsum pas mtshan pa yongs su bzung ba'i rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-0: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i sngags de bzhin du @236a * //
T02TD2512.1E:236a-2: ; de nas bdag nyid ming po gsum du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-3: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris te /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-4: de'i steng du sva zhes bya ba nyid kyis seng ge'i gang na bzhag la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-5: der ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-6: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-8: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-9: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa sva zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-10: des bdag nyid dbang bskur nas chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236a-11: de nas rin po che'i cod pan gyi phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-12: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-13: sva zhes bya bas mda' dang gzhu dang dril bu dang bcas pa blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-14: sva zhes bya ba nyid kyis ming po gsum gyi ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-15: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-16: me tog gi mchod pas dkyil 'khor mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-17: bdag nyid mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-18: phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-19: rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-20: ming po gsum la phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-22: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bzung la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-23: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-24: rang gi ming nas brjod par yang byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-26: 'jig rten gsum mchog srid gsum mchog / ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam gsum //
T02TD2512.1E:236a-27: legs ldan sbas pa grub pa ni //
T02TD2512.1E:236a-28: dngos grub kun la rtag tu'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236a-29: de nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrubs la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-31: rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i phyag rgya las g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-32: sva zhes bya ba zlos shing ming po gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-33: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-36: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-37: rdo rje srung bas srung ba thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02TD2512.1E:236a-38: so zhes bya bas ming po gsum gyi 'khor dang bcas la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-0: rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa @236b bcings te /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-1: sva dri shya zhes bya bas blta ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-2: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham sva zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-3: de nas de bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-4: ming po gsum la sogs pa'i lce la yang sva zhes bya ba rnam par bsam pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-5: aa zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-6: sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-7: gar gyi tshul gyis ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ste //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-9: h'um zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-11: rjes su mthun pa ming po gsum la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po sva zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-12: de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgyas ming po gsum la sogs pa la dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-13: sva zhes bya bas ming po gsum 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-14: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-15: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis legs par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-16: slob ma rnams gzhug pa'i rjes su gnang ba mnos te /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-17: de rnams bdag nyid 'jug pa'i tshul du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-18: de nas thams cad byas la dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-19: gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-20: pha gsod 'gro ba gang yin dang //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-21: ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-23: rtag tu dam pa brten par bya //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-24: dam pa min pa yongs su sbang //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-25: gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-26: rtag tu ming po gsum po bsgrub //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-27: ces bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-28: lhag ma rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-29: dpal mchog dang po las ming po gsum gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-31: // / de ltar ming po gsum gyi rtog pa des 'dul ba'i sems can rnams las brtsams te gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-32: da ni sring mo bzhis 'dul ba'i sems can nyid las brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-33: sring mo bzhi'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:236b-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2512.1E:236b-35: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-0: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @237a * //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-1: gnyis pa gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-2: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-3: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-4: sring mo bzhis zhes bya ba nas ham zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-5: 'di dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-6: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-7: gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-8: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-9: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-10: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-11: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-12: las kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-13: 'di zhes bya ba ni ham gi'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-14: zlum bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-15: kun nas zlum po'i dkyil 'khor phur bu la btags pa'i srad bu dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-17: de nas h'um zhes phur bu phyung la /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-18: phur bu'i khung bu tshon sna lngas yongs su bkang la mnyam por bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-19: de nas mtshams kyi srad bu gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor de dum bu bzhi par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-20: de nas sgo bzhi po der shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-21: dga' ba mo shar du blta ba bri bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-23: gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-31: phag mo nub tu blta ba /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-32: lag na gser gyi gter thogs pa /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-35: grub pa mo byang du blta ba /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-36: lag na sha ka ra dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-38: mdog dkar mo bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-39: phyi rol gyi zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-40: sgo bzhi'i dbus su dga' ba mo la sogs pas mtshan pa'i yan lag ji lta ba bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237a-41: de nas slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:237a-43: lag pa g-yas pas dril bu bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-0: @237b g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bzung nas h'um zlos shing 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-2: gar gyi mchod pa bstab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya bzhis gar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-3: de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-4: las kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba la rim pa gtso bor bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-5: brtson 'grus kyi las kyi gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-7: ming po gsum gyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho gas dga' ba mo'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-8: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor 'di ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-9: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-10: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas btab nas /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-11: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag la ;
T02TD2512.1E:237b-12: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-13: yang nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bar snang la bzhag nas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-14: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi'i nga rgyal gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-15: yang shar phyogs kyi sgor mda' dang gzhu gnyis bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:237b-16: / lho phyogs su phub dang bcas pa'i ral gri'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-17: nub tu gter gyi bum pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-18: byang gi sgor gri rings dang bcas pa'i thod pa ham zhes bya ba nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-19: de nas sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-20: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-21: bum pa gang ba rnams la re re zhing ho zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-22: rdo rje bsdams pa byas la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-24: g-yas pa'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-25: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtse mo sbyar nas bzhag pa 'di ni sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:237b-26: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams ji lta ba bzhin du phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-27: ham zhes bya bas sring mo bzhi la mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-29: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-30: bla re la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02TD2512.1E:237b-31: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis de yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-1: rol du glu dang gar la sogs pas kyang mchod pa byed du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-2: phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-3: de nas sbyin sreg byas la gos bzang po la ham zhes bya ba bzlas te /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-4: de las gcig gis ni smad g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-5: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-6: gsum pas rang gi gdong g-yogs byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-8: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-9: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-10: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-11: lag pa g-yas pas dril bu dkrol la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-12: lag pa g-yon pas khatv'am ga bzung ste /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-13: badzra badzra zhes bzlas shing dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-15: dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-16: mdun du 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-17: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'am /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-18: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la ;
T02TD2512.1E:238a-19: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-20: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-21: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-22: de nas me tog ham zhes bya bas dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-24: de nyid kyis rang gi mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-25: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-26: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-28: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-29: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol lo //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-30: de nas dga' ba mo'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-31: rdo rje'i lta bas de la blta zhing ji srid du rang gi gzugs bstan nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-32: rang gi dngos grub ster bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du ham zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-33: yang de la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-34: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:238a-35: me tog la sogs pas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238a-36: de la dang po kho nar sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-0: aom ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma @238b bzhin du bzlas la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-1: bdag nyid ming po gsum gyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-3: de'i dbus su ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-4: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-5: mchod yon blangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs te /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-6: aom badzra aa bhi shnytsi ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-7: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-8: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238b-9: de nas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-10: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-11: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-12: ham zhes bya bas dril bu dang bcas pa'i khatv'am ga blangs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-13: ham zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-14: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-15: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-16: bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-17: lha mo bzhi'i las kyi phyag rgyas kyang mchod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-18: rjes su gnang ba dang dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238b-19: de nas lha mo bzhi la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-21: phyag rgya bzhi yang bzung nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-22: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-23: rang gi ming nas brjod pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238b-25: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-26: ham zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-27: gsang ba'i lcags kyus sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238b-28: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal bar byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-33: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-34: rdo rje srung bas bsrungs ba thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-35: sring mo bzhi la ham zhes bya bas mchod yon byin nas /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-36: sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ham dri shya zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-37: sring mo bzhi la blta ba byas la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-41: aa ham zhes lan gsum brjod de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:238b-42: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lce la rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:238b-43: de rnams kyi lce la yang ham zhes bya ba bsam pa 'di ni 'dir chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-0: 'dir snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la gar gyi sbyor bas ham zhes zlos shing sring mo bzhi'i phyag rgya @239a * //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-2: 'di ni de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-3: h'um las rang gi snying gar rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-4: ham zhes bya ba zlos shing de rnams ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-5: de nas de rnams la rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-6: ham gis mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-7: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-8: las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-9: phyag byas nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir gnang ba mnos la /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-10: bdag nyid 'jug pa'i sbyor bas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-11: de nas rang gi cho ga thams cad de rnams la rjes su spyad par bya'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:239a-12: / dpal mchog dang po'i dum bu dang po las sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-14: // / rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang ras kyi ri mo gnyis la bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang so sor shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-15: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-16: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-17: de las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02TD2512.1E:239a-18: mos pa spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems zag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa las skyes pa gang yin pa rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa nas sring mo bzhi'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs te /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-19: de'i rtog pa ni ji skad bshad pa'o /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-21: // / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu las /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-22: dkyil 'khor bco lnga'i rtog pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-23: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams bris nas slob dpon gyis ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol la /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-24: sprul ba rnams rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-25: rang gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bzhi brjod nas /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi 'don cing /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-27: de'i don la lhag par mos pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.1E:239a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par lhag par mos pas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs su gnas pa la legs so zhes bya bas dga' bar byas nas /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-0: bdag nyid @239b bsrung ba byas te ldang bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin la /
