T02TD2512.1E:239b-2: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag stan par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-3: ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-4: ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-5: rang gi lus la bcug pa byas nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-8: mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug cing zhes bya ba la de la mtha' yas ba ni chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-10: de nyid ni mu med pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-11: mtha' yas pa yang yin pas na mtha' yas mu med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-12: mtha' yas pa dang mu med pa de nyid ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-13: rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-14: de'i chos gang yin zhe na mu med pa'i mthar thug pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-15: mu med pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-17: de'i mthar thug pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-18: nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i chos nyid 'di mnga' bas na mu med cing mthar thug pa'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-20: sprul pa'i sku dag gis 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-21: thams cad du song ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-22: yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-24: yang zhes bya ba ni bshad zin te /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-26: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-27: cho ga 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rtog pa bco lnga ste /
T02TD2512.1E:239b-28: mthar thug pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'di dag gis bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-29: de'i byin gyis brlab pa ni slob dpon gcig gis phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med pa'i bar du gdul bya rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:239b-30: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-2: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-3: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mi phyed pa'i 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-4: de'i mthar thug ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-5: dpag tu yod cing yongs su chad ba'i gzhung gis yang dag par bsdus nas /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-6: yang dag par bsres te bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-7: de'i byin gyis brlab pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang gis bstan par byas par gyur pa de ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-8: ming de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-9: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag nas smras pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-10: bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-11: de nyid gang zhes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas zhes bya ba la 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-12: byang chub kyi sems chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-13: de yang thams cad du song ba yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-14: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-15: de'i dngos po nyid ni mtha' yas pa nyid de /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-16: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid du gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-17: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-18: de rnams kyi mtha' yas pa nyid ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad du rtag tu zhugs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-19: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-20: ye shes las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi gdul bya'i dbang gi phyir phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med pa'i nam mkha' khyab par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-22: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240a-23: de'i mu med pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240a-24: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-0: @240b thams cad kyang yin pas na rdo rje thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-1: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-3: 'di skad ces ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-4: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad du song ba yin la /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-5: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad du song ba de'i phyir de'i tshul las skyes pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi rigs ni mu med par gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-6: mtha' yas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid ces bya ba la 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-8: de yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi dbye bas mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-9: de bas na de ni du ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid des chos thams cad du ma nyid du gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-11: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-12: padma'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-13: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dbye bas du ma nyid dam sna tshogs par gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-14: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyis na sna tshogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas zhes bya ba la 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-16: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de de las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-17: de yang las kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na las thams cad de /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-18: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i las rnams dang las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-19: de rnams kyi mthar thug pa med pa ni /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-20: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa med par sprul pa rnams kyis 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-21: gang la la zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.1E:240b-23: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mthar thug pa med pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:240b-24: sprul pa'i sku dag gis 'gro ba'i don gyi mthar phyin te /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-0: shes rab kyi mthar thug pa'i @241a * //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-3: sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i mthar phyin pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-4: sgrib pa thams cad ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-5: de rnams kyi zad pa'i mthar thug pa ni lhag ma med par spangs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-6: de'i dngos po ni sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i mthar thug pa nyid de des de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-7: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do//
T02TD2512.1E:241a-9: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-10: sems can yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-11: sems can chen po ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-12: rigs thams cad kyi mdo sde yin pas na rdo rje'i mdo sde'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-13: de byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par byas pa ste sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis slob dpon gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-15: gang gis byin gyis brlabs she na /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-16: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-18: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-19: de dag dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa nas /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-20: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-23: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-24: 'bras bu yod pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-25: gdul bya rnams kyi byang chub sems la sogs pa rdzogs par byed pa nges pa nyid yin pas na 'bras bu yod pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-26: 'dis sems can rnams 'dul bas 'dul ba ste /
T02TD2512.1E:241a-27: sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-28: 'dul ba yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na 'dul ba'i mchog go //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-29: cho ga'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.1E:241a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-0: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i gzhung dang @241b don sgrub par byed cing ;
T02TD2512.1E:241b-1: gang zhig 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur te gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-2: de skad ces bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-3: rdo rje can ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-5: kun gyi mchog ni dam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-7: sras bcas kun ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-8: de dag thams cad kyis mngon par bstod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-9: ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa la mngon par bstod ce na /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-10: gsang ba grub phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-12: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub ni /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-14: de'i don la mngon par bstod par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-15: 'di skad du ston par gyur te /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas dkyil 'khor bco lnga'i sgrub pa'i tshig gang zhig gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-17: de rnams ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-18: sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-19: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-20: gdul bya rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi gsung nyid du zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad pa yin no zhes nges ba bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-21: 'jug par gyur na phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-22: phyi dang nang gi yul gnyis su spangs pa'i don yang zhes bya ba ni stong phrag brgya la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-23: tshul sgo brgya lnga bcu bar gsungs te /
T02TD2512.1E:241b-24: smos pa tsam las gsal bar ma bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:241b-25: gsal bar bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i don rnams kyang 'dir ma gsang bar bstan pa'i don to //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni ji skad du gsungs pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-2: de rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni mthar phyin pa ste /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-3: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-4: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-5: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-6: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-7: phyag rgya chen po ston pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-8: rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi snying po zhes pa 'di kho nar zad pas 'di mi shes bzhin don shes par smra bar bkag pa'o ;
T02TD2512.1E:242a-9: / byang chub sems dang rgya chen shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-10: rgyud 'di bshad byas bdag gis dge ba tshad med gang bsags shing //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-11: shes rab pha rol phyin la kun dga'i snying pos dge bskyed pas //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-12: 'jig rten ma lus khyab bdag chen po rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig//
T02TD2512.1E:242a-13: dpal mchog dang po las gsang ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-14: dum bu dang po'i phyag rgya bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-16: // / sngags dgongs sgra yi tshig don rtogs dka' las //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-17: blo gros brtson sogs rgyu dang mi ldan zhing //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-18: don bzhin sgrub pa phal cher 'das pa na //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-19: nus gzhan bdag la spro ba'i sems med kyang //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-20: mya ngam gnas kyi dpag bsam shing 'dra yi //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-21: snyigs dus mtha' 'khor ba gnas su rje rgyal 'khrungs //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-22: cho sa don lhur mdzad kun la thugs brtse bas //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-23: don 'di bsgrub phyir bla ma'i bka' yis bskul //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-24: rje yi bka' las mi 'da' gtsor bgyis te //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-25: bka' drin blan zhing ci nas mnyes bya dang //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-26: yongs la than dgongs rgya chen bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-27: sngon mkhas rjes 'brang rtsol ba gtugs te bsgyur //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-28: de bas chos rjes 'brang ba'i dam pa rnams //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-29: yang dag don btsal rjes su mos blo yis //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-30: chos mchog bka' drin dam pa shes byas la //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-31: don bzhin dpyad pas bka' drin bsam pa'i rigs //
T02TD2512.1E:242a-32: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya shraddhra ka ra barmma dang /
T02TD2512.1E:242a-34: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
